Title: iDIOMS in Conversation (Lite)
Description:
Our Fluency Tools: Idioms (Lite) App was designed in parallel with our Fluency Tools series by Marshall  Cavendish Education.

This app features individual cards with an idiom on each. Flip each card to switch between the graphic  and the meaning of each idiom. You can also listen to an audio track to hear the idiom used in everyday  conversation.

When you’re ready, head to the Tests section and get a series of 10 idioms and choose the correct  definition. A random set of 10 idioms will come up each time.

More apps coming soon!

Title: iDive World - Maldives
Description:
The most complete travel guide for divers to the Maldives. 300 dive locations with illustrated maps and dozens professional advice for the ultimate diving experience.

iDive World - Maldives, reveals many secrets such as which dive sites are best for each season, what wildlife and fauna you can expect to see and how best to make the most of your time in this wonderful part of the world.

Title: idocFrescobaldi
Description:
Your personal library directly on your iPad!
idocFrescobaldi is the new free App for iPad that allows you to quickly and easily organize and manage all of your books, magazines, newspapers, brochures and documents in pdf and ebook in format epub3 (and ebook - epub3 format).
idocFrescobaldi it has been declared one of best Italian APP 2013 from the Digitalic head, (Declared one of the best italian APP 2013).
A useful and practical archive: synchronize idocFrescobaldi with your iPad using iTunes and download all of your files.  You will always have them at hand, catalogued on the virtual shelves, ready to be accessed at a touch!  You can browse the pages, zoom in on text, do text searches within individual files, all with a touch of the finger.
idocFrescobaldi also gives you an entire collection of texts and insights related to the history and tradition of Marchesi de’ Frescobaldi, a panoramic view of the characteristics of the wines and of the estates.
With idocFrescobaldi, take your favourite books with you, always. 
Happy reading!

Title: iDoyle: Sherlock Holmes
Description:
iClassics: Beyond Engrossing

iClassics unites the old and the new to create immersive experiences that inspire and move everyone.

Serving as a departure from iClassics Production's famed focus on terror and horror, this Immersive Entertainment app is a feature-length artistic and technological rendering of Arthur Conan Doyle's masterpiece, A Scandal in Bohemia. 

In this innovative Immersive Entertainment app, the legendary detective tale is lovingly and artistically enhanced with interaction, illustration, animation, FX, and OST. 

By casting a modern glare on A Scandal in Bohemia, the result is a spectacular and wholly original experience that utilizes every feature of modern mobile devices (gyro-perspective, flash, vibration), giving users the sensation that they are helping Sherlock solve the mystery. 

TILT to find hidden clues

TOUCH to uncover essential details 

TURN to discover what is hidden at first site

Sherlock Holmes is a literary creation that transcends his epoch and even his creator, existing as a legend in the minds of everyone, even those who have not even read any of Arthur Conan Doyle's fine works. 

With the lovingly constructed enhancements for which iClassics Productions has become famous, this feature-length Immersive Entertainment app offers the modern reader the possibility of experiencing the legend of Sherlock Holmes in a wholly original way. 

▶ APP FEATURES:

Main features:

- An hour of interactive stories.
- Available in 4 languages: English, Spanish, French and Portuguese.
- 1 short story in 3 chapters. More than 50 illustrations, 65 animations and 70 interactive pages.
 - Illustrated by Jordi Solano and directed by David G. Forés.
- Over 25 minutes of Original Soundtrack by Miquel Tejada.
- Extras. Sir Arthur Conan Doyle biography and Sketchbook by Jordi Solano.
- Original tale from the writer – no cuts, no adaptations.

Additional features:

- Jump to any page in the book with our handy table of contents.
- Page Memory. Leave the app at any moment, and come back to the same page.
- Universal App. Pay once, run on iPhone and iPad.
- Easy to use interface


▶ ABOUT ICLASSICS COLLECTION:

iClassics are interactive experiences based on literature from all times: E.A. Poe, C. Dickens, H.P Lovecraft, Oscar Wilde and many more to come! Discover them at www.iclassicscollection.com

Title: iDu'a Pro
Description:
iDu’a Pro is an application for iPhone, iPod and iPad in order to learn Islamic supplications. 
Over 250 supplications are available for everyday situations.
 
The supplications are based on the well-known du’ as from Hisnul Muslim.
 
Features in iDu’a Pro:
- Over 250 supplications in English, Arabic and transcription
- Add supplications to ‘ favourites list’
- Search feature
- Easily navigate between du’ as
- Share via social media
- You can give your feedback
- You can tell your brother / sister about this application
- You can zoom in in the Dua

Title: iDuas - Rajab/Shabaan
Description:
Rajab and Shabaan are the other months of spirituality leading up to the Holy Month of Ramadhan. Use this app for the entire two months as it contains all the daily rituals, supplications and important events in both Rajab and Shabaan. It also contains the important Amaal of Laylatul Raghaib (the night of desires), and the Amaal of 15th Shabaan.

The app is driven with a friendly interface and ability to customize your options, view line by line or full Arabic. You can also view transliteration. The app also contains multimedia of mp3s and video.

Other Features:
- Arabic font with sizing options via Settings
- Du'as such as Du'a Kumail, Du'a Tawasul, Du'a Nudba, Munajat of Shabaaniya, and much more!
- Transliteration section
- Ability to view videos on the app
- Can customize the app using the settings (i.e. View Arabic, Transliteration, font size, and more)
- Can view Full Du'a OR Line By Line (configurable via settings)
- Sharing options 
- Landscape and portrait compatibility 
- Bookmarking and much more!

Title: iDuas - Shahr Ramadhan
Description:
iDuas Shahr Ramadhan 

The application contains a detailed guide on what to do for the Month of Ramadhan and contains supplications and salutations that are highly recommended to be recited during the Holy Month of Ramadhan including the Nights of Power (Laylatul Qadr) and Eid-ul-Fitr. A special feature includes the ability to download MP3s and Video files for each Du'a/Amaal and following along while reciting or listening. 

This app has been completely re-done from our previous app. New features include:

- A new better interface for all your devices
- Better Arabic font with sizing options via Settings
- New Du'as added  - Du'a Jawshane Kabeer, Du'a Abu Hamza Thomali, Du'a Mujeer
- Eid-ul-Fitr Section within app
- Transliteration section
- Ability to view videos on the app
- Can customize the app using the settings (i.e. View Arabic, Transliteration, font size, and more)
- Can view Full Du'a OR Line By Line (configurable via settings)
- Sharing options 
- Landscape and portrait compatibility 
- Bookmarking and much more!

Title: iDuas - Thursday
Description: This app contains some of the recommended acts to be performed on Thursdays such as Dua Kumail, Ziyarat Waritha, Sura Yasin and Sura Insan.  The app contains the Arabic text along with the English Translation. In addition, a brief overview of each item can be read.  A special feature in this app is the ability to download MP3s which can be listened to while you read the Dua/Sura.  You can also specify which Sura/Dua you want and customize to your choice.

Title: idézet.hu - Idézetek magyarul
Description:
Válaszd ki kedvenceid több, mint 19.000 db-os, folyamatosan bővülő idézetgyűjteményünkből!

Állíts be motiváló napi értesítő idézeteket és lendülj túl napjaid nehézségein!

Keresd ki kedvenc szerelmes idézeteid és oszd meg pároddal barátaiddal!

Folyamatos új funkciók, rendkívül könnyen használható alkalmazás!

Title: iELECT-INDIA
Description:
iElect - Awareness national initiative, aims to raise the level of political awareness among citizens and their involvement in political life, as well as to educate citizens and guide them in all Indian elections (The Parliamentary Elections, Legislative Assembly Elections and Municipality Elections), in terms of spreading the definitions of the electoral law, introduce all the candidates in each constituency and keep the citizens up to date with the latest news and updates regarding the elections of India.

Elect represents a point of communication between the citizen and the democratic process in India and aims to increase citizen participation in the political process and decision-making.

The main goal of this initiative is encourage participation in the elections and tackle the lack of understanding of the election process amidst Indians.

Title: iEman
Description:
iEman aims at making the readership of the Holy Quran convenient and to promote the same so that mankind can understand the message for humanity contained in this Book.

iEman has been designed with a user friendly reading interface where you can not only easily access any portion of Quran e Kareem but also be able to set preferences according to your own reading habits. This includes options for selection of font size and translation language. Other activities that you can perform in the app are described as follows:

• You can easily access any of the 30 Paras, 114 Surahs and respective verses (Ayah)
• Translation is provided in Urdu and English languages to facilitate as many people around the world
• Using Keyword search, users can access required sections of the Quran quickly and easily
• You can also add Bookmarks to Aayahs that you want to remember or read at a later time
• iEman also allows you to share your favourite parts of the Quran with your loved ones on various platforms such as Whatsapp, Facebook and SMS
• In addition to reading Quran e Kareem, you can also watch live streaming of iEman channel which aims to promote the true spirit of Islam by building bridges between communities and nations

iEman has been developed to work on all IOS phones.

Title: iFerret Pet Care
Description:
Ferrets are small members of the weasel family that have been domesticated for more than two thousand years. These energetic little bundles of curiosity are a big responsibility, often requiring as much, if not more, care than a cat or dog.

However, if you are truly ready to bring a ferret into your home the rewards will quickly become obvious to you and your family.  Ferrets are adorable, high-energy pets that do best in small groups. Discover our tips and advice for caring for ferrets as pets.  

This app is designed to help owners discover the wonders of ferrets and learn the best methods of caring for them.  It includes the following information:

1.  Ferret care
2.  Ferret diet
3.  Ferret lodging
4.  Ferret fun facts
5.  Ferret gallery of amazing ferrets

As ferrets become more and more popular as pets, it is important that owners understand the best way to take care of them so they can be long-term family members.

Title: iFlash1000 - English Japanese Chinese learning card
Description:
iFlash1000 - Trilingual Flash Card ~ Japanese/Chinese/English~


497 images were added to iFlash1000 with trilingual narration for each images.
Flash has a meaning of "blink" and "Flash card" is a way you can study in a blink.

It is NOT a way of studying which let you listen to explanations for each of thing to memorize something.
It is a way of studying which stimulates your visual and auditory senses and activate your right brain to let you memorize things naturally.
It is hard to utter words on cards which changes one after another.

Especially when it is a foreign language, it doesn't work well unless you are the native speaker of the language.
iFlash1000 make it possible.

Everyone can learn anytime anywhere



Get iFlash1000, open it and choose a narration from menu -Japanese, Chinese, or English- Then start the app by tapping an icon of your favorite genre.
Now enjoy learning with great background music... :)

Title: jcsu
Description:
Journal of Central South University(ISSN 2095-2899, CN 43-1516/TB)  is a comprehensive academic English journal, administrated by the Ministry of Education of China, sponsored by Central South University, and jointly published by Central South University and Springer. It was founded in November 1994, published semi-yearly in 1995-1999, quarterly in 2000-2004, bimonthly in 2005-2011, and  monthly from 2012.
The Journal is mainly devoted to publishing academic papers and reports that are of creativeness and present the latest achievement of scientific research in such fields as geology, mining, metallurgy, materials, chemistry and chemical engineering, mechatronics, information, construction, traffic, transportation and environment. The columns of the Journal include: Materials Science and Engineering, Metallurgy, Chemistry and Chemical Engineering; Mechanical Engineering, Control Science and Information Engineering; Energy and Power Engineering, Environmental Engineering and Mine Engineering; Engineering; Geological Engineering, Civil Engineering, Traffic and Transportation Engineering.

--

You start with your own problem, and it'll work with you like a good math tutor - it'll ask a lot of questions, give you hints and lead you to the solution - so that you understand what's going on.  Where it makes sense, it'll also draw graphs and charts.  

- Xmath.ai's Teach Me! will solve your problems using first principles, without formulas, assuming the least amount of pre-requisite knowledge. This ensures that you will understand the necessary fundamentals over time.  

- Xmath.ai's Teach Me! will quickly make you realize your strengths and weaknesses at a personal level, so you know what to work on.  

- With a monthly subscription, you get Unlimited Teach Me! problem-solving sessions.

- $2.99 monthly

The fine print 

Free trial of one month is offered.  Prices may vary by location.  After the free period, your credit card in iTunes will be charged. Subscriptions will be charged to your credit card through your iTunes account. Your subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Manage your subscriptions in Account Settings after purchase.

Title: jlpt kanji book study (N1-N5)
Description:
This application will help you study the Kanji for the Japanese Language Proficiency Tests (JLPT), level N5, N4, N3, N2 and N1 (N5 being the easiest and N1 the hardest). The split of old N2 into N3 (and new N2 set) is not officially defined and thus up to interpretation.

It also includes the KANJI for level N1 to N5. Note that N3 is subject to interpretation and N3 presented here is an estimation. N2 also contains the N3 subset.

This means that it covers roughly 8 500 words and 2000 kanji. Great care has been taken to reduce the repetition of words in the more advanced levels if they occur in the previous levels.

For each kanij level common kanji compunds are listed to help understand the meaning of the kanij. A kanji is mostly used in combination with other kanjis to make up words. This is something that often is overlooked but is very important to study.

The JLPT (日本語能力試験 nihongo nōryoku shiken) is a standardized test for evaluating the Japanese language proficiency for non-japanese. 

The word lists have been screened and corrected by a native Japanese, 作道敦子, with over 2500 corrections and 2000 added level 1 compounds.

The study mode is based on interval as this will effectively reinforce your long term memory of the words. 

The interval study will increase the time until next study for a word for each time the word is marked as known. If a word is not known, its score will be reduced and you will have to study it more often until its score has been restored. This makes you focus on words not yet memorized.

Remember, even if your goal is not to pass the JLPT, you still can learn tons of new Japanese words to use in your everyday life.

It is based on the long novels that best represent the achievements of an era's literary achievements, and comprehensively reflects the best achievements of other genres such as short stories, poems, prose, drama, and fables. Title: jokes 1tucan
Description:
Who doesn’t like a good laugh? Well, now you can get one every day for FREE with Joke of the Day – Jokes. Save your favorites, submit some of your own side-splitters, and share the fun with friends on Facebook and Twitter. Click “…More” to learn why you should download this hilarious App today!
 
*** *** *** *** *** *** 
*** WHAT PEOPLE ARE SAYING ***
*** *** *** *** *** *** 

-“As a long-time practitioner, I thought that I'd heard all jokes. A must have!” - Eafitedu

-"It could never be better!this is the joke app that has ever been made I strongly recommend that all people dowload it"-  Mark

-"very very funny---I love this app"- John

-" It is so funny, that I was rolling on the floor, my ribs now aching and I was not able breathe!!" ~ Gorgy



*** *** *** *** *** *** 
*** * * * * WHY?  ******* 
*** *** *** *** *** *** 

You’ve had a stressful day, you sure could use a good laugh to release the tension and relax. That’s kind of hard to do though, because you’re still at work. The boss frowns on you kicking off your shoes, putting your feet up on the desk and leaning back in your chair. Still, things have been really hectic all day with one problem after another. You need to do something or you’ll go crazy and start snapping at people.
 
Suddenly, it occurs to you. You already have the perfect answer sitting right there on your iPhone! Slipping unnoticed away from your work station, you open up Joke of the Day – Jokes to finally get that stress relief you need so badly. A chuckle turns into a quiet laugh, which quickly becomes louder as you think of the daily joke again. Careful, someone might hear you! It’s a good joke though, you have to share it.
 
*** *** *** *** *** *** 
*** AMAZING FEATURES ***
*** *** *** *** *** *** 

-With just a tap or two, you post the joke on Facebook and Twitter for your friends to find. You also email it to Jim in Accounting – he’s been going nuts with year-end stuff, and send it by SMS to Fred in shipping. He could really use a good laugh, too. Feeling much better, you duck back into your office and resume your day, that tightness gone from your temples.
 
-You are going to love Joke of the Day. It’s a fun, free application for people just like you, who enjoy a laugh and love to share jokes with family and friends.
 
-Whether it’s a short joke, pokes at ‘yo mama’, funnies about blondes, feminists, or men, these hilarious, side-splitting quips will lighten your mood, provide a great start or finish to every day, and help keep you healthy. You know what they say about laughter being the best medicine. Nice thing is, Joke of the Day has no nasty after-taste.
 
 
-Don’t forget to share when you find a real knee-slapper. The app makes it super-easy to post jokes to Facebook and Twitter, so go ahead and spread the fun with your favorite social network, SMS tool, or by email.

Title: koopl
Description:
Children learn in different ways. While many are ok with learning from reading books, some children will learn far better from visual, auditive and/or tactile impulses.

Also, statistics show that in class settings 7 out of 10 pupils show little or no activity at all.

koopl is a game/method that offers learning by visual, auditive and tactile means, and will also let children/kids learn (from) each other, thus lowering the threshold for active (oral) participation.

koopl is aimed at maths, geography, biology and natural sciences, for coupling terms with their meaning. (Please see example file enclosed.)

Frequent repetition through playing will help establish terms and knowledge in what the Nobel Prize Winner Daniel Kahneman refers to as "System 1" (and also in "System 2", depending on a whole range of factors).

koopl helps the children and kids establish this knowledge and understanding of terms in maths, geography, biology and natural sciences - by playing with, talking to and interacting with their friends and fellow pupils.

Title: koptischekerkeindhoven
Description:
koptischekerkeindhoven 
كنيسة الملاك ميخائيل والانبا أنطونيوس أيندهوفن - هولندا 
Church of the Archangel Mikhail and St. Antony HOLLAND
+++
This App was developed by Ashraf Philip, deacon in de Coptic Orthodox Church of the Archangel Mikhail and St. Antonius the Great., Eindhoven - The Netherlands, for the members of the church but also for all the members of the Coptic churches of the Bishopric of the Netherlands. It is in three languages, Dutch, Coptic and Arabic.
It contains information, news, pictures, church songs, church books and rituals in the three languages were possible otherwise in two languages. It is directly connected to the website and Facebook page of the church and also with COPTIC.
It is under the supervision of bishop Arseny, bishop of the Netherlands and father Youssef Mansour Hegoemen of the church. 
+++
Deze App is ontwikkeld door Ashraf Philip, diaken in de Koptisch Orthodoxe Kerk van de Aartsengel Mikhail en St. Antonius abt, te Eindhoven - Nederland,  voor de leden van de kerk maar ook voor de leden van alle Koptische kerken van het Bisdom NEDERLAND. Het is in het Nederlands, Koptisch en Arabische talen.
De App bevat informatie, nieuws, foto’s, kerkgezang, kerkboeken en riten in de drie talen waar mogelijk, anders altijd in twee talen. De App is direct verbonden met de website en de Facebook-pagina van de kerk van Eindhoven en ook met de Tv-zender KOPTISCHE. 
De App is uitgegeven onder auspiciën van zijne eminentie anba Arseny, bisschop van Nederland en pastoor Youssef Mansour, hegumen van de kerk.

Title: körkort nu Arabiska شوركورت
Description:
هذا التطبيق من أفضل التطبيقات الموجودة حاليا في مجال رخصة القيادة في السويد. يتميز التطبيق بالسهولة الكبيرة في الإستعمال و الفائدة التعليمية العالية في لاوائح المرور و قواعد حركة السير طبقاً للقوانين السويدية. كما يستهدف التطبيق بدرجة أولى الناطقين باللغة العربية في جميع أنحاء السويد و الراغبين في الحصول على رخصة القيادة وفقا للوائح المرور السويدية.

التطبيق يحتوي على أكثر من 2000 سؤال من الأسئلة المتكررة بشدة ا في الأسئلة النظرية في امتحانات وزارة النقل السويدية، موزعة على مجموعات من مكونة من 30 سؤال لكل إمتحان منهما. حتى أنه يحتفظ بتتبع الامتحانات الخاصة بك ويحفظ الإجابات الخاطئة لتتمكن من تصحيحها في محاولات جديدة.

رخصة القيادة، السويد، العربية، نظري، علامات، اختبار ذاتي، اسئلة، إمتحانات، نماذج، مدرسة لتعليم قيادة السيارات، السويدية، تعلم، التعليم، مساعدة، على الانترنت، الوقت، أسئلة، الدروس، السيارات، الخاص، حركة المرور، الكحول.

Title: laChiesa.it
Description:
Questa applicazione permette di leggere la Liturgia del giorno, la Liturgia delle ore e la Sacra Bibbia dal portale.
http://www.lachiesa.it.
Tutti i contenuti che troverete nell'applicazione sono una gentile concessione dei proprietari del portale, che si riservano il diritto di continuare ad elargire o sospendere il servizio in qualsiasi momento.
L'applicazione è di facile utilizzo.
Cliccando su "Parola del giorno" sarete portati nella sezione del giorno corrente ma a sinistra trovate i giorni adiacenti disponibili che potrete consultare. (Potrete anche ascoltare il Vangelo del giorno selezionato).
Cliccando su "Liturgia delle ore" viausalizzerete la liturgia delle dell'ora corrente, ma sempre nel menù a sinistra trovate tutte la altre sezioni del giorno (Lodi, Ufficio delle Letture, etc.) oppure potrete spostarvi sui giorni adiacenti.
Cliccando su Bibbia avrete a disposizione tutta la Sacra Scrittura in cui potrete fare delle ricerche sia per citazione che per Parola o Frase.
In tutte le sezioni potrete aggiustare la visione del testo con 2 touchs consecutivi sullo stesso, se poi il testo risultasse troppo piccolo o troppo grande, potrete usare i bottoni Z.-in o Z.-out per aggiustarlo.
I tasti Avanti e Indietro vi permetteranno di navigare tra le pagine visitate.
E' necessario essere connessi ad Internet per vedere le pagine, quindi se non avete disponibile una connessione Wi-Fi o una Connessione dati riceverete un messaggio di errore.
Buona lettura della Parola di Dio.

Title: learn new concept English with full text Japanese translate dictionary free HD
Description:
『新コンセブト標準アメリカ英語』は強い｢点読｣｢点訳｣効能があり、文中の｢すべての単語｣に、正真正銘に｢どこがわからないなら押して分かれる｣、英語勉強の不可欠のツ ールである。

『英日全文辞典』の詳しい内容は以下のように:
全文辞典はマルチメディア＋辞典の組合である。英語の勉強に大きい手伝いがある。マルチメディア図書のすべてのセンテンスは標準的な肉声発音、英日対照があり 、マルチメディア図書の中のすべての英語単語は詳しい解釈、音標、発音と例句用法などがある、閲覧しているうちにただ軽くおして調べることができる。全文辞典は英語勉 強者に私の知らない単語、私の収集、単語テストと言う三つの功能を提供している。ユーザーは知らない単語を私の知らない単語に入れ、好きな課程を私の収集に入れ、関係 ある単語がテストされるのにすることができる。閲覧しているうちに、ユーザーが覚えやすいように全文辞典はすべての＜私の知らない単語＞を特別の色で表示されることに する。ユーザーが把握しやすいように、全文辞典は英語学習者に進度管理、時間管理を提供する。どんな本でも、どんな過程でも、どんな新出単語でも勉強進度と勉強時間 がある。全文辞典は完全にスタントアローンで運行され、インタネットに連絡しない。ネット費用の心配はいらないのである。

Title: learn Spanish, Portuguses, Japanese, Chinese, korean, English, French, Itlian and other languages with LingoMaster
Description:
LingoMaster is an automated learning platform based on brain science. 
Learn languages more easy and fast.

Select the language you use (first language) and the language you would like to learn. 
Download the Unit and set your Daily Goal to start the lesson.

Interval repetition algorithm support easy memorization!
It exposes unfamiliar items more often,
and exposes familiar times less often.

It helps you not to forget things you have memorized.
People usually forget things that they have memorized once as time passes.
It calculates the review cycle based on the level, and conducts the exam right before things are probably forgotten.

Imagine with animated pictures and photographs.
It recurs much better, under the dual-coding theory.

Have fun studying with quiz! 
There are various types of tests prepared.

We can send you notification based on the review cycle so that you won't forget what you learned.

Title: leoCMN
Description:
Con la aplicación leoCMN podrás tener en préstamo libros electrónicos disponibles en la
plataforma de préstamo digital del Campus Mare Nostrum, accediendo desde cualquier
lugar las 24 horas del día, siete días a la semana. 

Para utilizar esta aplicación deberásser usuario de la Universidad de Murcia o la Universidad de Politécnica de Cartagena. Si tienes problemas con la autenticación contacta con tu biblioteca. Desde la app podrás navegar por el catálogo, realizar préstamos y reservas, leer online y descargar libros para leer sin conexión a internet. 

Podrás cambiar a tu gusto el formato de lectura, el tipo y tamaño de la fuente, además de ajustar el brillo, el interlineado, subrayar el texto y realizar notas. Puedes enlazar varios dispositivos diferentes, iniciando la lectura en cualquiera de ellos y continuando en otro diferente retomándola en el punto exacto en que la habías dejado.

Title: les histoires des prophétes en Français
Description:
Avant de parler de la série des histoires des prophètes, j’aimerais faire une petite introduction pour clarifier la raison pour laquelle j’ai choisi d’évoquer ce passé qui date de plus de trois mille ans. En fait, il faut rappeler que le tiers du Coran et un bon nombre de ses versets portent sur les histoires des prophètes. Ceci nous conduit à nous interroger : pourquoi tant de versets ont pour sujet les histoires des prophètes quel en est l’objectif? Et c’est dans cette introduction que je chercherai à énumérer ces buts.

les histoires des prophétes
Il est obligatoire de croire à tous les Messagers, notamment à : Adam, Idris, Noé, Hûd, Çâlih, Loth, Abraham, Ismaël, Isaac, Jacob, Joseph, Chu'ayb, Job, DûI-Kifl, Moïse, Aaron , David, Salomon, Élie, Élisée, Jonas, Zacharie, Jean-Baptiste, Jésus, Muhammad

Title: librAR
Description:

Ha a kamerát egy ilyen képekkel nyomtatott könyv lapjára, egy képre irányítjuk, a kijelzőn a kép helyén egy virtuális tartalom jelenik meg. Az erre alkalmas könyvekben a librAR használatáról tájékoztató található. Az alkalmazás könyvkatalógusa AR alapú borítókép-felismerés alapján bővebb információkat ad az olvasóknak a könyvvel kapcsolatban.

Bemutató tartalom a következő linken érhető el: http://librar.hu/librar-prospektus.pdf

Title: literaTOUR Goethe-Institut
Description:
“LiteraTOUR” propõe um passeio por histórias clássicas e curiosidades alemãs para treinar o alemão e se divertir!

Em “LiteraTOUR”, quatro histórias – inspiradas em Fausto, A Canção de Hildebrando, Rei Rother e A Metamorfose – são contadas e recombinadas de acordo com as escolhas de cada leitor, criando situações engraçadas e até mesmo bizarras. São mais de sessenta combinações possíveis!

Criação do Goethe-Institut São Paulo em parceria com a StoryMax, “LiteraTOUR” está disponível em alemão e em português, para divertir e ensinar sobre a língua e a cultura alemãs.

Em cada tela, leitura em voz alta, efeitos de som, animação e interatividade engajam os leitores, ajudam a aprender a pronúncia e a escrita e revelam curiosidades e atualidades da Alemanha com muito bom humor.

Seu feedback é importante para nós!

Aguardamos suas sugestões e opiniões em info@saopaulo.goethe.org

Para mais dicas e novidades, siga-nos:

Facebook – http://www.facebook.com/goethebr

Title: madReader
Description:
Book tracking for the serious high-volume Reader. Share lists of books with friends via airdrop or email. Make lists to organize your books. Use madReader across devices. It’s simple to share book links, covers, and lists via social media, text, or email. 
madReader is optimized for readers of Sci-Fi/Fantasy, Romance YA and Mystery/Suspense. If you are someone who reads so many books a month and can’t remember what the title was (but you can remember that there was a grumpy hero) — then this app is for you.
Our login system ensures your data is backed up and instantly syncs across multiple devices.

Rapidly search on custom tags, status or tropes to find a book. Enter books that you hear about so you can remember to buy them later. Our sort options allow you to visually sort through your books using assigned status, date read, author, rating and title.
Check your stats on our Stats page. Get a rapid overview of major data points such as the monthly number of books read, your top genre and sub-genre, your top five authors, and more! You can share your stats page to social media so people can see what a madReader you are!

Each book allows tags so you can set tags that help you find books easily. Tag a book “Evil Villain” and “Scottish,” you can effortlessly search for either of those tags and display the results in the main view.Type your short review into the notes area for each book so you can later copy and paste into whatever site you use to post reviews. Great for book clubs, book vloggers and bloggers.Best of all, madReader is free to use.

Title: mameTxt
Description:
'mameTxt' is a tiny and simple text reader for Apple Watch. 
'mame' means 'tiny beans' in Japanese, and in 'Book' context, it also means 'miniature'. 
Apple Watch may be the best miniature book by 21st century technology. 

To read text files on Apple Watch, please take following 2 steps: 
1. Copy text files to iOS app via iTunes file sharing, or import from iCloud Drive
2. On iOS app, swipe a file and tap 'Sync' to transfer it to Watch

On Watch app, chose file to read. It supports also:
- Page View mode
- Audio Book (Text to Speech) mode
- Auto Flip or Shuffle mode

Enjoy newest comfortable miniature book reading on your Apple Watch!

Title: maneno
Description:
Maneno er Danmarks sjoveste læseapp, hvor børnene får ubegrænset adgang til alle deres yndlingsbøger. App'en motiverer og gør det sjovt for børn at læse og fungerer som et perfekt supplement til læseundervisningen i skolen. Børnene kan få hjælp undervejs, hvis de støder på svære ord eller sætninger og Maneno kan således bruges til at udfordre barnet til at læse svære bøger end de normalt ville læse. Som forældre kan man følge sit barns læseaktivitet og få indsigt i læseudviklingen.

Køber du abonnement til Manenos læseapp, skal du være opmærksom på følgende:

- Du køber abonnement til Maneno på månedsbasis. Abonnementet dækker adgang til Maneno i 1 måned og fornys automatisk.
- Abonnement bliver trukket fra din iTunes konto efter, at du har bekræftet købet af tjenesten.
- Abonnementet fornys automatisk med mindre du har slået automatisk fornyelse fra senest 24 timer før udløbet af den indeværende abonnementsperiode.
- Din konto bliver automatisk fornyet 24 timer inden udløbet af den indeværende abonnementsperiode.
- Abonnementet kan administreres og automatisk fornyelse kan slås fra i dine kontoindstillinger efter køb.
- Hvis du har accepteret en gratis periode bortfalder den gratis prøveperiode ved køb af et abonnement.

Du kan læse mere om abonnementsbetingelserne på http://maneno.dk/terms.html

Title: maneno parent
Description:
I Maneno Parent kan du opsætte læsedage og -tid og holde styr på den daglige læsning. Vi gør det muligt for dig at følge dit barns læseudvikling og i Maneno Parent kan du tilkøbe abonnement til Manenos læseapp for et eller flere børn.

For at få adgang til Maneno Parent skal du have oprettet dig på vores hjemmeside eller i læse app'en.

Køber du abonnement til Manenos læseapp igennem Maneno Parent, skal du være opmærksom på følgende:

- Abonnementet fornys automatisk med mindre du har slået automatisk fornyelse fra senest 24 timer før udløbet af den indeværende abonnementsperiode.
- Din konto bliver automatisk fornyet 24 timer inden udløbet af den indeværende abonnementsperiode. 
- Abonnementet kan administreres og automatisk fornyelse kan slås fra i dine kontoindstillinger efter køb.
- Hvis du har accepteret en gratis periode bortfalder den gratis prøveperiode ved køb af et abonnement.

Du kan læse mere mere om abonnementsbetingelserne på http://maneno.dk/terms.html

Title: mCOBISS
Description:
mCOBISS - Virtualna knjižnica Slovenije na mobilnih napravah

mCOBISS je mobilnim napravam prilagojena različica COBISS/OPAC-a in dopolnjuje Virtualno knjižnico Slovenije z večjo razpoložljivostjo in dostopnostjo e-storitev, ki jih ponuja sistem COBISS.

Poiščite in rezervirajte knjigo, e-knjigo, revijo, časopis, DVD.
Podaljšajte rok izposoje in preglejte zgodovino izposoj.
Poglejte, kaj berejo drugi.
Odčitajte črtno kodo knjige ali revije za takojšnje iskanje.
Izdelajte si seznam priljubljenih knjig in ga delite z drugimi.
Poglejte lokacijo knjižnice na zemljevidu in navodila za izračun poti do knjižnice.
Identificirajte se v knjižnici na osnovi črtne kode na zaslonu mobilne naprave.

Mobilna aplikacija mCOBISS izkorišča prednosti sodobnih telefonov in tablic, kar daje COBISS/OPAC-u povsem nove dimenzije!



mCOBISS – Virtual library of Slovenia on mobile devices

mCOBISS is a mobile version of COBISS/OPAC, which complements the Virtual library of Slovenia with greater availability and accessibility of e-services provided by the COBISS.SI system.
    
Find and reserve books, journals, newspapers, DVDs.
Renew loan period and view loan history.
See what other people are reading.
Scan the barcode of a book or journal for immediate searching.
Make a list of your favourite books and share it.
Check library location on the map and get directions on how to get there.
Use barcode on the mobile device screen for identification purposes in the library. 

The mCOBISS mobile application is designed for smartphones and tablets, which adds a new dimension to COBISS/OPAC!

Title: meclib
Description:
meclibアプリは、デジタルブック作成システム「meclib」で作成されたデジタルブックを、iPhone/iPadで快適に閲覧することができるアプリです。

●My本棚に保存すれば、オフラインでの閲覧が可能！
デジタルブックをアプリの「My本棚」にダウンロードしておけば、電波状況などを気にせず快適に閲覧できます。

●大容量データでも快適にダウンロード！
大量のデジタルブックをMy本棚へ保存する場合、ネットワーク経由だと多くの時間が必要となります。
そんな時はiPhone/iPadをPCに接続して、iTunesから時間をかけず簡単にMy本棚へ保存できます。

●デジタルブックの更新を速やかにお知らせ！
クラウド上のデジタルブックが更新されると、My本棚に保存した対象のデジタルブックに対し更新マークでお知らせします。
※iTunesから保存したブックは対象外です。

●企業が提供しているデジタルブックを閲覧！
「企業ライブラリ」を利用すれば、企業が提供しているデジタルブックをまとめて閲覧、ダウンロードすることができます。
※企業が企業ライブラリとしてデジタルブックを配信している場合に限ります。

【アプリの使い方】 -  -  -  -  -  -  -  -  -  -  -  -  -  -

1.まずはデジタルブックを表示
デジタルブックは以下の2通りの方法で表示することができます。
・企業がWebサイトで公開しているブックをSafari経由で表示
・企業ライブラリから企業検索を行い、企業が配信しているブックをアプリ経由で表示
※企業ライブラリから「demo」と入力して検索すればサンプル用のデジタルブックをご覧いただけます。

2.ブックデータのダウンロード
Safariまたはアプリ経由でダウンロードされたデジタルブックはMy本棚に登録されていきます。

3.ブックの閲覧
My本棚に登録されたブックはオフライン、オンラインどちらでも閲覧が可能です。
オンライン環境の場合、保存したブックに更新があった場合は更新マークが表示されます。

4.お気に入り機能
オンライン環境で閲覧したブックをお気に入りに登録しておけば、次からは手軽に参照できます。

Title: medhochzwei Bibliothek
Description:
"medhochzwei Bibliothek" ist die kostenlose Begleit-App zur medhochzwei-Onlinebibliothek, über die Sie auf Ihre abonnierten medhochzwei-Onlineprodukte direkten Zugriff haben – auch offline von unterwegs. 

Die wichtigsten fünf Gründe, die App noch heute zu installieren:
• Schnell und genau: Durch die Such-Funktion sparen Sie sich die umständliche manuelle Suche und gelangen in ein paar Sekunden zu den wichtigen Stellen.
• Einfach und individuell: Die Notizfunktion ermöglicht es, wichtige Dinge als Notiz zu speichern und so bei der nächsten Nutzung wieder zur Verfügung zu haben.
• Unkompliziert: Im Gegensatz zum Zugriff auf die Onlinebibliothek über Safari haben Sie mit der App eine iOS-optimierte Darstellung der Inhalte, was die Nutzungserfahrung angenehm und komfortabel macht.
• Aktuell: Über jede Aktualisierung Ihrer Onlinewerke werden Sie umgehend informiert und können das Update direkt herunterladen.
• News: Alle tagesaktuellen medhochzwei-News direkt auf Ihrem Tablet oder Smartphone.

Hier die „Startaufstellung“ der Produkte, die über die App genutzt werden können:
•    Online-Handbuch Ambulante spezialfachärztliche Versorgung
•    Lexikon des deutschen Gesundheitssystems
•    Management Handbuch DRGplus
•    Management Handbuch Krankenhaus
•    Handbuch Integrierte Versorgung
•    Handbuch Kooperationen im Gesundheitswesen
•    Krankenhaus Rating Report 2012 
•    Krankenhaus Rating Report 2013
•    Krankenhaus Rating Report 2014
•    Management Handbuch Pflege
•    Management Handbuch für die psychotherapeutische Praxis
•    MHP Start – Management & Praxiswissen für PIAs und  Berufseinsteiger
•    Recht der Gesundheitsfachberufe, Heilpraktiker und sonstigen Berufen im Gesundheitswesen
•    Selbstständig im Gesundheitswesen
•    Normensammlung Gesundheitswesen (Bundesrecht, Landesrecht, Europarecht)

Title: mer
Description:
街の女の子たちが主役のいちばん身近なおしゃれのお手本帖。人気読者モデル達が今いちばん好きなファッション、ビューティなどのテクから、料理やカメラなどの趣味情報まで、毎月読者モデルの目線で紹介。毎日をハッピーに過ごすためのヒントが満載です。	

本アプリケーションはNewsstandに対応しています。
アプリは無料でダウロードできますが、コンテンツの購入は有料です。
コンテンツのダウンロードは、WiFi環境での接続を推奨いたします。

■定期購読の期間と料金
1ヶ月（自動更新）：600円
3ヶ月（自動更新）：1600円
6ヶ月（自動更新）：3000円
お支払いは、お客様のApple IDにて行われます。

■新刊の自動ダウンロード機能について
iOSの設定のアプリの「通知」と「Appのバックグラウンド更新」
をオンに設定すると、ライセンス期間中に新しいコンテンツが発行された際に
自動的に端末（本棚）にダウンロードされます。

■定期購読の自動更新と課金について
　購読は「自動継続更新」となります。購読期間が終了する24時間以内に、購読
が自動更新され、お客様のApple IDに課金されます。

■定期購読の設定の確認と自動更新の停止について
　ライセンス期間終了の24時間以上前に、お客様のアカウント設定画面から、自
動更新をオフにしていただくことで、ライセンスの自動更新を停止することがで
きます。
　自動更新の設定は、「設定」→「Store」→「Apple IDタップ」→「Apple IDを表
示からパスワードを入力」→購読の「管理」から行うことができます。

■定期購読のキャンセルについて
　定期購読期間中は、期間の変更やキャンセルをすることができません。

Title: microStory - micro lecture
Description:
Lisez gratuitement des dizaines de microStories écrites spécialement pour le mobile par des auteurs de talent.
1 step (épisode) par jour. 5 minutes de lecture. Passionnante et adaptée au rythme de notre vie d'aujiourd'hui microStory c'est la littérature réinventée pour notre monde digital.
Fonctionne en mode off-line. Déblocage des microStories possible par in-app purchase.


Abonnement microStory illimité :
En cas d'abonnement à microStory illimité, une somme de 4,99 € sera imputé à votre compte iTunes dès confirmation de l’achat. Il vous donnera accès à toutes les microStories sans délai.
Votre abonnement sera renouvelé automatiquement sauf si vous l’annulez plus de 24h avant la fin du mois en cours.
Vous pouvez annuler votre abonnement à tout moment dans les réglages de votre compte iTunes.
Le mois en cours sera débité intégralement.
Pour plus d’information :
Règles de confidentialité : https://www.microstory.fr/confidentialite
Conditions d’utilisation : https://www.microstory.fr/conditions

Title: miEbooks
Description:
miEbooks, developed by ITSI, is an interactive e-reader that enhances users’ reading and studying experience. The app enables users to add notes and sketches to specific sections of an e-book, make highlights, generate summaries from highlighted text for study purposes, receive additional multimedia resources, and more. Once downloaded, all books and resources are available offline and annotations are backed-up whenever users connect to the Internet or Wi-Fi within their institution. 

The miEbooks app is used by schools, tertiary institutions and corporate organisations for full-scale e-learning implementation, as well as individuals who are looking for a flexible and feature-rich e-book solution.

Title: miffy goes to school
Description:
Celebrate the vacation with miffy and her friends. Download now 'miffy's garden' and 'miffy goes flying' for £1,49 instead of the usual £2,49 until the 29th of July 2014.

Miffy at school: reading together, playing and learning 

Miffy is at school where she learns how to count and write, sing and draw. Can you draw a beautiful picture just like Miffy? Listen to the story and you will find out what to do. 
 
Miffy at school is the 3rd Miffy app for the iPhone, developed specifically for toddlers and pre-schoolers.  Very young children can enjoy listening and watching, while older children can take an active part in the story and games. 

Features 
• Third Miffy iPhone app! 
• For toddlers and pre-schoolers 
• Features the ‘Miffy at school’ story
• Interactive: listening and participating 
• Simple, fun and educational 
• Helps children with their reading 
• An educational game 

Interactive story 
• Based on the book ‘Miffy at school’ by Dick Bruna 
• Miffy is at school where she sings, counts, writes and draws. Can you draw a beautiful picture just like Miffy?
• Listening, watching, reading and participating 

Game  
• MEMORY: Would you like to play a memory game? Can you find the same pictures? If you find the right combination they will disappear from the screen.

Sanoma Media Netherlands b.v. developed this app in collaboration with Mercis b.v.

Title: miffy in the snow
Description:
Reading (aloud) together, playing and learning 

Hooray, it has been snowing! With her hat and boots on, Miffy can’t wait. Dress up warm and ride a sleigh with Miffy over the hills. Listen to the story and it will tell you what to do. 

Miffy in the snow is the 4th Miffy app for iPad, developed specifically for toddlers and pre-schoolers.  
Very young children can enjoy listening and watching while older children can participate more actively in the story and the games. Just like the other Miffy apps there is a special feature to record your own voice reading the story aloud. The story can be recorded by three different people. In this way, family members can read aloud at any given moment, even when they are not at home! 

Features 
• Fourth Miffy app! 
• For toddlers and pre-schoolers 
• ‘Miffy in the snow’ story 
• Interactive: listening and participating 
• Simple, fun and educational 
• Reading and reading out loud 
• Reading out loud and recording your voice 
• Playing games 

Interactive story 
• Based on the book ‘Miffy in the snow’ by Dick Bruna 
• Miffy can’t wait to go outside, because it has been snowing! Can you help her build a birdhouse for the bird that is out in the cold?  
• Listening, watching, reading and participating 
• Reading aloud: record your voice reading the story aloud. You can record a total of 3 voices. 

Playing and learning 
 • THROWING SNOWBALLS: Knock the hat off the snowman by throwing snowballs at it. The arrow shows you the direction in which you have to throw the snowball.  
• FIND A MATCHING PAIR: Find the matching pictures. Did you find the pair? When you do, they disappear from the screen.
• CREATE YOUR OWN E-CARD: Select the pictures and create your own design. Colour it in and send the illustration as an e-card. 
 
Sanoma Media Netherlands b.v. developed this app in collaboration with Mercis b.v.

Title: miki ebook - Mua tức thời, đọc mọi nơi
Description:
Xin chào Miki Pioneer. Cám ơn bạn đã cùng Miki và Tiki.vn tham gia xây dựng ứng dụng eBook với số lượng tựa sách truyện đa dạng, giao diện thân thiện và cách mua siêu tốc không cần đăng ký, giúp bạn thoả sức đọc truyện và sách bản quyền offline thật dễ dàng.
Những tính năng nổi bật của miki ebook - Mua tức thời, đọc mọi nơi:
- Kho truyện và sách dẫn đầu thị trường Việt Nam được bổ sung liên tục với những tác phẩm best-seller mới nhất.
- Tải truyện đọc offline ở mọi nơi mà không cần 3G hoặc wifi,
- Nhiều tựa sách hấp dẫn được miki tặng người đọc MIỄN PHÍ.
- Phong phú các thể loại như: Truyện Teen, Ngôn tình, tiên hiệp, kiếm hiệp, sách kĩ năng, truyện ngắn … từ các nhà xuất bản hàng đầu Việt Nam và cộng đồng mạng.
- Giao diện đơn giản dễ sử dụng.
Với hàng trăm tựa sách được cập nhật hàng ngày, bạn luôn có thể đọc quyển sách yêu thích tại bất cứ đâu với giao diện tối ưu cho mắt.
Các truyện và sách tiêu biểu:
- Sách best seller: Nhà Giả Kim, Tony Buổi Sáng – Trên Đường Băng, Totto-chan Bên Cửa Sổ, Chúng Ta Rồi Sẽ Ổn Thôi,  Đừng Bao Giờ Đi Ăn Một Mình …
- Tiểu thuyết ngôn tình của các tác giả: 
+ Cố Mạn: Bữa trưa tình yêu, Yêu em từ cái nhìn đầu tiên,… 
+ Đường Thất Công Tử: Tam sinh tam thế thập lý đào hoa, Chẩm thượng thư, Hoa tư dẫn,… 
+ Diệp Lạc Vô Tâm: Mãi mãi là bao xa, Động phòng hoa chúc cách vách, Ngủ cùng sói,… 
+ Trang Trang: Duyên kỳ ngộ, Phụ nữ thực tế đàn ông phát cuồng,...
+ Phỉ Ngã Tư Tồn: Hẹn đẹp như mơ, Không kịp nói yêu em…
- Truyện kinh dị của Hồng Nương Tử: Nghiệt oán tóc xanh, Quả cam luân hồi,....
- Các tác phẩm phiêu lưu giả tưởng nổi tiếng: Trò Chơi Vương Quyền, Mật Mã Phù Thủy,…
- Câu chuyện doanh nhân: Tiểu sử Steve Jobs, Lee Kun Hee – Những lựa chọn chiến lược và kỳ tích Samsung, Donald Trump – Chiến lược đầu tự bất động sản, Bill Gates – Tham vọng lớn lao và quá trình hình thành đế chế Microsoft, Henry Ford – Cuộc đời và sự nghiệp của tôi, Tào Tháo – Thánh nhân đê tiện…
- Bí quyết của các thương hiệu nổi tiếng: Coca Cola – Công thức tuyệt mật, Phương thức Toyota, IBM, Cuộc cách mạng Nokia…
- Những bài học kinh doanh đắt giá: Cuộc chiến trong phòng họp, Nhà lãnh đạo 360 độ, Điểm bùng phát, Túi khôn, Vượt qua khủng hoảng, Trên đỉnh phố Wall, Made in Japan,…

Title: miniRAINBOWS - Learn to Read
Description:
miniRAINBOWS - Learn to read, will provide you with a virtual library brimming with all manner of interactive, narrated storybooks and educational activities, for parents and young budding readers alike; learn, earn and discover the wonders of reading!

To encourage the learning and reading process, as kids read and play they are rewarded with virtual toys, that they can play within an "Augmented Reality" toybox mode. They can virtually augment their real environment with their own virtual toys.

Our mission is to educationally inspire kids during their most formative learning years, designing safe, handcrafted tools while using the latest in emerging technologies, and breaking down the barriers parents have traditionally faced in finding quality kids content. 

The free version of the app will provide a free book and two activities to enjoy, all of which will reward the user with virtual toys. Our subscription will provide full access to the entire miniRAINBOWS library.

What you will get
- 10 interactive narrated books. 
- a voice recording function to practice pronunciation
- 2 reading activities per book ( 22 activities in total! )
- dozens of virtual toys
- augmented reality toy box

Augmented Reality Toybox
Devices that do not support Apple ARKit will have a virtual 3d space to enjoy. Apple AR Kit is supported by the following models
- iPhone 6s and 6s Plus
- iPhone 7 and 7 Plus
- iPhone SE
- iPad Pro (9.7, 10.5 or 12.9) – both first-gen and 2nd-gen
- iPad (2017)
- iPhone 8 and 8 Plus
- iPhone X and XS, XR
- iPad Pro (2018)

SUBSCRIPTION PRICING AND TERMS
miniRAINBOWS - Learn to Read offers an auto-renewing subscription option:
$3.99 per month

This subscription will grant you access to our entire library of books and educational activities.

These prices are for United States customers. Pricing in other countries may vary and actual charges may be converted to your local currency depending on the country of residence.

The subscription will automatically renew unless turned off in your iTunes Account Settings at least 24 hours before the current period ends. You can go to your iTunes Account settings to manage your subscription and turn off auto-renew. Your iTunes Account will be charged when the purchase is confirmed. If you subscribe before your free trial ends, the rest of your free trial period will be forfeited as soon as your purchase is confirmed.

Read the terms and conditions here -

http://zippys-tales-privacy-policy.webflow.io/minirainbows-t-c

Read the privacy policy here -

http://zippys-tales-privacy-policy.webflow.io/

Title: mixPaper Viewer for iOS
Description:
* About mixPaper Viewer for iOS

"mixPaper Viewer for iOS" is an application which can read the digital book distributed with digital book service "mixPaper".
Please make the digital book or choose the digital book or purchase the digital book to read at the site of "mixPaper". 

* About recommended device

The recommended device is as follows.
The new iPad / iPad 2 / iPad / iPhone 5 / iPhone 4S / iPhone 4 / iPhone 3GS / iPod touch(3rd generation and later)
There is a possibility that operation doesn't operate slowly or normally when it is not recommended device.

* Feature

- Sales of inspection right

It is not the download sales.
The inspection right of the digital book is sold.
When buying it, the bought digital book can be inspected even with a different device.

- Bookmark

When the inspection of the digital book is stopped on the way, the bookmark is automatically set. 
The bookmark synchronizes between different devices.

- Temporary preservation

It has the function to preserve the digital book temporarily.
The digital book temporarily preserved can be inspected for ten days or less even in the state of off-line.
The period that can be inspected will be set again in ten days when becoming online.

* Notes

There is a digital book that cannot be inspected by "mixPaper Viewer for iOS".
In that case, please inspect it with Mac etc.

Title: mLibro
Description: mLibro is a useful app that allows you to download your educational content and eBooks from an online LMS and use them offline. You can select not only individual Learning Objects from your online courses but also assignments prepared for you by your teacher. After your device is connected again, all your results will be synced with your LMS account. Currently mLibro works with mCourser LMS.

Title: mojoreads
Description:
There are books you simply can’t put down once you opened them. They leave a lasting impression, they inspire and change us. These books have mojo! Mojoreads is about these books. 

Above all, reading pays off on mojoreads: Because every time someone discovers and buys a book because of a review you wrote or because of a recommendation you gave, you will automatically be rewarded with CREDITS you can use to buy books on mojoreads shop.

mojoreads combines community, reader and your personal library so that you are always in best company – be it alone with your favorite book or together with friends.

Purchases are currently not available in the iOS app, but your e-books are automatically synced to your app after purchase in our webshop.

- Our catalogue covers more than 12 million books, both physical editions and e-books (ePub).
- You may search for title, publisher, author, keyword and / or ISBN.
- You may filter for language, availability, edition and rating.
- Dynamic reading samples: Read up to 10% for free, no matter if you start at the very beginning, somewhere in between or at the last page!
- Leave private notes or public comments. All public comments will also be published on your timeline, so others can follow up – and you are never going to miss out on a discussion in your most favourite books.
- You may also share comments and discussions with individual groups – both public groups for everyone to join or private groups for you and your best friends.
- Get the full context: a click on a quote on your timeline takes you directly to the related passage inside the book! 
- Community: Connect with other readers, authors or publishers and share your reading experience!
- Private groups offer you a protected space if you prefer to read in private with some hand selected people.
- Sort your library with help of lists and inspire others with your collections!

Features of your personal profile:
- Choose a username and a profile photo – or pick an avatar.
- Link your social media profiles, your website or your blog.
- As a book professional you might want to use an imprint and give some contact details (which you can).
- Private lists help to sort your library.
- Public lists help to inspire others by showing what’s on your shelf.
- Set a reading status and let others know which books you have already read, what books you are currently reading and which books are still on your wish list.

Features of the Mojo Reader:
- Upload and read your own ePubs to mojoreads! (Attention: Adobe DRM is not supported!)
- The mojoreads cloud keeps bookmarks, private notes, and public comments automatically synced across devices – even on the web.
- Synchronization is also available in offline mode.
- Search the full text inside a book. 
- Adjustable font and font size. 
- Switch between justified and ragged style.  
- Early bird or night owl? There’s a day and a night mode for each. 
- Bookmarks help you to quickly to refind passages.
- Highlight and comment on text passages.
- Share quotes directly on social media.
- Navigable chapter overview.
- Reading progress bar.

Even though mojoreads aims for a public audience, the protection of your privacy is very important to us. We will never share any personal information or data with third parties. Rule of thumb: What is public is public. And what is private stays private.

Download the mojoreads app now and get started on your next favourite book!

Title: mozaBook
Description:
Fedezd fel digitális tankönyveid a mozaBook tablet alkalmazással is, így sokkal élvezetesebb és könnyebb lesz a tanulás. A beépített extra 3D animációs, videó, audió, vagy interaktív feladat megtekintéséhez kattints a margón található ikonokra, és élvezd a kalandozást!

Használd a mozaBook tablet alkalmazást a tanárod által kiküldött interaktív tartalom, feladat megtekintésére vagy az órai munkában való részvételre is! 
Az órán is megoldhatod a kiküldött feladatokat, és továbbíthatod azokat a tanárodnak, aki megtekintheti őket a mozaBook tanári alkalmazás segítségével. Az interaktív táblához tablettel vagy okostelefonnal is csatlakozhatsz, mindössze azonos wifi hálozaton kell lennie az eszközöknek. Amikor elkészültél, egyszerűen küldd vissza a kész feladatot a feladónak, hogy értékelhesse. Sima ügy!

Amennyiben az összes, mozaBook tabletben elérhető funkciót szeretnéd használni (pl. órai munka), fizess elő mozaWeb Premiumra a teljes körű felhasználói élményért.

További információért látogass el honlapunkra:
www.mozaweb.com


Use the mozaBook tablet app to view interactive content your teacher sends you or to participate in classwork. You can even explore your digital textbooks with the help of the app, which makes learning super fun and easy. To access the built-in extras, just tap the icons on the margins and enjoy!

Complete assignments in class with the help of mozaBook for tablet, and submit your answers via the application. You can use either a tablet or smartphone to connect to teacher’s interactive board, all you need is for all the devices to be on the same wifi network. When you are ready, simply forward the test to your teacher for evaluation. It’s a piece of cake!

To run all available features (e.g. classwork) in mozaBook for tablet, subscribe to mozaWeb Premium for the best user experience.

For more information on the mozaBook app, check out our website:
www.mozaweb.com

Title: mum&me
Description:
The mum&meAPP.....it's more than just an app!

Being a parent brings many brilliant and exciting things, but it can be extremely difficult to find the right product or service quickly, the mum&meAPP provides products a quick, pre-qualified resource of services to parents, at the precise time of you needing or wanting.

FEATURES
•	MUM: products and services just for you…because you deserve it.
•	ME: all the latest products and must have’s selected specially for your little ones.
•	HEALTH: you and your families health is important to us, working with the UKs main private hospitals means that the best consultants and treatments are never far away.
•	CHOICES: tailored to your requirements to help make life that little easier.
•	EXCLUSIVES: our FRIENDS have that something unique, that something special, that offer that should not be missed.
•	MIDWIFE BLOG: expert advice and reviews from our resident midwife.
•	SEARCH: The simple search allows you to find the perfect mum&meFRIEND who offers advice and delivers a truly personalised service.

For many expectant parents, preparing for the birth of a child can be a daunting experience. The mum&meAPP is specifically designed to connect parents to retailers, allowing prospective parents to find the right products or services quickly and easily. The mum&meAPP is there for the moments every expectant parent faces when looking for help.
Expectant parents can also discover ultrasound and birthing services, find private GP’s and gynaecologists. The mum&meAPP features products to see expectant parents through pregnancy and beyond, as well as wellness and pampering services and exclusive offers.

Title: my books library
Description:
MyBooks is the best app to display your own library in a list.
You can use the ISBN of the book to scan, or you can enter a book manually.

Get the data of your book from a global catalog (author, title, publication date, book covers and blurb )and story it in your own database.

You can enter your personal rating to each book or each author, so you still know after years how you liked the book. Likewise, you can add in a memo field a comment on the book.
You can add a location (f. e. living room, bedroom ...) , where your book is stored.
You can sort the list by author, title or rating.
You can view the list in different formats Export: CSV: Numbers, Excel, PDF.
Backup your data to iCloud, so you can manage your data on all your devices.

Title: myDua: Hisnul Muslim, Daily Prayers
myExplor-eBook
Description:
Created by Teachers, for Teachers, Caregivers, and Students, myExplor-eBook is a FREE app designed to engage students of all ages in reading high-interest books with interactive components. myExplor-eBook subscription users can download the app and log in to use their content immediately.

myExplor-eBook provides subscription access to a library of more than 500 fiction and nonfiction books that are leveled, aligned to appropriate standards, and cover subjects such as science, mathematics, and social studies. This app allows you to quickly and easily download books on your iPad so you can read them anywhere! This wide variety of books is from the award-winning publisher Teacher Created Materials.

Books available for download with myExplor-eBook include a variety of engaging features—professionally recorded audio, interactive tools, comprehension activities, a voice recorder, and videos. The inclusion of interactive activities means that students will read and reread the books, testing their knowledge with comprehension activities and word work activities!

For schools and districts, myExplor-eBook is ideal for engaging students in a variety of text structures, enhancing intervention programs, and building classroom, school, and district libraries. myExplor-eBook enables educators to meet the standards for reading appropriately complex and informational texts while building 21st century skills.

For parents and caregivers, myExplor-eBook is a fun, interactive reading tool that is educational and will keep children engaged while reading to better support reading development and progress in school.

Title: myfan.ai for 조아라
Description:
myfan.ai는 웹소설 작가님들을 위한 독자 피드백 통합 모니터링 서비스입니다.

1. 독자 코멘트 긍·부정 분석 타임라인
여러 작품의 모든 코멘트를 모아 한꺼번에 보여주기 때문에 편리하게 코멘트를 확인할 수 있습니다.
악플 가능성이 높은 코멘트를 인공지능과 금칙어 사전에 의해 자동으로 필터링 되어 푸시 메시지로 전송되지 않고 화면에서 블라인드 처리됩니다.

2. 실시간 푸시 알람 전송
작가의 작품에 코멘트가 달리거나 독자피드백 활동이 발생하면 푸시 메시지가 전송되어 독자의 반응을 바로 확인 할 수 있습니다.

3. 내 작품 별/회차 별 실시간 모니터링
작가의 작품을 지난 1시간 동안 독자들이 읽은 횟수를 실시간으로 집계하여 보여줍니다.

4. 독자 피드백 타임라인
작품에 대해 일어난 독자들의 피드백 활동(선작/추천/후원)을 모아서 보여줍니다.

현재는 웹소설 대표업체인 조아라와 제휴 중이며 조아라 작가만 사용 가능합니다.

제안 및 문의 사항은 myfan.ai@braincolla.com으로 보내주시기 바랍니다.

감사합니다.

Title: myLIM
Description:
MyLIM - "My interactive e-book" is the new e-book reader by Loescher editore that allows
students and teachers to enjoy digital school texts and the interactive resources linked to them.
Users can login the reader with the same account registered on the on-line platform
Imparosulweb, and download the books they have purchased on-line or activated by using the
proper code printed on the book.
Thanks to a simple and intuitive interface, myLIM provides many features in order to easily surf
within the text pages and to add a variety of customizations such as graphics, notes, and links to
web pages. The digital book is also enriched by interactive resources, audio, video files and other
extra materials complementary to school texts.
Main features compared to the previous version of the reader (miaLIM):
• New interface layout to ensure immediate access to all functionalities 
• Easy and fast text browsing
• Additional customization tools
• Interactive resources and media files at hand, organized in separated tabs
• Full integration with the extra contents of Imparosulweb

Title: myON
Description:
Description:

The myON app provides access to digital books from myON reader, a personalized, online literacy program that matches student’s interests and their reading level to a recommended book list. With over 5500 enhanced digital books with reading supports, students have access to all types of books and topics that will entice them to continue reading. Using the app, students can link their account to their school, and then read any book even when the Internet isn’t available.

 

Hear what students from across the country are saying:

·         John in Florida, “I get to choose what I want to read.”

·         Emilia in Illinois, “There are a lot of books for any age. You get to read as many books as you like because they keep adding books to your account.”

·         Sally in South Carolina, “I like to read on myON reader because it’s fun.”

·         Sam in Indiana, “When I forget my library book, I can still get books from myON reader.”

 

Hear what teachers and parents are saying about myON reader:

·         Teacher Mr. Newhouse, “This student is just one of many 6th graders at our school that have been sucked into myON after being reluctant. I have been amazed at how even the noisiest 6th grade classroom becomes silent and focused when myON is brought into play.”

·         Teacher Ms. Carnes: “myON makes kids want to read. Even my reluctant readers are excited to go onto MyON to read because they can all have access to the same text and can share it with their friends. Even if they can't read it for themselves, the system will read it for them and the students can then discuss the book together.”

·         Parent in Indiana: As a parent of a child doing the myON Reading program, I have to say I LOVE this program. Paige's Lexile score has now doubled in the very short time she has been reading with this program. Her fluency has improved so much, which helps her better understand what she is reading. She has read over 80 books in the last couple of months. Her test scores in Reading have gotten so much better. We had considered getting her a tutor for Reading, because she could read, but not really comprehend what she was reading, when she was done. She now has an A in Reading with NO tutor.

·         Parent in Florida: My child recognizes more and more words by reading with myON.  She is only in Kindergarten but now reads books way above her level.  We also like that there are so many books to choose from.

 

Version 1.0

·         Students have their unique login and password to access over 3000 enhanced digital books

·         Students can download up to 20 books to read off line

·         If your child is a student at a school that has subscribed to myON, they can access the entire book collection. No subscription at school? No problem... the myON app let’s you access a free book!

 

Version 1.4

·         The collection has expanded to over 5,000 books available with audio

·         Additional publisher packages are available when the school has licensed more books

·         Students can use a PIN instead of a password to register their account

·         Activity data is collected properly from students outside of the US

Title: myQuote Bible
Description:
Our mobile app has 5 main functions:
1.  A powerful search engine that returns any scripture related to the question the user asks.   It is a Google-like search function but only matches the information from Bible.
2. The system also provides keyword search that allows the user to see where in the scripture the keyword appears and how many times the keyword appears in the whole Bible.
3. A nested list of categorized topics for users to read the scriptures related to topics, which provides fast access to any situation in life when someone you love needs the strength, peace and wisdom from God's inspired words.
5. English, Traditional Chinese and Simplified Chinese with various version of Bible for your preference.

Adjustable font size and line height for easier navigation and reading.

Title: myQuran — The Holy Quran
myRead Stories – Tales from Beatrix Potter Brought to Life
Description:
BEATRIX POTTER AND PETER RABBIT
Join Peter Rabbit, Benjamin Bunny, and a host of other wonderful and loveable friends.  Enjoy each tale of adventure and misfortune, learn a few lessons about courage and responsibility, and see why Beatrix Potter’s animal friends have entertained generations of readers.  Each chapter is a different and authentic story from Beatrix Potter, including:
Peter Rabbit
Benjamin Bunny
Flopsy Bunnies
Jeremy Fisher
Ginger and Pickles

Read each story, listen as it's read to you, or watch it come to life!  You'll love the richly illustrated pictures and entertaining animations.
 

ENGLAND'S BELOVED CHILDREN'S AUTHOR
Helen Beatrix Potter (1866-1943) was an English author, illustrator, natural scientist and conservationist best known for her imaginative children’s books.  Childhood pets and her love for animals greatly influenced the characters of her stories.  Inspiration also came from her family trips to Scotland and the English countryside. 
 

OLD AND NEW, BIG AND SMALL, EVERY TALE SHOULD BE HEARD BY ALL
Though not all tales become classics, every story is important.  Each one represents an author; a person who lived and had a story to tell.  Our goal has been to help bring these stories to life, to introduce forgotten tales, to reintroduce classic tales, and provide all stories the chance to entertain and enlighten for generations to come.
 
Blending creative technology with age-old stortytelling tools, myRead gives everyone the ability to experience the world’s great collection of stories in engaging new ways.  Become a part of the evolution of storytelling and discover how myRead is leading the way.

Title: myScripture
Description:
myScripture is your personal journal for taking notes during a sermon, bible study, or group discussion.  Even jot down the thoughts and revelations you want to capture during your personal study time.

~Build a personal library of scripture notes with myScripture.  
~Record an audio journal and save the myScriptureAudio recording to iCloud.
~Share myScripture journal entries via messaging, email & social media.
~Save myScripture journal entries to iCloud and Notes.

Title: naccatechism
Description:
Description

The application offers users:
- pleasant reading of the Catechism of the New Apostolic Church on iPhone or iPad 
- convenient access to all content of the Catechism 
- the Catechism in five languages (English, French, German, Portuguese, and Spanish) 
- a search function for desired key words or sections in the Catechism and its various appendices (Glossary, Index, Index of Bible references, and much more) 
- the ability to create and manage bookmarks 
- easy navigation within the Catechism and its various appendices
- a synchronisation of the read-on-position and the bookmarks via  the iCloud
- the display of bible texts in an Online-Bible (if an internet connection is available)
- sending of sub-chapters per e-mail
- adaptation of font size

The New Apostolic Church

The New Apostolic Church (NAC) is an international Christian church. The foundation of its doctrine is Holy Scripture. In 1863, it emerged from the Catholic Apostolic Church and—as was also the case in the early Christian church—is led by Apostles. The core of the New Apostolic faith is the return of Christ to take home those who have prepared themselves for this event. The New Apostolic Church emphasises the personal accountability of its members for their actions. The individual is responsible to God for his behaviour. The gospel of Christ and the system of values inherent in the Ten Commandments provide clear orientation in this respect. The New Apostolic Church is politically neutral and independent. It is financed by the voluntary donations of its members. At present, over nine million people around the world profess the New Apostolic faith. 

Legal notice, publisher, contact 

Do you have questions or suggestions? Please do not hesitate to comment. You can also visit us at the websites http://nak.org and http://nac.today.

New Apostolic Church International
Überlandstr. 243
8051 Zurich / Switzerland 
http://www.nak.org

Title: naeilBook
Description:
종이책의 편안함을 그대로 naeilBook(TM)...


1. naeilBook(TM)은 기존의 전자책과 '전자책 도서관'이 가진 모든 기능과 서비스들을 빠짐없이 지원합니다.

2. naeilBook(TM)만 기존 전자책(특히 ePub계열)이 지원하지 못하는 아름다운 레이아웃과 정확한 페이지 번호를 지원합니다.

3. naeilBook(TM)만 종이책과 똑같은 3D 입체입니다.
기존의 전자책은 내용이 많든 적든 아무 상관없이 단지 종이 한 장의 서류 처럼 화면에 보여집니다.
그래서 기존의 전자책을 읽는 독자들은 마치 길을 잃은 듯한 불편함을 느끼게 되고 집중력 저하를 경험하게 되는 것입니다.
기존의 전자책들과는 달리 naeilBook(TM)은 종이책과 똑같은 가로, 세로, 두께를 가진 전자책으로 보여지기 때문에 사용자들은 마치 종이책을 읽을 때 처럼 책의 내용을 한 눈에 파악할 수 있고 편안함을 느끼게 되는 것입니다.
기존의 전자책들이 나무만 보여준다면, naeilBook(TM)은 나무는 물론 숲을 보여주는 전자책이라고 할 수 있습니다.
naeilBook(TM)은 종이책과 마찬가지로 사용자가 원하는 페이지로 한 번에 이동할 수 있습니다.

4. naeilBook(TM)만 사용자 개개인의 시력에 따라서 자동으로 확대/축소/화면이동을 지원합니다.
사용자들은 마치 종이책을 읽듯이 단지 손가락으로 페이지를 넘겨주기만 하면 naeilBook(TM)이 알아서 해당 사용자에게 적합한 확대/축소/화면이동을 수행합니다.

5. naeilBook(TM)만 음악, 음성, 영화, 애니메이션 등의 멀티미디어 서비스를 3가지 방식(파일내장, URL Streaming, URN Streaming)으로 완벽하게 지원합니다.

6. naeilBook(TM)만 다양한 언어와 음성으로 읽어주기 기능을 지원합니다.
naeilBook(TM)은 본문에 한국어, 영어, 중국어 등 여러 나라 언어가 섞여서 나오더라도 이들 언어들을 모두 구분하여 자동으로 해당 언어로 읽어 줍니다.
naeilBook(TM)에서만 현재 읽어주는 위치를 사용자가 원하는 대로 문장 단위로 이동할 수 있고, 이어폰 리모컨으로도 제어가 가능합니다.

7. naeilBook(TM)만 종이책과 똑같이 5가지 주석(자유낙서, 형광펜, 밑줄, 메모, 책갈피)이 지원되고, 해당 사용자가 소유한 모든 전자책 기기들(현존하는 다양한 거의 대부분의 OS를 지원)에서 주석이 자동으로 공유되며, 책을 열지 않은 상태에서도 여러 책들에 대해서 한꺼번에 주석 내용이 검색됩니다.

8. naeilBook(TM)만 갖가지 상황에서의 완벽한 본문 검색을 지원합니다.


naeilBook(TM)은 "종이책의 편안함을 그대로" 가져와서, 기존 전자책들의 최대 약점인 독서의 불편함을 극복했습니다.
naeilBook(TM)은 "사용자 시력에 따른 화면 자동 확대/축소/이동", "각종 멀티미디어", "여러 나라 언어로 책 읽어주기" 등 종이책에서는 불가능했던 꿈을 현실로 가져왔습니다.

1. naeilBook(TM)은 기존의 전자책과 '전자책 도서관'이 가진 모든 기능과 서비스들을 빠짐없이 지원합니다.

3. naeilBook(TM)만 종이책과 똑같은 3D 입체입니다.
기존의 전자책은 내용이 많든 적든 아무 상관없이 단지 종이 한 장의 서류 처럼 화면에 보여집니다.
그래서 기존의 전자책을 읽는 독자들은 마치 길을 잃은 듯한 불편함을 느끼게 되고 집중력 저하를 경험하게 되는 것입니다.
기존의 전자책들과는 달리 naeilBook(TM)은 종이책과 똑같은 가로, 세로, 두께를 가진 전자책으로 보여지기 때문에 사용자들은 마치 종이책을 읽을 때 처럼 책의 내용을 한 눈에 파악할 수 있고 편안함을 느끼게 되는 것입니다.
기존의 전자책들이 나무만 보여준다면, naeilBook(TM)은 나무는 물론 숲을 보여주는 전자책이라고 할 수 있습니다.
naeilBook(TM)은 종이책과 마찬가지로 사용자가 원하는 페이지로 한 번에 이동할 수 있습니다.

4. naeilBook(TM)만 사용자 개개인의 시력에 따라서 자동으로 확대/축소/화면이동을 지원합니다.
사용자들은 마치 종이책을 읽듯이 단지 손가락으로 페이지를 넘겨주기만 하면 naeilBook(TM)이 알아서 해당 사용자에게 적합한 확대/축소/화면이동을 수행합니다.

5. naeilBook(TM)만 음악, 음성, 영화, 애니메이션 등의 멀티미디어 서비스를 3가지 방식(파일내장, URL Streaming, URN Streaming)으로 완벽하게 지원합니다.

6. naeilBook(TM)만 다양한 언어와 음성으로 읽어주기 기능을 지원합니다.
naeilBook(TM)은 본문에 한국어, 영어, 중국어 등 여러 나라 언어가 섞여서 나오더라도 이들 언어들을 모두 구분하여 자동으로 해당 언어로 읽어 줍니다.
naeilBook(TM)에서만 현재 읽어주는 위치를 사용자가 원하는 대로 문장 단위로 이동할 수 있고, 이어폰 리모컨으로도 제어가 가능합니다.

7. naeilBook(TM)만 종이책과 똑같이 5가지 주석(자유낙서, 형광펜, 밑줄, 메모, 책갈피)이 지원되고, 해당 사용자가 소유한 모든 전자책 기기들(현존하는 다양한 거의 대부분의 OS를 지원)에서 주석이 자동으로 공유되며, 책을 열지 않은 상태에서도 여러 책들에 대해서 한꺼번에 주석 내용이 검색됩니다.

8. naeilBook(TM)만 갖가지 상황에서의 완벽한 본문 검색을 지원합니다.


naeilBook(TM)은 "종이책의 편안함을 그대로" 가져와서, 기존 전자책들의 최대 약점인 독서의 불편함을 극복했습니다.
naeilBook(TM)은 "사용자 시력에 따른 화면 자동 확대/축소/이동", "각종 멀티미디어", "여러 나라 언어로 책 읽어주기" 등 종이책에서는 불가능했던 꿈을 현실로 가져왔습니다.

Title: neo文庫
Description:
neo文庫は iPad でも iPhone / iPod touch でも使える電子書籍アプリです。

●パラパラページめくり　2本指ページめくりで連続してめくり戻すこともできます
●端正な縦書き表示　ルビ、縦中横、欧文、句読点や括弧類などの組み方を再現
●内蔵辞書、バックライト明るさ調節などに対応
●作品を選びやすい　作家別・作品名順のほかランキング500、分野別、児童書分野別リストあり
●作品ダウンロードとiCloud同期以外はネットに接続しません

インターネットの図書館青空文庫でテキストファイルで公開されている15536作品【著作権存続作品を含む】読み放題
本文検索、内蔵辞書引き、大辞林連携、大辞泉連携、ダウンロードした作品を書棚に分類整理、図書カードwebページ表示
（※大辞林と大辞泉は他社製品です）
文字サイズは文庫本、えほん、大活字、太明朝、太大活字をワンタッチで選べます
背景色は20色、文字色は白黒それぞれ3色から選べます
表示書体はヒラギノ明朝、ヒラギノ角ゴシック、それぞれ太字も選べます
好みの名前で本棚を追加し分類できます。本棚の内容は入手順/未読順/作家別/作品名順で表示できます。
青空文庫の注記情報、ルビ・字下げ・地寄せ・地付き・漢文返り点・訓点送り仮名・改ページ・改丁・改見開き・割注・傍点・傍線などに対応。

●どのような作品をダウンロードしたかの情報種集はいっさいおこないません。

ご注意
・作品のダウンロードには携帯ネットワークまたはWiFiのネット環境が必要です。(作品は内蔵していません)
※読み上げとVoiceOverには対応していません。VoiceOverでお使いの場合は弊社の別アプリ『豊平文庫』をご検討ください。

Title: nexus media
Description:
Die neue NEXUS-Bücherreihe! Praxisnah, lese-, lehr- und lernmotivierend!

Wer SUPPLY CHAIN MANAGEMENT mit Logistik, Beschaffung, Produktion, Distribution/Entsorgung und Qualität versteht und richtig einsetzt, kann damit die industrielle Wertschöpfung steuern. Voraussetzung sind Grund- und Anwenderkenntnisse der digitalen Geschäftsmodelle. Diese sechs Themen werden in den drei BRANDAKTUELLEN und vierfarbigen Lehrmitteln SCM I und SCM II sowie Informatik für Fach- und Führungskräfte erklärt.

Zielgruppen sind Technische Kaufleute und Absolventen von höheren Fachschulen sowie Logistiker, Betriebstechniker, Prozessfachleute und Einkäufer/innen.

Dozierende können Grafiken, Tabellen, Beispiele etc. als PowerPoint-Folien kostenlos herunterladen. Die E-BOOKS werden alle vier Monate mit neuen Links zu aktuellen Filmen etc. à jour gehalten.

Diese App bietet Ihnen folgende Funktionen:
• Sie können Ihr E-BOOK auch offline nutzen. 
• Je nach Titel weist das E-BOOK auch Audiodateien, Lösungen, weiterführende Links oder interessante Zusatzmaterialien auf. 
• Sie können vom Inhaltsverzeichnis aus direkt zum gewünschten Kapitel springen. 
• Dank der Volltextsuche können Sie Begriffe im ganzen E-BOOK suchen.
• Sie können Textstellen u. a. markieren, unterstreichen oder mit Notizen ergänzen. 
• Wichtige Stellen können Sie mit verschiedenen Tools und Farben hervorheben. 
• Texte lassen sich über separate Textfelder hinzufügen, zum Beispiel Lösungen oder Notizen.
• Ihre persönlichen Anreicherungen lassen sich flexibel ein- und ausblenden. 
• Bei einem Update der App oder des E-BOOK bleiben Ihre persönlichen Anreicherungen erhalten.

Haben Sie Feedback zur NEXUS-App? Schreiben Sie uns unter info@nexusmedia.ch

Title: nijntje apps
Description:
Een voorproefje van de apps van nijntje

We hebben een leuke selectie voor je gemaakt  uit de apps van nijntje. Doe een spelletje uit ‘de tuin van nijntje’, kies wat in de lucht hoort of op de grond uit de app ‘nijntje vliegt’. Speel actief mee met het verhaal ‘nijntje op school’ en zoek winterse spullen bij elkaar uit de app ‘nijntje in de sneeuw’. 

De apps van nijntje zijn speciaal ontwikkeld voor peuters en kleuters en zijn zo opgebouwd dat het voor zowel de allerkleinsten als grotere kinderen leerzaam en leuk is. De kleintjes kunnen heerlijk luisteren naar het verhaal, terwijl grotere kinderen actief mee kunnen doen met de spelletjes.  
Via het hoofdmenu kun je makkelijk wisselen tussen het verhaal en de verschillende spelletjes uit de apps van nijntje. 

Kenmerken van deze app:
• Selectie van het leukste uit de apps van nijntje
• Deel van het interactieve verhaal ‘nijntje op school’
• Tel de peentjes, uit het spel ‘de tuin van nijntje’
• Wat hoort in de lucht of op de grond, uit de app ‘nijntje vliegt’ 
• Zoek twee dezelfde winterse spulletjes, uit de app ‘nijntje in de sneeuw’
• Mogelijkheid om direct een volledige app aan te schaffen
• Nederlands gesproken 
• Voor peuters en kleuters

Interactief verhaal
• Het interactieve verhaal is gebaseerd op het boekje ‘nijntje op school’ geschreven door Dick Bruna. 
Luister of doe actief mee met het verhaal. Leg de blokken op de juiste schaduw en maak een mooie tekening. 

Spelen en leren
• PEENTJES TELLEN: Geef nijntje, moeder pluis en vader pluis lekkere peentjes! Tel je hardop mee? 
• ZOEK DEZELFDE: Zoek telkens de twee winterse plaatjes die hetzelfde zijn. Als je het goed hebt, verdwijnen de plaatjes van het scherm.
• IN DE LUCHT OF OP DE GROND: Weet jij wat in de lucht hoort of op de grond? Sleep ieder item naar de lucht of naar de grond.  

Deze app is ontwikkeld door Sanoma Media Netherlands b.v. in samenwerking met Mercis b.v.

Title: nijntje telt
Description:
Leer samen met nijntje en haar vriendjes tellen van één tot en met tien in deze leuke educatieve app voor peuters en kleuters. Bij elk van de tien cijfers is er een leuk spelletje dat je kunt doen. Met nijntje leer je spelenderwijs tellen. Veel plezier!

1. Weet jij de goede weg te vinden, breng 1 hond naar zijn hondenhok. 
2. Weet jij welke 2 voorwerpen bij elkaar horen? 
3. Verdeel de taartjes over de 3 borden, weet jij hoeveel er over blijven?
4. Maak groepjes van 4 kersen, kijk naar de stippellijn om te zien hoe het moet. 
5. Geef alle 5 boerderijdieren een mooie kleur.
6. Zoek het juiste aantal ballen bij het cijfer.
7. Laat alle 7 ballonnen knallen!
8. Zoek en kleur 8 peren in de perenboom
9. Laat 9 kuikentjes uit hun ei komen, tel ze allemaal
10. Maak een mooie tekening door deze 10 lijnen met elkaar te verbinden. 
De apps van nijntje zijn speciaal ontwikkeld voor peuters en kleuters. Zezijn zo opgebouwd dat het voor zowel de allerkleinsten als grotere kinderen leerzaam en leuk is. Via het hoofdmenu kun je makkelijk wisselen tussen de verschillende spelletjes. 

Kenmerken van deze app:
• Leer tellen van 1 t/m 10 
• Nederlands gesproken 
• Voor peuters en kleuters
• Ontwikkeld voor de iPad 
• 6e app van nijntje  
•Eenvoudig, speels en leerzaam

Deze app is ontwikkeld door Sanoma Netherlands b.v. in samenwerking met Mercis b.v.
