Title: oCFR
Developer_Name: Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration
Description: The U.S. DOT. Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration’s (PHMSA) mission is to protect people and the environment by advancing the safe transportation of energy and other hazardous materials that are essential to our daily lives. This app provides online access to PHMSA’s Hazardous Materials Regulations (HMR) in 49 CFR parts 100-180 for the classifying, handling and packaging of hazardous materials by highway, rail, aircraft, and vessel. This app also provides online access to PHMSA’s Pipeline Safety Regulations in 49 CFR parts 190-199, which provide the Federal minimum safety standards for the design, construction, operation and maintenance, and spill response planning for pipeline and LNG facilities involved in the transportation of natural gas and hazardous liquids within the United States.

Title: one more layer
Description:
Experience projects and 3D models by international engineering consultancy schlaich bergermann partner in augmented reality (AR). The app One more layer comes as an addition to the book multilayered and allows readers to interact with sbp’s body of work in their real-world environment. To access the digital content, use your mobile device to scan the book pages tagged with the AR symbol.

• View 3D models: Look at the supporting structures of some of sbp’s key projects, including bridges, stadia, towers, and other buildings. 
• Project sheets: Find out key facts and read into the featured sbp projects. 
• Visual content: Browse picture galleries, watch interviews, and look at videos on selected projects, and new materials, among others.
• Outlook: Find out what new projects sbp is working on right now, and what structures are to be built in the future.

If you do not have the the book "multilayered" at hand, you can still use the app by downloading a PDF with some sample projects here: https://onemorelayer.de/samples.pdf

IOS Development by: KUNSTMATRIX Technologies GmbH

Title: onEBook
Description: Onebook is the platform which recognised that gap and has bridged it with simplest of tools, providing digitisation at your hand. It helps you to be the first to present your thought before it is plagiarised or stolen. By cutting down the time involved in translating it to a digital format. Onebook app is one unique showcase from the vast functions in one simple user story called notebook digitalisation. Onebook app uses computer vision algorithm to efficiently capture, enhance and organise notes written by pen and paper and release them into the desired folder in the cloud. Using an advanced routing engine design for specific use,  users simply print such seven label mark symbols at the bottom of each notebook page  or attach such pages  book to send notes to specific locations of their favourite cloud  like iClould ,Sky Drive, Google Drive, Dropbox, email inboxes etc.

Title: ontheBible
Description:
ontheBible is a service providing the Bible and message videos from global Christian leaders.
When you have questions while reading the Bible, you can access numerous related messages that could help you just by tapping the phrase on the app.
You can also search messages by the name of speaker or church.
The Bible and messages would never be separated from each other!

Try it now for free!

▶ Bible
King James Version(KJV) is supported for current Beta.
More translations will be added soon.
Please let us know if you want any specific translations.

▶ Messages
There are plenty of precious messages on the Web but they are very hard to find.
To solve this problem,
ontheBible team collects message videos,
extracts related Bible phrase info,
and connects the videos to the specific verse of the phrase.
ontheBible is providing more than 6,500 videos currently.

Title: optic und vision
Description:
OPTIC+VISION steht für eine starke, selbstbewusste Augenoptik. Sowohl Inhaber/innen als auch Führungskräfte gehören zu unserer Leserschaft, ebenso wie engagierte, zukunftsorientierte Angestellte und auf Chancen fokussierte Studenten - und last but not least, der junge Nachwuchs in handwerklicher Ausbildung. Das Magazin steht für exzellente Berichterstattung, außergewöhnliche Themenaufarbeitung und konstruktiven  Journalismus. Als Protagonistin unserer Zielgruppe hat die Redaktion einen besonderen Namen gefunden: Gylan Benz. Sie ist jung, bestens ausgebildet, überaus kundenorientiert, klebt nicht in der Werkstatt, sondern ist dort, wo die Menschen sind. „Gylan“ steht für Kulturoffenheit und „Benz“ für werthaltige Augenoptik. 

Darüber hinaus bietet das Magazin News aus der Branche und wagt immer auch einen Blick darüber hinaus. Unser E-Paper berichtet über aktuelle Entwicklungen und bietet mit joptic.de Zugriff auf den attraktiven Stellenmarkt der Branche. 

Mit dem E-Paper von OPTIC+VISION  können schnell und bequem Notizen, Bilder und Audiosequenzen zu Artikeln einfügen sowie Lesezeichen setzen. So bleiben Sie immer und überall informiert und fit für die chancenreiche Zukunft.

Title: orsozoxi
Description: Orthozoxi is a single go-to app that lists all the holy readings of each day. In our first release, we’ve the Arabic Holy Bible and the Seneksar (the book of saints' tales) and more books in this release.  We’ll be adding more of the coptic literature on each update of the app.

Title: panologue_00
Description:
=ダ・ヴィンチ「電子書籍アワード2012」にて書籍賞を受賞しました!=

panologue(パノローグ)は、iPadで見る・読む・聴く“グラフ誌”です。扱うテーマはニッポンの風景。日常の風景、残したい風景、普段は見ることのできない風景をパノラマ写真で記録しました。iPadならではの操作性で、日本の風景に触れてみてください。
Touch the scene around us !

 創刊準備号はの内容は
1)特集:Panorama Showcase
 パノラマ写真家の代表作を集めました。
2)パノラマが伝えた大震災 〜産経新聞写真報道局の挑戦〜
 東日本大震災の被害をパノラマ写真で報道し続ける産経フォト、その制作の舞台裏に迫りました。
3)bird's-eye view
 パノラマ写真が持つ独自の視点と広い視野で話題のニュースを取り上げます。「LIFE IN A DAY」プレミア上映会の様子などを紹介。
4)パノラマで見る日本の音風景
5)パノラマ建築探訪
6)パノラマ写真家のセルフポートレイト
 創刊準備号には34地点のパノラマを収録しています。


Panologue – the Panoramic Graphic Magazine
Inaugural Preparatory Issue

Panologue is the brand-new panoramic graphic magazine to read and listen on iPad. It features Japanese sceneries of daily lives, memorial moments, or precious and outstanding sceneries in panoramic photos. Touch iPad and come into dialogue with Japanese panoramic views! 

This preparation issue contains:
Special Feature: Panorama Showcase
Collection of representative works by Japanese panoramic photographers
Aftermath of the 2011 Tōhoku Earthquake and Tsunami 
Challenges by the Sankei Shimbun Newspaper, photo department
The real voices of the photographer at Sankei Photo who has been reporting the aftermath of Tohoku earthquake and tsunami
Bird’s-Eye View
Focus on the current news and topics from the unique and wide view of panoramic photographs. 
Japanese Soundscape in Panorama
Japanese Architectures in Panorama
Self-portraits by panoramic photographers 

Also contains panorama photographs at 34 points in Japan

Description:

Please check the last Issue, panologue_00.

Title: peep - Chat Story App
Description:
【Subscription Info】
Unlimited reading is an automatic renewal membership. In addition, please be aware that deleting the app will not cancel your membership.
Available renewal periods and pricing are shown below. Unlimited reading provides unlimited access to all content within the app.

One week: $4.99
One month: $12.99 *One week's worth of access for free.
Subscribe to monthly renewals and get a one-week trial free of charge.
The one-week trial is available for your first purchase of the monthly subscription only.

・Please be aware that if you switch to the monthly renewal subscription after purchasing a weekly plan, the one-week free trial will not apply.
・Payment will be billed to your iTunes account.
・Renewal fees will calculated and charges issued retroactively 24 hours or less prior to the end of your subscription period.
・Your subscription can be cancelled at any time up until 24 hours prior to the end of your unlimited reading period.
・To cancel your subscription, access the "Settings" app on your phone and open the "iTunes & App Store" settings. Please be aware that subscriptions cannot be canceled within the peep app.
If you make a purchase during your free trial period, any remaining time in the free trial will be lost.
In addition, migration of premium peep application to non-iOS phones is not currently supported. Thank you for your understanding.

【About peep Purchases】
If you would like to make a peep purchase, we recommend logging on through the "User information" > "Data migration for changing phones" menus first.
We cannot guarantee you will be able to access peep points lost due to making a purchase without completing data migration and logging in first.

【About Data Migration for Unlimited Reading Subscriptions】
Although unlimited reading subscriptions can be restored when changing from one iOS phone to another, please be aware unlimited reading subscription data migration to non-iOS phones is not supported. Thank you for your understanding.

Title: phone numbers
Description:
جهات الإتصال من أهم الأشياء في أي جوال
لهذا وفرنا لكم هذا التطبيق والذي سيساعدك على الإحتفاظ بجهات إتصالك بدون إستخدام كمبيوتر ولا أي تعقيد
فقط بالضغط على نسخ جهات الإتصال وسيتم إرسالها إلى بريدك الإلكتروني
ويمكنك الرجوع إليها في أي وقت

وما يتميز به التطبيق :

نسخ أحتياطي للأسماء إلى بريدك الإلكتروني دون الحاجة لإستخدام الكمبيوتر ويمكنك أن تجعل التطبيق يقوم بتذكيرك لنسخ الأسماء أسبوعياً أو شهرياً 

عند رغبتك في الإتصال بشخص في وقت وتاريخ محدد كل ماعليك هو تحديد الأسم وإختيار الوقت والتاريخ وسيقوم التطبيق بتذكيرك بالإتصال بهذا الرقم في الوقت المحدد وبالضغط على إشعار التذكير سيقوم التطبيق بالإتصال به

يمكنك كتابة رسالة نصية وتحديد وقت وتاريخ ورقم هاتف ليقوم التطبيق بتذكيرك بإرسال هذه الرسالة له في الوقت المحدد بضغطة زر

قسم خاص لمفاتيح الاتصال الدولية

وبعض المزايا الأخرى إكتشفها عند إستخدامك للتطبيق

Title: picture word learning, blaboo
Description:
Free Word Learning App For Kids And Adults!

Are you worried about your child's learning words?
BlaBoo lets children or kids learn words from their favorite pictures, such as cars, jobs, animals and more.

Are you studying foreign languages?
BlaBoo offers a variety of languages including English, Japanese Chinese and so on.

[Features]
- Various Categories
BlaBoo has a variety of categories, illustrations, that children and kids like. Study words by seeing the illustration.

- Voice
Let's touch it! When you touch the picture, the pronunciation of the word is spoken. children can study words with the sound.

- Multiple Languages
BlaBoo supports Korean, English, Japanese, Italian, Chinese and more. BlaBoo also helps you study foreign words!

- Review
Did you study new words? Then, using a word card to review the words you studied.

[Blaboo is FREE!]
Yes, BlaBoo is totally FREE! Just Download and study new words with babies or children together!

[Mode 1 - Study new words into categories.]
1. Select Language
BlaBoo supports multiple languages. Press the Change Language button at the top of the Home screen to select the language you want to study.

2. Select Category
Select the category in which you want to study the word. BlaBoo support 15 categories such as Animals, Occupations, Vehicles, Food, and more.

3. Touch For Pronouncing!
Volume Up! touch the illustrations on the screen. You can hear the voices of the words of the illustrations.

[Mode 2 - Review with word cards]
1. Select Language
BlaBoo supports multiple languages. Press the Change Language button at the top of the Home screen to select the language you want to study.

2. Review
You can use the word card to review the words you studied. When you slide the screen, the next word appears.

3. Study Pronunciation
If you want to check the pronunciation of a word, you can hear the word again by pressing the speaker mark.

Free Word Learning App For Kids And Adults, BlaBoo
You can download it now for free and get started right away!

Title: pikcha.tv HD: Picturebook-Films
Description:
In our pikcha.tv HD app you will find the most wonderful picturebook films, one of them can be watched **for free**! On our picturebook film shelf, there are great stories for you to discover, e.g. The little Raven Socks, Dr. Growler, Capt'n Sharky, Princess Lillifee, Janosch and many more.

The short films are a calm alternative to the commonly overstimulating offers for young children, approved by media educators. They contain specifically composed music islands and gentle animations. They are narrated by well-known actresses and actors, among them for example Sissi Perlinger, Jochen Busse, Helmut Zierl, Sarah Kuttner, Marek Erhardt, Michael Lott, Stephan Schwartz and Rainer Hunold.

In this HD edition for iPad, iPhone and iPod touch, even the selection of the films is an experience in itself: the characters slide around on the shelf and thus, more and more of the popular princesses, pirates, tigers, bears, ravens, elephants, rabbits etc. make an appearance. pikcha.tv - content-rich picturebook entertainment on the go.

“The picturebook channel pikcha.tv is convincing in many ways. The educational concept offers a careful first look into the world of moving pictures. The playful access to the picturebooks (and it's low costs) allow a new look onto popular picturebooks on a high literary level to all families.”
Prof. Dr. Christine Haug
Head of the Department Book&Media Sciences at the University of Munich

Title: pixivコミック 恋愛漫画/少女マンガ読み放題
Description:
＼ pixivコミックのここがすごい ／
● 読める漫画数は4000作品以上。どのマンガアプリよりもたくさんの人気マンガが読めます！

の最新話が読めるアプリはpixivコミックだけ！

■ 編集部オススメの作品が毎日更新！
550万以上の投稿漫画から面白い作品のみ厳選し、
編集部からの一言をそえて毎日お届け！
男性向けの少年漫画/女性向けの少女漫画/王道の恋愛/ラブコメ/創作BL/4コマ/ギャグ/ファンタジー/学園漫画/実話エッセイ/感動ものなど、幅広いジャンルの漫画を毎日読むことができます。

もう、ポイントが溜まるまで待ったりチケットを購入する必要はありません！

■ ログイン不要で気軽に読める！
pixivコミックは読むだけならログインなしで気軽に楽しめます。
さらに楽しむために、pixivアカウントでログインすれば作品に「いいね！」を送ったり、作者さんを「フォロー」することができます。

■ 投稿漫画作品の作者を直接応援できる！
作品に「いいね！」を送ったり、作者さんを「フォロー」することで、
あたらしい更新や投稿を誰よりも早く知ることができます。
気に入った作品の作者さんには直接応援コメントを送ることもできます。

＼  ユーザーからいただいた声 ／
「最初から最後まですぐに読めて､おすすめや､検索､人気がちゃんと区別されていて分りやすくて、どういうものかとハッキリとするので良いと思う｡」
「様々なBL作品やエッセイが読めるのがいい」
「待つだけで色々なマンガが見れてとてもいいです！！ それに好きな類も多くてとても楽しいです！ つい夢中になっちゃいます」
「かなり面白い。漫画アプリよく分からなくて色々入れて試して見たんだけどこれは良いやつだね。」
「面白い作品が沢山な上に使いやすいので、ほぼ毎日見てます。」
「他では読めない漫画が豊富で楽しい。」
「漫画の新規開拓にお役立ち！」
「プロの作品から初々しいアマチュア作品まで家にいながら無料で楽しめるのはありがたいです。ここで知って購入した本もあります。」
「このアプリでなきゃ読まなかっただろうマンガとたくさん出会えました！これからも期待してます！」
「恋愛からホラーまで、いろいろなジャンルが揃っていて、読み飽きないくらいたくさんの本があって、親にやめなさいとゆわれるまでやめれないくらい熱中してしまうアプリで、今私のスマホに入ってるアプリの中で、1番のお気に入りです！ 他のマンガアプリも好きだけど、他のマンガアプリに負けないくらい大好きデス! これからもおもしろいギャグマンガ＆キュンキュンドキドキハラハラの恋愛マンガ＆ゾクッと怖かったり、あんまり怖くなかったりのホラーマンガ＆その他もろもろいっっっっっぱーーーーい出してくださいね！ 楽しみにしています‼」
「ちょっとした空き時間に最適だと思います。他のコミックスアプリと同じようにいろんなジャンルの漫画が読めますし、何より内容が面白いものが多いと思います！」
(※pixivコミックへのレビューより)

■pixivプレミアム

○pixivプレミアムについて
pixivプレミアムは、pixivコミック及びpixivにおいて広告非表示などの機能を利用できるプレミアムサービスです。

○価格について
1ヶ月600円（税込）の月額自動更新サービスです。

○期間について
購読の有効期間は申込日を基準にして1ヶ月です。
購読期間の終了時、自動で期間が延長され、iTunesアカウントに次月分の料金が請求されます。
更新を希望されない場合は、購読期間終了の24時間以上前に解除してください。
自動更新は購読期間終了前の24時間以内に行われます。

○購読期間の確認と自動更新の解除方法
購読期間の確認や、自動更新の解除は「設定」から行う事ができます。

1. 「設定」アプリを起動
2. 「iTunes StoreとApp Store」を開く
3. 「Apple ID: ○○○○」をタップ
4. 「Apple IDを表示」をタップ
5. パスワードを入力
6. 「購読」の「管理」をタップ
購読期間の確認や、自動更新の解除はこの画面から行うことができます。

○キャンセルおよび払い戻しについて
当月分のキャンセルおよび払い戻しは受け付けておりません。
キャンセルを希望される方は、次月以降の自動更新を解除してください。

○利用規約等
pixivプレミアムのご利用前に、以下の利用規約等をご確認ください。

・プライバシーポリシー
https://comic.pixiv.net/privacy

・pixiv有料サービス利用規約

■ pixivコミック公式サイト
https://comic.pixiv.net/

■ pixivコミック公式Twitter
https://twitter.com/pixivcomic

■ pixiv
https://www.pixiv.net/

Title: planetarian - Dream of Little Star -
Description:
"Don't split heaven in two ..."

It is thirty years since a world war put an end to space development.
Most of the human race is dead and incessant rain falls on the surface of the Earth.
The Junk Hunter earns his living from scavenging precious supplies from abandoned cities.
The Junk Hunter infiltrates a Sealed City, reputed to be the most dangerous places on Earth. In the center of the city, he discovers a pre-war Planetarium. 
Here he is greeted by the companion robot, Yumemi Hoshino.
She sincerely believes that he is her first customer in thirty years.
She invites him on a "voyage to the stars," but the Planetarium projector malfunctions.
After a succession of disjointed conversations, the Junk Hunter grudgingly agrees to fix it.

The kinetic novel - a thrilling new form of entertainment. It is neither novel, nor animation, nor game…
With the highest quality scenario, graphics, music and direction, it achieves a whole new dimension of realism and pathos for the lead characters.

The PC and mobile telephone version of "planetarian - Dream of Little Star" achieved sales of over 50,000. Now it is back to be enjoyed on your iPhone and iPad. 

Writer: Yuichi Suzumoto
Original Images / Mechanic Design: Eiji Komatsu
Music: Magome Togoshi

This is an application version of the Windows software "planetarian - Dream of Little Star - Memorial Edition for all ages" released on April 30, 2010.

Title: point it App
Description:
Indexed in 6 languages

You may be fluent in four languages but sometimes you 
could find yourself ”off the beaten track“ where you cannot speak the language. ”point it“ , is the answer. Everyone in the world will understand you. This passport-sized assistant is used not only by tourists but also by UN peacekeeping forces, Olympic athletes and speech therapists.

“Let your pictures do the talking...”
- Evening Standard, London

„Ein wichtiger Beitrag zur Völkerverständigung.“
- Süddeutsche Zeitung, München

„Pour commander une omelette ou expliquer au policier pourquoi on est mal garé, il suffit de montrer la photo correspondante.“ 
- Le Monde, Paris

„‘Sesam üppna dig‘ för dagens globetrotter.“ 
- Form, Stockholm

“This is not only the cheapest book in print, it is possibly the bestselling photobook of all time.”
- The photobook: A history Vol. II, London

„Dieter Graf, een architect en fanatieke reiziger, fotografeerde een halve huishouding.“
- Volkskrant, Amsterdam

„Die Idee für das Buch ist so einfach wie genial. Neben Zahnbürste, Pass und Kreditkarte sollte es zum Standardgepäck jedes Reisenden gehören.“ 
- Frankfurter Allgemeine Zeitung

„Con un milione e ottocentomila copie vendute, è il libro fotografico più famoso del mondo. Raccoglie milleduecento immagini e non una riga de testo.”
- La Repubblica, Roma

„Spiegeleier, Klimaanlagen, Weingläser sehen überall gleich aus. Ein genialer Einfall.“
- Bild, Hamburg

„Alors, que vous soyez à Londres, Tokyo, Bangkok ou Mexico, point it!”
- ELLE, Paris

„Mit dem Zeigefinger um die Welt: Die Sprache, die jeder versteht.“
- Kurier, Wien

“The photographs are neatly arranged, related objects are cleverly bunched, and not much appears to be missing.”
- The Guardian, London

„Die besten Ideen sind genial einfach – es muss nur einer darauf kommen.“
- Spiegel, Hamburg

“You’ll never have to mime “roast chicken” again.”
- HQ Magazine, Sydney

"A simple but effective idea."
- The Times, London

Pony coloring book - printable coloring pages with finger painting, Free Pony coloring book game for little girls who love Pony. A funny game for toddler, kids, girl and children with the world of cute Pony. The easy way to learn about color and imagine to Pony princess. 

Turns your device into a beautiful coloring app for your kids, helping them develop concentration skills, motor skills and eye-hand coordination as well as creative thinking, allow children to color their favorite princess over and over with easy to change colors allows your child to create different variations of their masterpiece. Play the game with their parents and family to strengthen the relationship between painting. The preparation games for preschool girls, children or first grade kids.

With a feature printable coloring pages you can take picture of their creation save to device, print to paper or share them via Email, Facebook and Twitter that installed on your device.

Title: pordenonelegge
Description:
pordenonelegge.it è un festival che unisce le persone sulla base dell’amore più bello che esista, l’amore per le storie, per i racconti, per i sogni: in una parola, per la letteratura.
Scrittori, filosofi, giornalisti, poeti, artisti si alternano in un palco ideale dove non esistono differenze di ruolo, ma dove suona la parola di una cultura che si confronta per necessità, verità e vocazione, con i problemi reali del nostro tempo. Gli incontri distribuiti nel centro storico di Pordenone vengono affollati dai numerosissimi lettori-spettatori che cercano nella vasta offerta del programma quel particolare percorso di dialoghi ed eventi quella che diventerà la “loro” manifestazione. 
La app di pordenonelegge serve a conoscere meglio il programma e i protagonisti della prossima edizione, per avere una guida sempre pronta, e a portata di mano, durante i cinque giorni del festival, con tutte le news sulle sorprese dell’ultimo momento.

L’applicazione ufficiale di pordenonelegge, dotata di un’interfaccia semplice e intuitiva, consente di:
•portare sempre con sè l'intero programma della manifestazione, 
•scoprire i luoghi dove si svolgono gli eventi, 
•conoscere le biografie degli autori, 
•rimanere sempre informati sulle ultime notizie disponibili in tempo reale, 
•e, soprattutto, creare il proprio programma personalizzato, salvando tra i preferiti gli eventi di pordenonelegge che maggiormente ci interessano.  

L’utente può consultare il programma di pordenonelegge per data o tema. 
Per ogni evento è disponibile una scheda dettagliata contenente tutte le informazioni utili per il visitatore: data, ora, e luogo in cui si svolge l’evento, autori che partecipano, breve presentazione dell’iniziativa. 

E’ inoltre possibile accedere alla lista completa di tutti gli autori che prendono parte alla manifestazione e scoprire, attraverso una mappa interattiva, quali eventi si svolgono nei diversi luoghi della città di Pordenone.

Applicazione realizzata da Aleapro snc in collaborazione con Fondazione pordenonelegge.

L'applicazione raccoglie i dati d'uso in modo anonimo al fine di eleborare statistiche ed offrire un'esperienza d'uso sempre migliore.

Title: rapLector
Description:
Traditional reading involves published text in lines and moving your eyes sequentially from word to word. For each line, the eye must first find the beginning before your brain can start to process the meaning of the word that you’re viewing. 'rapLector' let you skip all these tiring actions for your eyes and lets your brain only focus on the meaning of the word, in a easy to read big font and with no eReader required.

Load your ebooks in the rapLector folder on your iPhone  using iTunes or AirDrop. Only .epub files wil be accepted. In the rapLector app, scroll to select the book you want to read. 
Press "Start". rapLector will remember where you left and start two lines before.
Press "Pause" to stop.
Use the buttons to scroll through the book.
Press "Continue" to start reading again.  rapLector will start two lines before.
You can adjust the reading speed using the slider.

No subscription
No account required
Offline available
One small price for total functionality
No eReader required
Remembers where you left reading
Estimated read time left
Very fast in loading book
Custom speed adjust
Intuitive interface
Easy ebooks adding using airDrop or iTunes
No irritating advertisement

Title: rationell reinigen
Description:
rationell reinigen Gebäudedienste informiert über alle wichtigen Tätigkeitsfelder der Gebäudedienstleister und unterstützt die Branche bei der Entwicklung neuer Geschäftsfelder. Fachbeiträge zu Themen wie Reinigungstechnik, Hygiene, Betriebsausrüstung, Berufskleidung, Gebäudemanagement bilden Schwerpunkte der Berichterstattung. Anerkannte Fachautoren schreiben über Betriebs- und Mitarbeiterführung und geben Tipps für Verkausprofis. Der Nutzwert für den Leser steht bei rationell reinigen im Mittelpunkt. 
Mit 25.000 Exemplaren Auflage spricht das Medium der Branche die Kernzielgruppe der Gebäudedienstleister in Deutschland, Österreich und der Schweiz an. Öffentliche und private Auftraggeber und der Handel sind weitere Zielgruppen der Fachzeitschrift. 
Als Fachorgan des Bundesinnungsverbandes des Gebäudereiniger-Handwerks (BIV) gilt rationell reinigen als Pflichtlektüre der Branche.
Entdecken Sie nun die neue App der Zeitschrift und lesen Sie das Fachmagazin pünktlich zum Erscheinen der jeweiligen Printausgaben auf Ihrem iPad. Bleiben Sie immer auf dem Laufenden – mit der neuen App von rationell reinigen.

Mit der App von rationell reinigen haben Sie alle Informationen pünktlich zum Erscheinungstermin der Print-Ausgabe auf Ihrem Tablet. 

Preise: 
Einzelexemplar: 10,99 EUR 
12 Monate: 109,99 EUR

Title: readAwrite – รี้ดอะไร้ต์
Description:
readAwrite by meb (รี้ดอะไร้ต์) แอปพลิเคชันอ่านเขียนนิยายออนไลน์สุดยิ่งใหญ่ในจักรวาล สนุกครบทุกอารมณ์ อ่านง่ายสบายตา นิยายฟรีมีเพียบ อัปตอนใหม่ทุกวัน

readAwrite คือ แหล่งกบดานสุดฟินของนักเขียนและนักอ่านหลากแนว ทั้งนิยายรัก นิยายจีนโบราณ นิยายวาย นิยายยูริ และการ์ตูน & โดจินชิ 

แถมยังเอาใจนักเขียนและนักอ่านนิยายแชท ด้วย readAchat (รี้ดอะแชท) นิยายแชทน้องใหม่ ไฟแรงเว่อร์ แต่งนิยายผ่านแอปฯ และในคอมฯ ได้ทุกที่ทุกเวลา เลือกหมวดหมู่ได้ตามสไตล์ที่คุณชอบ 

ฟีเจอร์สุดฮ็อตจาก readAwrite
- มีระบบ Auto search เสิร์ชพยางค์น้อย อ่านสอยได้ทันที
- มีโดเนทไอเทมเจ้าแรกในวงการ ที่คุณนักอ่านสามารถให้ชานมไข่มุก พิซซ่า ซาชิมิ ฯลฯ กับนักเขียนได้
- ให้ Tip นักเขียนคนโปรด เสมือนเข้าโหมดให้กำลังใจแก่นักเขียน
- สติกเกอร์ พี่รี๊ดน้องไร้ต์ พี่ meb พี่ฮิปโป และอื่นๆ อีกมากมาย ให้คอมเมนต์กันระรัว
- ปรับจอสีให้เลือกสรรได้ถึง 4 แบบ ทั้งแบบปกติ ซีเปีย โหมดกลางคืน และโหมดมืด
- จะฟ้อนต์ใหญ่ ฟ้อนต์เล็ก ชิดริมขวา ริมซ้าย หรือตรงกลางก็ทำได้ตามใจสะดวก
- แปะลิ้งก์เพื่อขาย Paper Version ทำได้ตามความพอใจโลด
- มีระบบ Pre-order ใช้งานฟรี เป็นสื่อกลางระหว่างคุณนักเขียนกับแฟน (นักอ่าน)
- คะแนน The 1 เปลี่ยนเป็น meb coin ได้ด้วยนะเออ …  เลิศจริงๆ

ผู้พัฒนาแอปพลิเคชันสุดเมพของเรา ไม่ใช่ใครที่ไหน เป็นพี่ meb ร้านอีบุ๊กอันดับ 1 แห่งสยามประเทศนี่เอง รอช้าอยู่ไย โหลดมาใช้งานกันเล้ยยย!

Title: s'eee digital by Emi Suzuki
Description:
人気モデルにして、ガジェット通「今」を体現するインフルエンサー、鈴木えみが編集長を務めるガールズマガジン「s’eee」がアプリになりました！
vol.5となる「s’eee」最新号は、自らの妊娠・出産を経ての「MAMA＆BABY」をテーマに、初のデジタルマガジンとして刊行！不安や悩みがありつつも、楽しくハッピー感満載だったマタニティライフや子育てのあれこれを、少しでも多くのプレママやママたちと共有したいと、めいっぱい詰め込みました。妊娠発覚から出産までの心の動きを語るインタビューをはじめ、初公開のマタニティフォト、ママのファッション＆ビューティ、キッズのおしゃれとインテリア……などコンテンツ満載！　
ギミックが楽しい誌面はまるで「飛び出す絵本」のデジタル版。特にずーっと撮り溜めていたマタニティフォトや、かわいいBABYの画像は必見です！　MAMA＆BABYに役立つアイテムも100点以上掲載し、ショッピングやサイトへのリンクがあるのもデジタルならでは。
バックナンバー「s’eee」vol.1～4のフリーダイジェスト版もラインナップ。

本アプリケーションは、無料でダウンロードできますが、一部アプリ内課金のコンテンツがあります。

Title: saanrize -African Kids Content
Description:
Enjoy Thoko Vuka! Thoko Muka! Thoko, Wake Up! E-BOOKS, FLASH CARDS & MORE!
- Have fun learning and discovering African stories, languages, and cultural heritage
- Expose your kids to authentic and captivating content - created by Africans and featuring african characters
- Enjoy the app without any annoying 3rd party advertisements
- Download it now to enjoy entertaining content wherever you are in the world.

FREE CONTENT:
Enjoy our Thoko Vuka! Thoko Muka! Thoko, Wake Up! flash cards in Shona, Ndebele and English.
Audio books and in more languages are coming soon!

PAID CONTENT:
Preview our beautifully illustrated and captivating e-books. Created by Africans. If you love them, buy them and enjoy them right from our app. Thoko Vuka! Thoko Muka! Thoko, Wake Up!  are just the beginning.
Want a hard copy? No problem. Order straight from the app with one click!

COMING SOON: MORE BOOKS, NURSERY RHYMES, & KIDS SONGS
Be the first to find out when they become available. Download the saanrize app.

OUR FIRST BOOK!
Thoko Vuka! Thoko Muka! Thoko, Wake Up! is the first in our series featuring Thoko, a brave, young Zimbabwean girl living in the diaspora with  her trusty sidekick toy, Zou-Zou, who is an elephant just like her family totem! We created the series to allow young children to learn about Zimbabwean culture in a fun, engaging and relatable way. Join Thoko and Zou-Zou as they go on fun and amazing adventures to learn about her culture and heritage. This first  story is inspired by the popular Ndebele nursery rhyme, Thoko, Thoko Vuka! written by Joanna Sibanda (nee Moyo). Get to know Thoko and follow along as she rushes to get to school on time!

WHY THE NAME SAANRIZE?
We wanted something that would embrace all Africans and our research showed us that the Saan are the oldest tribe in Africa, thus the oldest of us all. To honour that connection we chose the first part of our name “saan”.
We see our mission as being a new dawn and creating of a “saan” uprising that strengthens our children’s identities, allows us to own our narrative, and shape our destiny as “saan” people. There is also a slight play on sunrise – which is beautiful, unique, and inviting. These are elements we want to embrace and amplify with this platform. So here we are: saanrize. We hope you’ll rise with us.

ABOUT SAANRIZE
We are a media, entertainment and merchandising company dedicated to providing engaging, authentic, representative, and educational content and consumer products. We aim to preserve African languages and heritage while fostering a strong sense of African pride, unity and identity because our native languages matter and our heritage is worth preserving!

All our products are purposefully and proudly created in collaboration with African artists, writers, makers and designers. With every purchase you make, you are empowering our collaborators and enabling us to share authentic African stories. Thank you.

Follow us on instagram: @saanrize, facebook: facebook.com/saanrize or twitter: @saanrize

License Agreement

By downloading this application you agree to the Saanrize Terms of Use and Privacy Statement, located at http://www.saanrize.com. For clarity, residents of the European Economic Area (EEA) are deemed to have acknowledged (rather than agreed to) the Privacy Statement.

Title: safe Images
Description: Application Protection pictures and video with a password protection mode of hackers and tampering with their Antdharo updates and followed them.

Title: sataguri
Description:
This book-application is created after the well-known fairy tale by Vazha Pshavela. One of the first interactive books in Georgian language will become a favorite of children regardless of their age. it has rich interactive and audio features.

The story is set in a Christmas time.  Everybody is getting ready for a celebration, even the mice. 
Grandfather brings gifts for the whole family and he also buys a mousetrap. 
Grandmother puts a roasted nut on the trap and they wait for the next morning. 
The mice, attracted by the smell of the nut, try to get it but their leader gets trapped! 
The mice try to save their brave and beloved friend.

Enjoy the story!

Title: seBook-Kolay Hukuk
Description:
Ve artık Hukuk Cepte...

seBook - Kolay Hukuk®, dünyadaki ilk ve tek sürekli güncellenen, her soruya güvenilir cevaplar sunan, hukuk Smart E-Kitap ve Smart E-mevzuat okuma (Smart E Book) aplikasyonudur.

Ücretsiz edinilebilen se Book-Kolay Hukuk uygulaması ile okuyucular, ihtiyaç duydukları en güvenilir ve en güncel hukuki bilgiye her an, her yerde ve en hızlı şekilde ulaşma imkânına sahip olacaklardır.

seBook - Kolay Hukuk, diğer bazı kitap okuma uygulamalarında olan sayfa ayracı, kelime-satır vs. işaretleme, not alma, arama gibi çok önemli işlevsel özelliklere ek olarak diğer e-kitaplarda bulunmayan çok önemli şu akıllı özelliklere de sahip:

-	Sürekli güncellenme,

-	Okuyucuların uzman yazarlara soru sorabilmesi (Soru/Yorum®) 

-	 Değişikliğe uğrayan metinlerin işaretlenmesi, 

-	Hem online hem de offline çalışabilme (duruşmada, mahkeme salonunda, toplantıda, evde, arabada, uçakta ve teknede okumaya devam),

-	Smart Kitap ve Smart Mevzuat arasında dip notlar dahil olmak üzere serbest dolaşım,

-	Smart Kitap ve Smart Mevzuatta atıf yapılan madde ve paragrafların aynı sayfada görüntülenebilmesi, 

-	Uzman tarafından hazırlanmış içerik içinde nokta atışı arama yapma (metin, dipnotlar, etiketler, editör notları ve okuyucunun kendi notları için ayrı ayrı )

-	 Güncellemelerde okuyucu notlarının güncel versiyona aktarılması,

-	Etiketlenmiş Yargıtay, SPK, Rekabet Kurulu ve benzeri kararların ilgili madde başlarında görüntülenebilmesi, 

-	 Metin okurken video konferans izleyebilme, 

-	İçindekiler, arama ve sözlük uygulamaları ile ilgili kanun, tebliğ, kitap bölümlerinin, kavramların kolayca bulunabilmesi,

-	 Okuyucuların talep ettikleri belirli mevzuat ve dokümanları mail ile alabilmeleri, 

-	Okuyucuların Smart e-Kitap üzerinden inter aktif hesap (Hesap/Kitap) yapabilmeleri,

Doğru Hukuk Yayınları alanının en önde gelen akademik ve uygulama deneyimine sahip uzman hukukçular liderliğinde Smart E-Kitap ve Smart E-mevzuatlar yayınlayacaktır.

Doğru Hukuk Yayınlarının amacı her hukuk alanında o alanın profesyonellerinin tüm ihtiyaçlarını karşılayan, mevzuatı kolayca izleyebilecekleri interaktif temel başvuru eserleri yaratmaktır.

se Book - Kolay Hukuk SoruYorum® uygulaması sayesinde okuyucular soru ve yorumlarını editör ve yazarlarımıza iletebilecek ve güvenilir cevaplara ulaşabileceklerdir. 

se Book - Kolay Hukuk, bir hayalden doğmuştur. Her inovatif ürün gibi bir ihtiyaç ve bu ihtiyacın karşılanması için kurulan bir hayalden.

Projenin mimarı olan Dr. Halil Doğru'nun uzmanlık alanı olan, kanun, tebliğ, ilke kararı, uygulama ve mahkeme kararları ile nerdeyse her gün sürekli değişen Sermaye Piyasası Hukuku alanında görüş vermenin ve kalıcı bir kitap yazmanın zorlukları böyle bir uygulamaya olan ihtiyacı ortaya çıkarmıştır.

Amaç: mevzuat, içtihat, örnek uygulamalar ve bunlara ilişkin güncellemelerin, alanın en önde uzmanların yorum ve açıklamaları ile birlikte kitap formatında bir araya getirilmesi ve birbirleri ile irtibatlanmasıdır. İnteraktif özelliği sayesinde her Smart Elektronik Kitap, tüm sorulara cevap veren bir platform haline gelecektir. Okuyucular; sürekli güncellenen on binlerce sayfadan oluşan bu içeriğe işte, evde, toplantıda, mahkemede çalışır veya arabada, uçakta, teknede seyahat ederken kolayca ulaşılabilme imkanına sahip olacaktır.

Oldukça uzun süren çalışma sonrasında hayali kurulan özelliklerin tümüne sahip seBook - Kolay Hukuk uygulamasını ve bu uygulama için özel hazırlanmış Smart Elektronik Kitap ve Mevzuatları nihayet okuyucularımıza sunma gururunu yaşıyoruz.

Devrim yaratacak tüm bu özelliklerinden faydalanmaya başlayabilmek için ücretsiz se Book - Kolay Hukuk ® uygulamasını indirebilir ve tanıtım ürünlerimizden edinerek se Book -Kolay Hukuk'un emsalsiz özelliklerini hemen deneyebilirsiniz.

Title: senzaLIBRO
Description:
Sul treno o sull’autobus andando a scuola, 5 minuti a casa prima di cena, mentre aspetti un amico/a perennemente in ritardo… Mettiti alla prova con i quiz! Anche senza libro saprai tutto del Barocco. O come costruire una frase in italiano corretto.

I nuclei fondamentali del pensiero occidentale e i grandi autori... basta un colpo d'occhio per ripassare e essere pronti per l’interrogazione!
Scarica la app, fotografa la copertina del tuo libro Atlas (edizione 2019) e accedi senza login e password a:

- Video insoliti e curiosi per accendere la tua creatività e inquadrare gli argomenti nella realtà.
- Quiz a tempo e a difficoltà crescente per mettere alla prova le tue competenze e imparare per prove ed errori.
- Sintesi brevi e immediate per mettere in sicurezza i punti chiave di ogni capitolo. Anche in versione audio!
- Mappe espandibili per comprendere i nessi logici e visualizzare i contenuti più importanti del capitolo con esempi e immagini.

Ad eccezione dei video tutti contenuti sono disponibili anche offline. Portali sempre con te!
Preoccupato per la verifica? Scegli il capitolo da ripassare dall’Indice e ripassa in tre minuti.

I libri Atlas su cui è attiva l’applicazione sono:
Storie di scuola (aggiungere nota bibliografia?); Tieni il tempo, Un pianeta nelle tue mani, Geoskills, #artexpo L’albero della chimica, Gli infiniti del pensiero

Maggiori informazioni su www.edatlas.it

Title: sharedWriter
Description:
What is sharedWriter?

You have a great idea for a new story? Start writing it with sharedWriter! Get stuck? Publish your story so far and let other help you to go on with your story.

You start a new story, start writing your story. Publish it. Now everyone worldwide can read your story and edit it, if you allow! 

Yes, they can edit it, add content ... the result will be an even more amazing story as you have planned it in the beginning.

Of course you can define rules and limitations, so that your story stays on the main path and not changing completely.

Sound great! Create great stories! Amazing results! 

Still, you are the owner of the story, even that others has changed or added value to your story.

Finally, the app create automatically a eBook, that can be shared with others, not using this amazing application. The eBook can easily used in any eBook reader.

Title: shinanobook
Description:
本アプリケーションは、電子書籍ストア「シナノブックドットコム」で購入した電子書籍をダウンロード・閲覧するためのビューアーアプリです。

■ご利用方法■

(1)事前にサイトにて会員登録（無料）後、コンテンツをご購入・ご登録下さい。

(2)本アプリケーションをダウンロードして下さい。

(3)本アプリケーションを起動し、サイトで登録した会員情報にてログインしてください。

(4)ログイン後、Myページ（トランクルーム）にご購入・ご登録いただいたコンテンツが表示されます。「この書籍を読む」をタップすると、コンテンツが本アプリケーション内「My本棚」にダウンロードされます。

(5)「My本棚」から閲覧したいタイトルをタップすると、そのコンテンツを閲覧することができます。

Title: sidour sépharade
Description:
Nouveau sidour sur le marché, celui-ci est en adéquation parfaite à la demande du consommateur. Il reunis Chaharit, Minha, Arvit, la Kiryat Hatorah et un espace réunissant toutes les prières importantes et spécifiques. La présentation est simple, efficace et détaillé pour éclairer au mieux la navigation de son utilisateur.
La nomenclature et la police ont été étudié pour que l'utilisateur puisse bénéficier d'une facilité de lecture optimale.
Attention : ce sidour ne contient pas les prières de Chabatt pour des raisons évidentes.
Celle ci n'est pas conçu pour Ipad.

Title: sikhville
Description: SikhVille.org is an online virtual village that will enable Sikh parents to provide an interactive way for their children to be connected with Sikh culture, values, gurmukhi and Punjabi Culture.

Title: sinai
Description: יישום המאפשר האזנה לשיעורי הדף היומי מבית אתר סיני: שעורי "הדף היומי בעשר דקות" שנאמרים ע"י הרב אורי בריליאנט. השיעורים נאמרים ברהיטות יוצאת דופן בשפה בהירה השווה לכל נפש. השיעורים נערכים ע"פ שיטת לימוד מיוחדת המאפשרת סיכום של כל הדף בסדר הגיוני והכל בכעשר דקות

Title: skooly Buch
Description:
Die skooly-Buch App ist die Ergänzung zum digitalen Lehr- und Lernbuch auf skooly.at. 
* Download der Bücher (via Code) - danach ist keine Internetverbindung notwendig 
* Aktualisierung der Inhalte ohne Code
* Setzen von Lesezeichen
* Schnelles Durchblättern

Title: smallcircle
Description:
smallcircle is specifically designed to be a laser-focused, one-to-one experience, not a group study. The life-transforming power of smallcircle comes through the relational depth achieved through a one-to-one dynamic.

We avoid merely "learning" concepts that do not put principles into action. Each of the 24 chapters includes at least one "Lab" that brings the content to life by the phenomenon of a felt experience. The Labs have proven to be extremely effective in driving home the focus of each chapter.

smallcircle has a specific, sequential path. It begins by addressing broad, foundational spiritual concepts and then moves into the practical ways we live out our faith. Next, it transitions to a focus on our relationships with others and finishes with developing readiness to become a disciplemaker.

smallcircle includes a list of criteria that should be expected of a disciplemaker. But, it does not require extensive training for the disciplemaker. The material is simple to follow and easy to navigate.

smallcircle includes a heavy emphasis on reaching a depth in relationships beyond what is typical in church culture.

smallcircle not only focuses on making disciples, but producing disciplemakers. The entire last Module prepares the disciple to become a disciplemaker.

For more information about smallcircle, please visit:
www.disciplexchange.com

For questions or comments contact:
info@disciplexchange.com

Title: soccer game for toddlers
Description: 2014, Johannes Metzler

Title: sprechen
Description:
Mündliche Prüfung

Prüfungszeit für nicht behinderte Kandidatinnen und Kandidaten: 15 Minuten

Die Prüfungszeit für behinderte Prüfungsteilnehmer ist in den "Durchführungsbestimmungen" geregelt.

Die mündliche Prüfung besteht aus drei Teilen.

In Teil 1 sprichst du mit deiner Gesprächspartnerin oder deinem Gesprächspartner kurz über dich selbst, z. B. über deine Schule, Familie usw.
In Teil 2 sprichst du mit deiner Gesprächspartnerin oder deinem Gesprächspartner über ein Thema; dazu sollst du auch deine Meinung sagen.
In Teil 3 hast du die Aufgabe, zusammen mit deiner Gesprächspartnerin oder deinem Gesprächspartner etwas zu planen.

Die mündliche Prüfung dauert 15 Minuten.

Hilfsmittel wie zum Beispiel Wörterbücher oder Mobiltelefone sind in der richtigen Prüfung nicht erlaubt.

Beim Modul Sprechen zeigen Sie, dass Sie ausführlich frei vortragen sowie mühelos an einer Diskussion teil nehmen, dabei idiomatische Redewendungen angemessen benutzen und feinere Bedeutungsnuancen differenzieren. Sie haben zuvor 15 Minuten Zeit, den Vortrag über das ausgewählte Thema zu skizzieren und zu strukturieren. 

Modul Sprechen
Sie sprechen mit Ihrer Partnerin/Ihrem Partner über ein Thema des Alltags. Dabei reagieren Sie auf Fragen, äußern Ihre Meinung und machen Vorschläge.
Sie tragen eine Präsentation zu einem Thema aus dem Alltag frei vor und beantworten Fragen dazu.Das Prüfungsgespräch wird nach festgelegten Kriterien beurteilt.
Dauer: 15 Minuten

Title: sReader Lite
Description:
This is simple ebook reader application. 

Available format: epub, pdf, txt

Features(available to free version "sReader Lite")
- pre-installed english, french and japanese sample books
- scroll reading style
- epub file import from iTunes
- epub file download from safari

Pre-installed sample books
- A Study in Scarlet, Arthur Conan Doyle
- The Apple Tree, John Galsworthy
- A Dog of Flanders, Marie Louise de la Ramee
- The Adventures of Tom Sawyer, Mark Twain
- The Gift of the Magi, O. Henry

Additional Features(available to paid version "sReader")
- more samples books
- iPad Full Screen compatible
- UI Color Transparent
- change menu color
- rotation(landscape mode)
- full screen mode
- without advertisement

Title: ssparkl
Description: ssparkl is a high-performance, portable and dynamic viewing solution developed by diacriTech which enables users to read eBooks either online or offline. It allows users to open, view and manage all eBooks in a format similar to PDF with a user-friendly graphical interface. It has excellent portability enabling the reader to take their e-Reading library wherever required. It also provides a complete multimedia experience by supporting interactive features for eBooks such as video streaming, audio narration, content extraction, and animations. It is simple to use, with a well-structured and practical interface emphasizing on good ergonomics and speed. It supports both reflowable content where a book’s text is optimized for display on any screen size and fixed layout content where the page layout of a book is always maintained. It has been designed keeping the reader in mind by including many user settings to customize reading experience.

Title: stockholdingdms
Description:
Mobile application enables our clients to access their information with the convenience of Smartphone. The Stockholding VDR app fills the need of business professionals who have to review time sensitive document on the go.
Stockholding VDR is a simple and lightweight application that functions well without compromising any of its security features. User can view, copy/move, download and upload document.
Mobile app features:
•	Access all your data rooms in one single account protected with password.
•	Access any file types including Microsoft Office and PDF.
•	All documents are layered with and protected by tamperproof watermarks.
•	Protects document by restricting Screenshot function.
•	Secure, convenient and efficient way to store, share and track document access.
•	Dual Authentication for accessing the data room.
Download the app and easily access documents and content in a secure and compliant environment using your mobile phone. Application is free to download; however, mobile access to project data must be enabled by the site owner before data room can be accessed.

Title: storyplayr mobile
Description:
storyplayr is available on iPad and iPhone and gives unlimited access to hundreds of children's books and audio books. Help them acquire a taste for reading with hundreds of children's books to read and listen to alphabet books, fairy-tales, nursery-rhymes, classics, bilingual books...

storyplayr works online AND offline.

Read anywhere, at home, in planes, trains and automobiles, during week-ends or vacations. Your children's library is available anytime, anywhere on any device.

You can build your own collection of audio books, record your own voice and become the storyteller of your favorite books.

Share the passion from afar : Record a story and share it instantly with family and friends at home or halfway around the world.

Title: storytellinglite
Description:
Storytelling LITE - www.familykidsandgames.com
all THE BEST FAIRY TALES(In the lite version there are only some fairy tales) 
CARILLON background MUSIC (only one in the lite version) 
** automatic web updates (no new tale will be released into the lite version) **
** write your own fairy tales!! And share them with the rest of the world!! **
** Universal app for iPhone, iPod e iPad **

- Developed for optimum compatibility with all Apple devices: iPhone, iPod, and especially iPad.
- Works with all devices, both in portrait and in landscape.
- Starts with a wide range of fairy tales (not in lite version) in three different languages:English, Italian and French.
- Everybody can update the contents of the app: thanks to its exceptional characteristics, anybody can write their own fairy tale and store it on their device or share it with other users on the web. In this way all shared fairy tales will be automatically available for download by everybody (not lite version), in addition to being accessible by web through our new web site www.familykidsandgames.com.
A collection of classical fairy tales ready to be expanded with your personal creations, new ideas, new comments, for new morals, new metaphors, or just for fun.

- The App allows you to vote your favourite fairy tales and organise them in a separate listing
- You can record your own voice and listen to yourself (so children can learn whilst playing . . . or so parents can avoid reading the same story over and over again).
- The fairy tales selected by ManualiPc for their interactive version in this app have also special icons and images (the images are available only in the iPad version).
- Changeable font size to make reading easier
- Adjustable screen brightness to lower the amount of light emitted
- Fairy tales can be emailed to any recipient
- Errors and messages can be sent directly to ManualiPc through the app
- Beautiful carillon melodies can be chosen to accompany the reader

** CAUTION **
The stories and the endings narrated in certain fairy tales may influence children's or adults' sensibility; in certain cases there is no happy ending to the fairy tale, as we have strived to reproduce the classical fairy tales in their original version.

Title: study photo
Description: برنامج متكامل لتعديل صورك واضافة عليها بعض الفلاتر والقص وتعديل الالوان للتتناسب مع احترافية التصميم

Title: ta-tum
Description:
Ta​-​tum es una aplicación desde la que podrás acceder a una selección de obras literarias y disfrutar del placer de la lectura en soporte digital. Esta biblioteca reúne a importantes autores e ilustradores del panorama actual de la literatura infantil y juvenil y se configura como una de los pilares fundamentales de la plataforma educativa gamificada Ta-tum: libros que laten.

Esta herramienta digital, desarrollada por el Grupo Edelvives, permite a los usuarios realizar diferentes itinerarios cuyo fin será siempre potenciar el interés por la lectura entre los más jóvenes.

Con esta aplicación, los lectores podrán acceder a la lectura de los libros de su elección desde cualquier lugar y dispositivo, y leer como más cómodo les resulte:

• Cambiando la orientación del texto (horizontal o vertical), la tipografía o el tamaño de fuente.

• Escogiendo el color de las páginas de los libros: blanco, negro, gris o sepia.

• Accediendo directamente a una página del libro mediante el navegador de páginas, situado en la parte inferior del visor.

Title: tafsir ahlam : تفسير الأحلام حسب الحروف
Description:
تفسير الاحلام بالحروف بدون انترنت تطبيق مميز و مفيد لجميع الفئات فهو سهل الاستعمال و بسيط في عمله مميزات التطبيق :
تفسير ابن سيرين
يعمل بدون انترنت
تفسير رؤية سور القرآن
تفسير الأحلام بالمغربية
تفسير جميع الأحلام بالاحرف
tafsir ahlam تطبيق مميز نتمنى تحميله فهو مفيد و رائع

مميزات التطبيق :
1--حجمه الصغير على ذاكرة الهاتف حيث لا يأخذ مساحة كبيرة.
2- عدم الحاجة الى الاتصال بالأنترنت عند تصفح التطبيق.
3- خاصية حفظ صفحات معينة كعلامة يمكن الرجوع لها لاحقا.
4- المستخدم عندما يغلق التطبيق عند صفحة معينة من الكتاب ويرجع لفتح المكتبة بعد فتره معينة فأن التطبيق يفتح عند اخر كتاب كان يتصفحه المستخدم وكذلك عند اخر صفحة كان يتصفحها المستخدم.
5- امكانية تعديل الخط (صغير/ كبير) وكذلك خاصية تعديل لون الخلفية وايضا خاصية الاختيار بين القراءة الليلية او في النهار .
6- خاصية البحث في الكتاب .
واسأل الله العلي العظيم ان ينفع بها المسلمين ، وسبحانك اللهم وبحمدك أشهد أن لا إله إلا أنت أستغفرك وأتوب إليك.

Title: takealot eReader
Description:
Introducing the new takealot.com eReader app, free and optimised for your iPhone and iPad, making it easier to read your eBooks bought on takealot.com
 
Download and read English and Afrikaans eBooks on your favourite device. With just a tap you can highlight, bookmark and make notes on your favourite passages and personalise your page margins, font style and brightness. Browse your library in list view or a grid of covers, and organise your eBooks into collections.
 
FEATURES
- Night mode turns the text white and the page black, which may be easier on your eyes while reading in low light.
- Adjusting brightness with swipe gestures
- Increase or decrease text size
- Change the font styles
- Highlight paragraphs of text and make notes
- Adjust the margins allowing more or less text on a page
- Search for certain words or paragraphs in your eBook
- Different page turn animations available - choose from flip, slide, fade or cut
- View all your books in either a list or a grid of their covers
- Sort, organize collections and rename eBooks

Title: tapStory
Description:
tapStory enhances picture books with creative play. Kids animate characters and read the story out loud, and then play back their performances. They can also create their own stories based on existing characters and scenery! Characters can be moved, rotated, resized and flipped using simple gestures. Audio is recorded automatically as the reader narrates. All artwork from purchased stories is available for use in custom stories, and custom stories can be animated and played back just like existing ones. 


Features:

- Move, resize, rotate and flip characters and objects in the scene

- Record your voice and your actions and play them back as an animation with audio

- Play back just one scene or the entire story automatically

- Describe your recordings with text or a short video clip to save them for later

- Browse all story recordings from the Home screen and play them back at any time

- Create your own stories using art from all the stories you've purchased and then adding your own text

- Buy new stories to read and animate, and then use their illustrations in your own stories

- Buy new art packs to expand your library of items to use in your own stories

- Use an interactive tutorial to learn about the features of the app


tapStory comes with two free stories.

- Pea and Carrot: Meet Pea, who knows all about Carrot, but Carrot doesn't seem to know she exists. How can she get him to notice her? All of her vegetable friends want to help.

- Ten Birds: Learn to count with fun, feather-filled scenes.

More great stories are available for purchase within the app!


tapStory also comes with three free art packs.

- Animals and Hearts: 29 cute animals and decorative hearts in pastel colors.

- Kids: 24 kids of different ethnicities in three poses.

- Treehouse: A treehouse and huts on a blue sky day.

There are more art packs to purchase as well!

Title: tbc
Description:
有文字，但不只是小說       
有圖片，但不只是漫畫       
有影像，但不只是影片       
有聲音，但不只是廣播劇   
無以名狀，只因tbc…手機應用程式是從未有過的故事分享平台。

愛看故事的人可以全新形式體驗故事
創作故事的人憑多媒體拓闊想像空間

奇幻、驚憟、愛情、幽默、懸疑、都市系列
每個故事通過刺激觀眾感觀，讓其親歷其中，活出另一個世界。 

特點：
- 免費下載，零收費閱覽故事
- 成為會員，記錄故事日夜追
- 留言分享，與作者交流互動

想了解tbc…的理念，歡迎上 tbcstory.com

Title: tbr: book recommendations
Description: tbr is an app that lets you search for books, view books details and other book readers, and add books to your personal reading lists. Once your personal reading list is populated, you’ll be shown book recommendations based on the reading lists of like-minded people.

Title: testdee - HSK
Description:
Testdee - HSK 
The best application for testing HSK (Hanyu Shuiping Kaoshi) 汉语水平考试.

It’s not easy to get a high score on HSK (Hanyu Shuiping Kaoshi) 汉语水平考试if you have not practiced your skill.
You can practice both Listening and Reading parts of the HSK test at anytime , anywhere on your mobile or tablet.

This is the best application for you. You will improve your listening skill and reading skill.
This application allows you to access a Simulator Test which the real HSK examination.
This application will help you improve your score of HSK.
This application is to provide you a huge number of real HSK test.

Features:
•	real HSK test
•	offline mode availability
•	no internet connection necessary!
•	the score will be given at the end of the test.
•	clear and simple interface
•	easy to use.
•	many features for setting

Title: thebatesstudent
Description: This application was built to make the mobile web-site of 'The Bates Student' newspaper more readable on mobile devices. It is intended for anyone who wishes to know of information across the News, Forum, Sports, and Arts & Leisure Sections of the country's oldest college co-ed weekly.

Title: theFish
Description:
「theFish(ザ・フィッシュ)」はさまざまなAR（拡張現実）を体験できるARサービスアプリケーションです。このアプリケーションを通じて、本誌に掲載されているお店からのメッセージや商品紹介、お店の位置情報が表示されるエアタグ機能、オフラインで印刷物の閲覧など様々なARサービスが体験できます。

本アプリケーションでは、印刷物の写真をトリガーにしてARを構成するコンテンツ（音声・動画データ）を特定し、カメラ映像内の特定位置に合成し表示します。

■「AR」コンテンツはかざすだけで動画等が表示可能アプリを起動し「AR」ボタンを押したあとは、印刷物に掲載されている画像マーカーにかざすだけで動画等のコンテンツが再生されます。

■「リーフレット」はオフラインでも表示可能。

オフラインでもご覧頂けます。

【使用方法】
1.配布されている印刷物を用意します。
2.「theFish」を起動し、メニュー画面の一つ（「AR」や「マップ」など）を押します。
3.「AR」の場合、印刷物の中のマーカーとなる写真にかざすと、ARコンテンツの読み込みが開始され、動画など再生されます。
4.「マップ」の場合、近くのスポット情報を見ることができます。
5.「リーフレット」はオフラインで印刷物自体を読む事ができます。

Title: thien sieu toan tap
Description: Thiện Siêu Toàn Tập là những kinh sách biên soạn và dịch thuật của cố Trưởng lão Hoà thượng Thích Thiện Siêu Trú trì Tổ đình Từ Đàm Huế. Môn đồ tứ chúng để tâm sưu tập và phổ biến cho toàn thể mọi người những ai có nhân duyên học hỏi Phật pháp về những lời dạy của Đức Phật do trưởng lão Hoà thượng đã suốt đời tận tuỵ biên dịch. Với mong muốn phổ biến cho tất cả mọi người

Title: thien sieu toan tap ipad
Description: Thiện Siêu Toàn tập là những tác phẩm biên dịch của cố trưởng lão Viên trưởng Học Viện Phật Giáo Huế, Trú trì Tổ Đình Từ Đàm Huế. Ngài đã bỏ suốt cuộc đời vì Đạp pháp và dân tộc; nghiên cứu biên soạn, dịch thuật và giảng dạy đào tạo biết bao nhiêu học Tăng, học Ni đã trở thành những người nguyện hy sinh cuộc đời cho Phật giáo và dân tộc.

Title: thinka：DSE數學練習平台
Description:
Thinka允許你隨時隨地複習。網上練習均附有詳盡題解，讓你方便地了解自己的弱點，針對性地學習。學習資源也能助你複習及鞏固課堂上所學。

【MC練習】
- 自動核對及評分
- 詳盡題解
- 收藏題目

【數據統計】
- 各課題的表現
- 全港排名
- 不同時間的表現

Title: thinkSo띵쏘 - 좋은 글을 배달합니다.
Description:
▶ 북큐레이터가 엄선한 책 속의 한 문장!
ㅇ 지나치게 많은 글은 머릿속을 어지럽게 할 뿐이죠. 
띵쏘는 북큐레이터가 엄선한 한 문장을 드립니다.
ㅇ 문장을 읽고나서 해당 도서를 찾아 읽어보세요. 더 큰 감동을 받을 수 있을 거예요.
ㅇ 띵쏘는 독자들을 좋은 책으로 이끄는 가교가 될 것을 약속드립니다.

▶ 문장과 결합된 이미지 
ㅇ 멋진 이미지와 합성된 글귀를 통해 감동이 더해집니다.
ㅇ 이미지를 저장해서 배경화면이나 프로필 이미지로 사용해보세요.

▶ 다양한 SNS에 가능한 공유기능
ㅇ 카톡, 밴드, 카스 등 대부분의 SNS에 공유 가능
ㅇ 사랑하는 이들과 감동적인 글귀를 공유하세요.

▶ 함께 만드는 thinkSo
ㅇ 문장에 대한 느낌을 남겨주세요.
ㅇ 에디터는 여러분의 댓글을 먹고 살아갑니다...^ ^

▶ 언제든지 좋은 의견을 주세요.
ㅇ thinkso7gnc@gmail.com


■ 주요 기능
- 아침, 저녁 하루 두번 찾아오는 감동적인 글귀
- 전문 북큐레이터와 에디터가 제작한 고해상도 이미지 컨텐츠 
- 감동 받은 글귀를 SNS에 공유하는 기능
- 설정을 통해 원하는 시점에 글귀를 받는 기능
- 띵쏘, 띵소, thinkso

Fax 02-824-9872

Title: tiny poems
Description: For the first time „tiny poems“ brings concrete minimal poetry to mobile devices like Apple Watch, iPhone and iPad. The pieces are optimized for the screen of the Apple Watch and show short and dynamic texts for the wrist. The poems reflect time and vanity and change constantly according to the continuosly passing time.

Title: tinylibrary
Description:
tinylibrary™ is a simple EBook reader that is extremely lightweight and minimalistic.

It currently supports Dark Mode, Autoscrolling, and automatic encoding detection. It also supports saving webpages for offline reading.

It aims to use the absolute minimum amount of power via efficient resource management to let you enjoy your reading experience for the longest possible time.

tinylibrary™ pledges to be forever Ad-Free.

Email me at tinylibrary@scott-liu.com if you wish to request additional features or if you encounter any problems.

Title: tiReader: eBook Reader
Description:
tiReader is the best way to read eBooks, Audiobooks and Comics on iPhone or iPad.
Get access to 1000000+ free eBooks in OPDS-catalogs and Calibre servers.

Support all popular formats
• eBooks (epub, pdf, djvu, fb2, mobi, prc, azw, html, txt)
• AudioBooks (M4B, M4A, MP3)
• Comics (cbr, cbz)
• Photos (jpg, png, bmp, gif, ico, tif, xbm)
• Photo Albums (zip, rar)

CORE FEATURES
• Customizable ebooks and folders structure
• Powerful tool set for searching, filtering and working with tags
• Multicolor Bookmarks and Annotation
• Fully customizable style and color themes for eBooks
• Sync across all your devices

EXTRA FEATURES
• Day and Night modes
• Access to Clouds, OPDS-catalogs and Calibre servers
• Support of EPUB3 format eBooks with built-in multimedia content
• Bookmark and Annotation search across all docs in Library (iPad only)
• Open multiple docs at once (iPad only)

HELP and FEEDBACK
http://tireader.com/help
http://tireader.com/contact

Please note: tiReader does not support DRM-protected eBooks and comics.

The free app version allows you to work with five documents only. Delete unnecessary documents to access others or remove this restriction with an in-app purchase "Unlock Full Version".

Privacy policy: http://tireader.com/privacy_policy

Title: titleShare
Description:
The new advance listening copy audiobook sharing tool specifically designed for Publishers, Agents and Authors. 

titleShare provides publishers with the tools to securely share audiobook titles with anyone.

The titleShare mobile app allows your authors, agents, marketers or anyone else to enjoy your pre-release audiobooks in a secure and controlled manner.

titleShare by Booktrack is specifically designed to make the distribution, administration, and listening of your audiobooks a simple and delightful experience.

Contact sales@booktrack.com to set up a test account.

Title: tmm - Chat Fiction Stories
Description:
Each ‘tmm’ story is short & chat-style, as if you’re secretly reading someone’s text message conversations! YOU move the story forward by simply tapping to reveal the next part! The most mind-blowing twists & turns! We bet you will keep saying ‘TELL ME MORE’!
 
Feed your curiosity, snoop on private chats and take a peek at secret stuff!  The very BEST & addictive collection of short 'just-one-more-message' stories with big hooks! Intense, Shocking, Addictive, Heart-Pumping, just everything & all at once! Get excited about reading, again! 
 
Get ready for the series of nail-biting suspense, crazy twists, unguessable turns you won’t see coming with every next ‘tell-me-more’ tap! As you read, ‘tmm’ keeps you on hook & chewing your fingers till the very end! 
 
Browse through a huge library and choose your favorite genre! Romance, drama, fantasy, horror, mystery, thriller, comedy and more! Find exactly what you're looking for!
 
Get your daily dose of storytelling thrills even if you don’t have much time for reading! 

We’d love to hear from you! Share your feedback with us: support@exosmart.uk.com

Get ‘tmm’ Premium
 
Subscribe to Premium to get the unlimited access to the entire collection of addictive stories with no time limits! 
 
-3 subscription options: weekly, monthly, annual.
-By subscribing you get unlimited access to all the app’s functionality for the whole duration of your subscription period. 
-Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. 
-Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. 
-Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. Renewal equals to the initial subscription chosen and its current price unless a special price is offered.
-You can cancel a free trial, manage your subscription and turn off the auto-renewal anytime through your Account Settings. This must be done 24 hours before the end of a free trial or subscription period to avoid being charged. 
-Privacy Policy: http://exosmart.uk.com/index.php/privacy-policy/
-Terms of Use: http://exosmart.uk.com/index.php/terms-of-use/
-As soon as you purchase a subscription, any unused part or time-span of a free trial period will be forfeited.

Title: tnmsc
Description: The Transactions of Nonferrous Metals Society of China, founded in 1991, superintended by the China Association for Science and Technology, and sponsored by The Nonferrous Metals Society of China, is now published monthly; it mainly contains reports of original research which reflect progress in the field of nonferrous metals science and technology, including mineral processing, extraction metallurgy,with the emphasis on materials science and engineering.

Title: tolino reading app
Description:
Over 2 million eBooks and audiobooks are waiting for you! Transform your iPhone or iPad into an eReader or audiobook player app with tolino.
Discover an almost endless selection of books in the eBook shops of Thalia, Weltbild, Hugendubel, eBook.de, bücher.de, Mayersche, Osiander, Orell Füssli, buch.ch and tolino’s meineBUCHhandlung partner bookstores. You decide which tolino bookstore you would like to buy your eBooks from in the tolino app.
	
Your mobile library, available everywhere and at all times.
Do you want to read EPUB eBooks and PDF eBooks and listen to audiobooks easily and flexibly on the go? The tolino reading app provides you with boundless reading and listening pleasure for your device at all hours. Simply download the tolino app, buy eBooks and audiobooks from your tolino bookstore, synchronize your titles in the app and download them, and your library will also be available offline at any time.

Read eBooks with tolino – all functions at a glance:

- Read EPUB and PDF e-Books on your iPhone or iPad on the go
- Vary your reading settings based on your preferences when it comes to font size, font type, brightness, landscape or portrait format, ...
- Safe your eBooks flexibly with the help of the tolino cloud, download them anytime and read eBooks offline
- Conveniently synchronize your reading progress, notes and highlights thanks to the tolino cloud - Organize your books in manageable collections and synchronize them, for example, using the tolino eBook Reader                                                                                                                           - Highlight passages or quotes in the blink of an eye and write personal notes right in the text of your eBook with ease
- Search your eBooks for any words or text passages you wish using the practical search function
- Change the background color of your eBook in the blink of an eye while you read, e.g. from night mode to a sepia setting
- Read EPUB & PDF books from German public libraries (e.g. Onleihe) using the tolino app

*NEW* Literature to listen to – your personal storyteller

As old as time but never more up to date: we love stories and what we love most is having them read to us! Car Mode, sleeptimer and adjustable playback speed - audiobook lovers will also get their money’s worth with tolino. 
Lean back and relax with fantastic audiobooks, enthralling radio plays and powerfully voiced readings. On your way to work, while traveling, while doing the ironing, at yoga, in the bath or simply while falling asleep, the tolino app breathes new life into your books and will take you to strange new worlds, word by word.
The tolino app is also an excellent sleeping aid... Simply turn on the sleep timer and let yourself be whispered to sleep ;)

Listen to audiobooks with tolino – an overview of the functions:

- Convenient audiobook app with sleeptimer function and simplified operation in Car Mode
- Individually adjustable playing speed for audiobooks
- Flexible backup of audiobooks in the tolino cloud, download at any time and listen to audiobooks offline
- Sort your audiobooks into manageable collections and synchronize them, e.g. with tolino webreader or other devices


A unique tolino benefit for all tolino readers.
Enjoy complete autonomy when deciding which new eBooks & audiobooks to buy thanks to the unique tolino library link. Conveniently link the eBook libraries of different tolino bookstores and display all books and audiobooks in an overall library view. All the titles in your tolino shops in one app – saving room and providing a perfect overview of your bookcase.


Read free eBooks samples and listen to free audiobooks samples before you consider buying.

Browse through free reading samples from current bestsellers and new releases, e.g. by Jussi Adler-Olsen, Catherine Steadman, Celeste Ng, Charlotte Link, Stephen King or Nora Roberts - available in the online shop of your tolino bookseller.

Title: tourTurkish+
Description:
*** The essential 720 Phrases  +  1000 Words
*** 100% Audio Support from Native Speaker
*** No more charge in-app purchases + No required internet connect

Are you planning a travel to Turkey? or Do you want to learn Turkish language? 
then ‘Tour Turkish’ will have a strong helper.

Turkish people have a great love and pride of their language. So they feel like it’s a compliment when a foreigner speaks to them in Turkish. A few Turkish words will go a long way. 
‘Tour Turkish’ has been designed to help travelers interact with the locals. 720 conversations and 1000 basic words are classified according to the situation in which travelers can meet. So you can find phrase or word easily.

And every phrase and word supports native speaker audio without internet connect. 


** Highlights
1. The most essential 720 Phrases and 1000 Words

2. Native speaker audio  
   - No Internet requried & No more charge 
 
3. Select word at the base sentence and make your phrases.

4. Add commonly used phrases to your favorites

5. Search for specific phrases and words easily.

6. Flash card
   - When you conversate with the locals, you can show your flash card. 

7. And Uesful tour informations


** Conversation Categories
- Greeting
- Common Phrases
- Introduce
- Airport
- Restaurant
- Transport
- Bank, Exchange office
- Hotel
- Direction
- Time
- Weather
- Tour 
- Shopping 
- Visit
- Health (Hospital, Pharmacy, Symptom)



** Word Categories
- Number
- Essential Verbs
- Date
- People
- Tour
- Food & Drinking
- Direction
- Transport
- Stuff
- Job
- Body
- Color
- Turkey cites
- Country

Title: tractatus infinitus VR
Description:
This app is best viewed with Google Cardboard and other 3D mobile virtual reality headsets.

A poetic audio-visual hallucination inspired by Ludwig Wittgenstein’s Tractatus logico-philophicus in virtual reality.
Fly through the acoustic and visual echoes of the literary traces of Wittgenstein’s logic terms and sentences. Change the course of the erratic computer generated script by gazing at gigantic three-dimensional letter clusters that drag you into their mysterious signs and shapes. Travel through words and listen to the eerie soundscape that surrounds them. tractatus infinitus is an infinite journey through philosophy, sound poetry and typographic landscapes.

Title: trains coloring book - My Apps Colorings Books For Kids Free
Description:
trains Coloring Book for free game for kids. Painting gives lots of fun and is great for kid. Help kids to develop their creativity and Improve their hand-eye coordination.

Bring your favourite colors come painting with this trains coloring book! Whether you love reds, blues, greens, pinks, or any other color you can be fun with create a masterpiece by colouring amazing pictures.

Features: 
• Easy to play 
• Choose from the available pictures which one you want to paint. 
Features: 
• Choose paint colors and choose the desired size
• Paint the picture selected by visionary.
• Show your wonderful images to all your family and see their reaction. 
• Choose another image and have fun trying your skills at creating a new masterpiece.

Title: trboRdr
Description:
Use TrboRdr to read classic books fast on the run.  Ever wanted to read war and peace, but didn't have the time? Now you can fit in reading as you exercise with an app designed to maximize your reading time and to minimize distracting page turns and scanning for your position on the page.

Single reading field allows you to focus on text and stop wasting time scanning for the next line. 
Large clear font ideal for reading while exercising on a treadmill or stationary bike.
Featuring classic novels including:
  A Tale of Two Cities
  Alice's Adventures in Wonderland
  War and Peace
  Grimm's Fairy Tales
  Pride and Prejudice
  The Yellow Wallpaper
  Ulysses
  The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes
Intuitive user interface with Apple Watch integration. 
Skip back/forward while reading with a left or right swipe
Pause by clicking anywhere on the screen
Large "Start" button allows you to continue reading quickly.
We hope you enjoy TrboRdr!

Title: vietnamese japanese "jdict"
Description:
Từ điển jdict phiên bản iOS được viết với mục đích giúp cho những người đang học hay là công việc có liên quan tới tiếng nhật dễ dàng hơn trong việc tra cứu.
Đặc biệt dữ liệu đã được convert lại khá nhỏ gọn nhưng mà không hề thua kém các bộ từ điển việt - nhật đang có trên PC.

■ Tính năng cơ bản:
・ Tra từ, xem history, thêm vào favorite
・ Nhận dạng chữ kanji viết tay (chế độ online và offline)
・Dịch đoạn văn
・ Tra từ bằng romaji
・ Xem cách viết kanji offline
・ Phát âm tiếng nhật
・Tra ngữ pháp

■ Dữ liệu
・ Việt nhật ~ 55000 từ (có sẵn)
・ Nhật việt ~ 220000 từ (có sẵn)
・ 4000 kanji words 

■ Chú ý:
・Khi vẽ kanji nếu vẽ đúng thứ tự thì kết quả sẽ chính xác hơn

Title: twinhorn-綺發機械
