Title: u-CAT標準模試＋
Description:
韓国YBM NET社（＊）が開発し、語学書で伝統ある朝日出版社が日本向けにカスタマイズした英語学習アプリです。
（＊韓国YBM NET社＝ 韓国でTOEIC(R) Programを実施・運営している会社です。）

問題の質の高さ、スコアの正確さ、弱点克服学習の効率の良さなどの点で、他の追随を許さない信頼性があります。

■どんなレベルの人もスコアアップ
「学習内容」の欄で後述するように、模擬テストで正確な実力分析をした上で、ユーザーひとりひとりに最適な弱点克服学習を
提供します。ですから、200点台から900点台まで、どんなレベルの人にも学習効果を発揮するアプリです。
本アプリの母体となっているPC用ソフト「u-CAT」の場合、団体採用の学校様・企業様では、平均100点以上アップの例も多く見
られます。

■シリアルナンバーの必要性【重要】
本アプリ自体は無料ですが、下記の学習機能を有効にするには、専用シリアルナンバーの入力が必要になります。お持ちでない
方は、アプリ内のシリアルナンバー入力画面の表示に従ってご購入ください。

■学習内容
・4回の模擬テストと3回の弱点克服学習が受けられます。
・模擬テストは100問・1時間のハーフテストで、途中での中止・再開が自由。
・テスト終了後すぐに、スコア、◯×一覧、詳細な実力分析レポートが見られます。
・実力分析に基づいて、あなたに最適の弱点克服学習を課します。
・弱点克服学習の内容はユーザーごとに異なり、同じユーザーでも回ごとに異なります。
・弱点克服学習は弱点パート学習、弱点パターン学習、レベルアップ学習に分かれます。
・弱点克服学習は3種それぞれ50問で構成され、1回当たり計150問になります。

■学習の流れ
模擬テスト ▶ テスト結果に基づく弱点克服学習 ▶ 学習成果を次の模擬テストで確認 ▶
 そのテスト結果に基づく新たな弱点克服学
習 ▶ ……という流れで、効率的に実力をアップさせます。

■PCと連動
本アプリでの学習はWindows PCに連動させて行うことが可能です。リスニングセクションなどの学習は通勤・通学時にスマート
フォンで行い、Part 7の長文読解などには自宅のPCでじっくり挑む、といった使い分けに便利です。


■ 購読課金(Non-Renewable Subscription)について
このアプリケーションは、アプリ内課金の購読機能(Non-Renewable Subscription)を利用しています。
・学習を開始するにはアプリ内課金で4,100円が必要です。
・課金後、１年間アクセス可能です。
・学習内容をすべて終了した、または学習期間が終了した後に利用更新ができます。 利用更新のアプリ内課金は3,200円です。
・自動継続はされませんので再度ご購入ください。
・ご利用料金の日割り計算は行なっておりません。
・支払いはiTunesアカウントにて行われます。
・学習の有効期間中は、現在の課金をキャンセルすることは出来ません。

※価格は予告なしに変動する場合がございます。予めご了承ください。

---------------------------------------------------------
TOEIC is a registered trademark of Educational Testing Service (ETS).
This product is not endorsed or approved by ETS.
---------------------------------------------------------

Title: uBooks XL
Description:
uBooks is an alternative reading app. Its features include handy reading screen and bookshelf. You can download ebooks not only via browser, wi-fi, and FTP, but also via OPDS catalogues.
Keep your progress reading, bookmarks and highlights up-to-date everywhere using iCloud.

uBooks is an application for reading electronic books.
This e-reader supports various formats of eBooks and has a number of unique features for convenient reading.
uBooks has 2 types of settings: global settings (located in device’s settings) and local ones and allows you to customize the reading screen: change font type, its color and size, background for day and night modes etc.

The app has the online translator, which support around 20 languages.
One of the most convenient features of uBooks is smooth autoscroll.
Supported e-book formats:
•.epub
•.txt
•.fb2
•.fb2 in .zip-archive
•.fb2 in .rar-archive
Document formats supported in Reduced Functionality Mode:
•.pdf
•.rtf
•.html
•images (in .jpg, .png,  .bmp)
•Microsoft Office
•iWork
Download books:
•Wi-Fi - http server
•Wi-Fi - ftp server
•Built-in Web Browser
•iTunes
•OPDS catalogs
Text Settings:
•Day / Night mode
•Font size
•Font type
•Font color
•Reading background
•Row interval
•Horizontal / Vertical margins
•Text selection
•Encoding for .txt files
Application features:
•Smooth autoscroll
•Full justification/left alignment of text
•Curl animation
•Customizable tap zones
•Word hyphenation
•Online translator
•Language choice (English, Russian)

Any suggestions regarding functionality, content and future updates are warmly welcomed and will be processed promptly.
uSupport@nixsolutions.com

Title: udn 讀書館
Description:
The exclusive service and new experience. The udn library app integrates the major libraries’ lending services, providing readers free mobile borrowing services of electronic books, magazines, and newspaper. Download the udn library app on your mobile devices, you can enjoy reading anywhere. Plus, you can read the latest, most popular, and most abundant contents the way you like.
 
# All Libraries in one app
The udn library app provides readers with e-books borrowing services from all the cooperated libraries. Log in with your library accounts or mobile library accounts, and access to all digital reading contents from the libraries for free.
 
# The innovative user interface
In our app, you can borrow all the library e-books with a single bookshelf, and borrow e-books via QR Codes. Enjoy the simple and fluently app experience.
 
# The complete digital library experience
You can borrow or reserve the e-books you like in digital libraries, and the e-books you borrowed will be returned automatically when they are dated. Your personal reading progress and history will also be recorded. Moreover, you can highlight the lines you like and take notes in the e-books.
 
# Offline reading
The electronic books, magazines, and newspaper can be downloaded to your devices, and be read without internet services.
 
# PDF and EPUB Formats are supported
You can switch between the tablet-friendly PDF format and the phone-friendly EPUB format freely. 
 
# User-friendly reading settings
-Electronic books, magazines, and newspapers of the PDF format-
‧ The screen brightness is adjustable in time
‧ Switch your reading direction freely
‧ Your zoom-in setting will be applied to all pages automatically 
- E-books of the EPUB format-
‧ The screen brightness is adjustable in time
‧ Adjust text size and page width
‧ Switch between "daytime" and "Night" reading mode freely
‧ Select your page changing mode between "turning" and "scrolling."
 
# Abundant and amazing digital contents
Cooperating with hundreds of publishers, providing tens of thousands of e-books, latest e-magazines, and daily e-newspapers of the UDN group, you can definitely find the digital contents you like.

Title: udn讀書吧
Description:
「udn 讀書吧」行動閱讀服務，會員可在 APP 內瀏覽、借閱、下載及閱讀 PDF、EPUB 電子書和 PDF 電子雜誌和報紙。

# 整合線上書城，瀏覽、下載、閱讀一步到位
提供電子書刊及報紙行動閱讀服務，登入 APP「讀書吧」 即可直接瀏覽各類暢銷電子書、雜誌及報紙，亦可索取免費電子書刊及報紙。

# 整合電子書刊月租服務
提供「udn讀客包」電子書刊月租吃到飽服務，登入 APP「讀客包」，即可索取免費體驗包，或選購月租暢讀方案，數千本電子書刊持續更新不間斷，以最划算的方式閱讀最多、最新、最豐富的電子書刊內容。

# 整合圖書館電子書借閱服務
採用「udn 讀書館」電子書借閱服務的圖書館，以行動借閱帳號登入 APP「讀書館」，即可瀏覽線上圖書館、下載借閱的電子書刊與報紙閱讀。

# 雲端同步、即時下載
登入 APP，立即和雲端書房同步，下載已購買或借閱的電子書、雜誌、報紙，並可自由管理書櫃。

# 支援離線閱讀
已下載至 APP 的電子書刊或報紙，沒有網路連線也可以開啟，隨時隨地享受閱讀樂趣。

# 同時支援 PDF、EPUB2.0／3.0 格式電子書
可自由切換「原版式的 PDF」或「圖文重排的 EPUB」電子書。EPUB電子書除了提供比過去更美觀的閱讀版面外，更支援觀看多媒體（音樂、影片、Slide Show、影片、即時地圖等）。

# 跨載具同步「閱讀進度」、「書籤」和「筆記」
只要安裝「udn讀書吧」APP 的行動載具，相同格式的同一本書，便可相互同步閱讀進度、書籤和筆記。

# 整合 Facebook、Google+ 社群分享功能，輕鬆分享書櫃藏書或閱讀心得。

# 方便的閱讀輔助功能
- PDF 電子書、雜誌和報紙 -
‧自動記憶閱讀進度
‧目錄隨選章節閱讀
‧標記及管理書籤
‧書寫筆記，並可透過 email 匯出筆記
‧整合地圖、翻譯和維基百科

- EPUB 電子書 -
‧自動記憶閱讀進度
‧目錄隨選章節閱讀
‧標記及管理書籤
‧選取文字段落可「劃線」、「劃螢光筆」或「寫筆記」
‧輸入關鍵字可做全文檢索

# 人性化的閱讀設定
- PDF 電子書、雜誌和報紙 -
‧即時調整螢幕亮度
‧智慧判斷每本書最佳閱讀方向
‧橫式螢幕下可自由切換單頁、對頁模式
‧可鎖定頁面放大比例，無須逐頁重新設定

- EPUB 電子書 -
‧即時調整螢幕亮度
‧即時調整頁面文字大小、版面邊寬
‧自由切換「白天」或「夜晚」閱讀模式
‧依喜好選擇「左右翻頁」或「上下捲動」閱讀

Title: ulaBook
Description:
"En UlaBook, los libros usados que ya no quieres conservar podrán tener una segunda vida.

Regístrate en menos de 30 segundos y sube fácilmente los libros que quieres vender.

Si estás buscando un libro, utiliza nuestro buscador y localiza los que tienes más cercanos a través de nuestro servicio de geolocalizacion. Una vez lo hayas encontrado, ponte en contacto con el vendedor a través de nuestro chat y llega a un acuerdo con él.

Así de fácil “.

Title: uLIBRARY
Description:
The uLIBRARY app makes it easy to browse, borrow and listen to your library's eAudiobooks and read their eBooks on your smart phone or tablet.
 
You can use uLIBRARY if your library has joined our digital service. Download from the App Store for FREE and log-in with your library membership details to access your library's collection of our eAudiobooks and eBooks.
 
BROWSE
- Easy to browse by format and genre
- Search by title, author, narrator, and genre
- Each eAudiobook has an audio preview
- eBooks have a preview
- See how many titles you have available to borrow and how many you have on loan at any time
 
BORROW
- Borrow or, if out on loan, reserve for later
- Receive automatic notification of when reserved titles become available (requires email details)
- Receive automatic notification when nearing end of loan period (requires email details)
- Receive automatic notification if a title has been borrowed but not yet downloaded (requires email details)
- Renew eAudiobook and eBook loans (if title has not been reserved by another user)
- Return eAudiobook and eBook loans before the loan period expires
- Title automatically deletes from your My Account screen on loan expiry, so no more overdue fees
- Full list of previously downloaded titles always available
 
LISTEN
- Listen offline
- Automatically saves your current position in book
- Lock screen widget for quick and easy access to playback controls of eAudiobook
- Play eAudiobooks in the background whilst using other apps
 
READ
- Read offline
- Built in eReader
- Bookmark your page
- Change font and font size, including ability to use  dyslexic specific fonts
 
We hope our eAudio and eBooks give you many hours of listening and reading pleasure.

Title: unfoldingWord
Description: unfoldingWord is a Bible and discipleship resource app in multiple languages.  No Internet required.

Title: unrd - chat and text stories
Description:
**the future of storytelling** Apple							
**the hottest new thing in entertainment** London Evening Standard							
**innately intriguing chat stories** New Statesman							
							
At unrd we give you access to your favourite characters phone.							
							
We’ve been described by The App Store as ‘the future of storytelling’ and we can’t wait for you to find out why….							
							
Dive into a world of crime, mystery, horror, romance and reality stories - all told through a character’s phone. Stories unfold through a series of chat messages, photos, gripping live videos, voice notes and social media profiles.							
							
You’re not the only one reading - chat with other readers in the app. Discuss theories and clues, your favourite characters, and make new friends along the way!							
							
Our biggest hits to date include:							
							
Last Seen Online: a gripping crime mystery. Amy has gone missing. Who was responsible? What were the circumstances? Over 7 days, uncover the truth through her text messages, photos, videos and voice notes.							
							
My Last 3 days: a horror story for the mobile age. Josie is a YouTube sensation and she’s got a stalker. Can you figure out who it was? Follow the story over 3 episodes and be ready to be shocked, surprised and scared.							
							
Sarah’s Secret: what if you had access to someone’s phone that’s having an affair? Read Sarah’s messages and figure out who the mystery man is. Will it end it end in joy or tears?							
							
Found (featuring Joe Sugg): imagine having access to your favourite YouTuber’s phone. Follow along in this feel good story as Joe meets the love of his life!							
							
Reviews of unrd:							
							
5/5: “This is the first chat story app that’s made me cry, laugh and scared”							
5/5: “The most addicting chat story app I’ve ever tried”							
5/5: “I’m hooked on every story! Can’t wait to read it every time a new message comes through!”							
							
You can start reading gripping chat stories for free with unrd.							
							
We offer a subscription that unlocks additional content in the app, early access and behind the scenes / making of videos.							

------------------------------------

Subscription pricing and terms

unrd offers a range of subscription offers:

$9.99/month auto renewing subscription

$19.99 3 month/auto renewing subscription

$29.99/year auto renewing subscription

These provide you unlimited access to all content on unrd. 

Payment will be charged to the credit card connected to your iTunes Account when you confirm the initial subscription purchase. Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current subscription period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and the cost of the renewal will be identified. You may manage your subscription and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to your Account Settings after the purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when you purchase a subscription, where applicable.

Read more about our terms and conditions here:

Terms of service: https://unrd.co/terms-and-conditions/

Privacy policy: https://unrd.co/privacy-policy/

Title: unrealBook
Description:
unrealBook allows you to access your entire library of music or lyrics on your iPad with ease. Replace your bulky and heavy binders with a small and light device filled with your music PDF files. The alphabetized and indexed list makes it easy to find the song you are looking for. unrealBook is the answer for the gigging musician!
Please check the reviews. 4.5 stars!!!!!! unrealBook is being used on tour with Billy Joel - see October 2014 and July 2016 Keyboard Magazine!

unrealBook was one of the first apps for displaying music charts on stage. The evolution continues as many musicians use it on stage every day. This product is the result of input from many users. 

Yes, unrealBook supports PDF Table of contents, user created indexes, bookmarks, keywords. You can even convert the PDF table of contents into indexes. It has been able to do these features for a while.

"I LOVE unrealBook"
"unrealbook is just an awesome app"
"On gigs people are always asking about it and I am always telling them about unrealBook. Thanks for the great app and the great support. Awesome!"
"Have been using unrealBook in live band set up for a year or so – really useful app my man, thank you."
"I want to thank you for creating unrealBook! I love it!"
"I just wanted to let you know that I used unrealBook extensively on my most recent rehearsal and show….couple of weeks ago and it performed flawlessly"
"I absolutely LOVE your APP on my iPad"
"I love the page turning, it's instant and also the Index is the right size for my fingers! 
Love not having to carry big books to work! It's so neat!"
"I love unrealBook so thanks !!"


•Replace your bulky and heavy binders with a small and light iPad filled with your music PDF files. The alphabetized and indexed list makes it easy to find the song you are looking for. 
•No more asking for a light for your music stand on dark stages. 
•No more worrying about a breeze turning a page by accident. 
•Search for a song quickly and easily. 
•Create bookmarks that allow you to easily load up a large PDF and go directly to a page within. 
•Use bookmarks and PDF files together to create set lists for different gigs. 
•Hot spots allow you place highlighted areas on the page that allow you to jump from one page or document to another when pressed (think To Coda and D.S. signs). 
•There is a built in music player so you can listen to your music while you check out the score!
•Connect to the world via email, AirDrop, Dropbox and Box support.
•Annotate your scores with auto-highlighted text and colored pens with different sizes.
•Create set lists easily. Jump to any song in a set list directly or step through the set list sequentially.
•Assign an iPad as a master and have multiple iPads slaved via bluetooth or WiFi!
•Record your rehearsals or your band on stage, all while reading music in unrealBook!
•Take pictures of a chart on a gig and create a PDF that you can use on stage.
• Airturn Support for turning pages.
• Use the iRig BlueBoard to jump directly to D.S. and CODA in a document via foot switches.
• AirDrop an entire set list of files between two AirDrop compatible devices - including unrealBook Mobile on iPhone.

Title: vBooks - Đọc Sách Offline
Description:
vBooks - Ứng dụng đọc Sách hoàn toàn miễn phí và không giới hạn!
Cảm ơn các bạn đã quan tâm ứng dụng vBooks - Sách Truyện miễn phí, không giới hạn lượt tải!

* Ứng dụng được thiết kế giao diện tuyệt đẹp, tối ưu nhất cho người đọc sách trên thiết bị iPhone, iPad, hỗ trợ từ iOS 8 trở lên.

* Các chức năng chính:
- Tải về không giới hạn.
- Đồng bộ sách từ Google Drive.
- Tùy chọn font chữ, màu nền, cỡ chữ.
- Tùy chọn theme cho ứng dụng.
- Đăng nhập, bình luận, vote các sách mà các bạn yêu thích.

* Các thể loại chính: Sách được đội ngũ vBooks biên soạn kỹ lưỡng, bao gồm hầu hết các thể loại mà người đọc sách ưu chuộng nhất hiện nay.
- Sách Kinh Tế - Quản lý
- Sách Chính Trị
- Sách Kỹ Năng Sống
- Sách Tâm lý, Tình cảm
- Sách Y Học - Sức Khỏe
- Sách Lịch Sử - Quân sự
- Sách Triết học - Tử vi - Phong thủy.
- Sách Trinh Thám - Hình sự.
- Tiểu thuyết tình cảm
- Tiểu thuyết ngôn tình
- Truyện tiên hiệp
- Truyện kiếm hiệp

* Các bạn có thể đọc các bộ sách truyện thoải mái bằng ứng dụng mà không cần sử dụng các ứng dụng, trang web sách truyện khác như sachvui, ebook full, downloadsach, sach tot, webtruyen (web truyện), truyenfull (truyện full) , tangthuvien, sstruyen (ss truyện), bachngocsach....

Mọi góp ý bình luận các bạn có thể gửi về email hỗ trợ trong ứng dụng, hoặc đăng bài công khai trên mạng xã hội với hashtag #vbooks

Chúc các bạn có những thời gian đọc sách vui vẻ sau mỗi ngày học tập, làm việc!

Title: vBookz Audiobooks
Description:
The cutting edge vBookz  Audiobooks has advanced text-to-speech high quality voices with 17 languages. It's the best way to follow and read documents on iPad, iPhone or iPod. vBookz  Audiobooks adds orientation and navigation tools that enhance the reading experience.

Reads out loud from over 40,000 classic books for  using the leading live text to speech generator with no need for conversion nor stored audio files.

vBookz  Audiobooks has an all-in-one support and it reads PDF, non-DRM ePUB eBooks, Own typed files and Wikipedia out loud. It is integrated with Dropbox, G-Drive and Gutenberg. 

Famous Quotes
vBookz  Audiobooks offers you a hidden feature that you may discover as most enjoyable.
In order to discover it, all you have to do is to pull down the library and listen.

Downloadable voices 
■ Built-in English US voice.
■ Auto language detector.
■ 17 premium voices from the best voice engine Acapela are available through in-app purchase and integrated iOS voices.
■ Languages: English (UK), French, German, Greek, Finnish, Dutch (NL), Portuguese, Portuguese (Brazil), Spanish, Italian, Swedish, Polish, Danish, Norwegian, Czech and Russian. 
■ Male and Female voices.

Voice Reading
■ An easy play-pause button.
■ Continue reading when you lock the screen.
■ Change voice and reading speed (100-500 words per minute) on the fly.
■ Correct pronunciation with your own pronunciation dictionary.

Visual Reading
■ Great design and layout.
■ Switch between original layout and text-only view on PDF documents.
■ Synchronized word and line highlighting. 
■ Text auto-scrolling.
■ The original 'Dyslexie' font.
■ Helvetica, Verdana and Georgia fonts.
■ Font size up to 30 points.
■ Special color themes.

Getting Content
■ Gutenberg's library with over 40,000 books. 
■ DRM-EPUB Textbooks.
■ PDF files. 
■ Open files directly from Mail, Dropbox, G-Drive and Safari.
■ Built-in Wikipedia Voice Reader. 
■ Import using iTunes from a PC or Mac
■ Store and view PDF documents with original layout.
■ Export files using email. 
■ Quote and share to Facebook and Twitter.

Navigating
■ Drag and drop cursor navigation.
■ Full text search.
■ Remembers speech and visual location where you stopped.
■ Bookmarking.
■ Elapse time.

Type Voyzer
A simple, intuitive voice writing tool that helps you create and write your own readable PDF files.
Type Voyzer reads your writing using text-to-speech proofreading to reduce mistakes.
■ Great text editor.

Title: werk, bauen + wohnen
Description:
werk, bauen + wohnen ist eine führende Architekturzeitschrift. Sie erscheint 10x pro Jahr, davon zwei Doppelnummern. Sie ist das Organ des Berufsverbands BSA (Bund Schweizer Architekten). 

Jede Ausgabe fokussiert auf ein bestimmtes Thema aus dem Architekturdiskurs: Dabei werden aktuelle Fragen aus der Theorie und Praxis aufgegriffen und stets mit beispielhaften Bauten kritisch dokumentiert. In einem zweiten Heftteil diskutiert werk, bauen + wohnen das Arbeitsfeld des Architekten, bespricht neue Wettbewerbe, Ausstellungen, Bücher und Produkte. Der dritte Teil erlaubt die Präsentation aktueller Bauten, Umbauten oder Forschungsergebnisse, die nicht direkt mit dem Thema verbunden sind. Im werk-material werden in jeder Ausgabe zwei exemplarische Bauten ausführlich mit Detailplänen und Kennzahlen vorgestellt.
Auf diese Weise kann werk, bauen + wohnen konzeptuell stringent und vertieft Themen aufarbeiten und gleichzeitig das aktuelle Geschehen zeitnah verfolgen und dokumentieren.

werk, bauen + wohnen richtet sich an eine klar definierte Leserschaft, an Architekten, Innen- und Landschaftsarchitekten, Ingenieure sowie Studierende dieser Fachrichtungen, an Baubehörden, Planer, Generalunternehmen und Bauherren. 

Abonnement- und Kaufoptionen innerhalb der App: 
Sie können die Einzelausgaben für jeweils CHF 20.00 erwerben. Darüber hinaus bieten wir Ihnen die Möglichkeit, ein kostenpflichtiges Abonnement abzuschliessen, welches sich automatisch erneuert. Dieses Jahres-Abonnement beinhaltet zehn Ausgaben und kostet CHF 180.00. Auf dem iPad/iPhone können Sie Ihr Abonnement selbst verwalten und kontrollieren. Bitte beachten Sie dabei im Speziellen die automatischen Erneuerungsoptionen Ihrer iPad/iPhone-Einstellungen und deaktivieren Sie diese rechtzeitig, falls Sie keine automatische Erneuerung Ihres Abonnements für ein weiteres Jahr zum Preis von CHF 180.00 wünschen. Andernfalls wird Ihr Account von Apple iTunes Store 24 Stunden vor Ablauf des Abonnements automatisch mit den Kosten für die Erneuerung des Abonnements belastet. Jeder ungenutzte Anteil an einer Gratis-Testversion, falls angeboten, verfällt, wenn die/der Anwender/-in ein Jahresabonnement für diese Publikation erwirbt (wo anwendbar). Eine Kündigung des Abos für die aktuell gültige Bezugszeit ist nicht möglich.

Informationen zum Datenschutz und Nutzungsbedingungen:
https://www.wbw.ch/de/rechtliches/

Title: whBOOK

whBOOK - Your specialist for antiquarians

Title: who? 한국사 조선 시대 편
Description:
◉ 한국사 조선 시대 편 무료 전자책
“Who?” 한국사 조선 시대 편은 조선 시대 대표 인물들의 삶을 통해 시대 전체를 배울 수 있도록 기획되었습니다. 도서는 총 20권으로 구성되어 있으며, 이 앱을 이용하여 전자책 5권을 무료로 읽을 수 있습니다.

◉ 어린이 스스로 자신의 미래를 설계할 수 있게 힘을 길러 주는 “Who?” 시리즈
“Who?” 시리즈는 어린이 위인전 분야의 베스트셀러로, 인종과 성별, 직업을 넘어 세상을 더 나은 곳으로 만든 인물들의 이야기를 담은 만화 위인전입니다.
학부모와 선생님을 포함한 광범위한 설문 조사와 교과서 분석을 통해 선정된 “Who?” 시리즈의 인물들은 어린이들이 세상을 보는 올바른 시각과 균형 잡힌 가치관을 기를 수 있도록 도와줄 것입니다. 또한, 인물들이 겪은 기쁨과 슬픔, 좌절과 시련, 감동을 함께 느끼며 폭넓은 감수성을 함양하고 자신만의 미래 설계도를 그려 나갈 수 있게 해 줄 것입니다.

◉ 과거 인물을 통해 역사를 배우고 현대 인물을 통해 내일의 꿈을 설계한다.
교과서에는 한 줄로 표현된 역사 인물과 사건이지만, “Who?” 시리즈에서는 흥미진진한 만화를 통해 인물의 삶을 보여 주어 당시 시대적 상황과 주변 환경, 역사적 사건 등을 자연스럽게 이해할 수 있게 하였습니다. 더불어 동시대를 살아가는 현대 위인들의 이야기를 읽은 어린이들은 그 인물의 삶과 자신의 모습을 비교해 보며, 자신에 꼭 맞은 인생의 길잡이를 만날 수 있습니다.

◉ 전 세계 어린이들이 함께 보는 글로벌 콘텐츠
“Who?” 시리즈는 국내 학습만화 중 최단 기간 500만 부 판매를 돌파하였으며, 6년 연속 교육브랜드 대상을 수상하는 등 대한민국을 대표하는 인물 시리즈로 자리 잡았습니다.
또한, 국내 최초로 한국과 미국에서 동시 출간되었으며, 미국 현지 초등학교 부교재로 채택되었습니다.
교육적인 면과 인성적인 면을 철저하게 검토하는 미국에서 교재로 선정된 것은 국내 출판 역사상 처음 있는 일로, 현지 언론에서 보도되며 크게 주목받았습니다. 또한 “Who?” 시리즈는 일본, 중국, 대만 등 9개국에서 출간될 정도로 콘텐츠의 가치를 인정받고 있습니다.

----

스토리의 즐거움을 전 인류와 함께 나눕니다.
㈜다산북스
다산 정약용의 실용정신을 시대정신으로 담아내는 출판사가 되고자 합니다. “다산북스를 만나면 책이 즐거워집니다.”라는 모토로 지식을 즐겁고 재미있게 전달해 왔습니다.

블로그 blog.naver.com/dasan_books

어린이가 꿈꾸는 세상을 만들어가는 출판사
㈜스튜디오 다산
다산북스의 자회사로 어린이 도서를 전문적으로 펴내는 출판사입니다. 2010년 세계 위인전으로 시작된 “Who?” 시리즈는 현재 엔지니어, 스페셜, 한국사 시리즈로 그 분야를 넓혀 가며 어린이들의 소중한 꿈을 키우는 데 조금이나마 힘을 보태고자 노력하고 있습니다.

《who?》 후 시리즈는 어린이 위인전 분야의 베스트셀러로, 인종과 성별, 직업을 넘어 세상을 더 나은 곳으로 만든 인물들의 이야기를 담은 만화 위인전입니다.

Title: whzbcp
Developer_Name: 上海交通大学出版社有限公司
Description: ‘文化装备测评网’获上海市宣传部支持，由上海交通大学出版社主办，是文化装备领域的资讯报道，产品测评媒体，目前涵盖的文化装备有影视设备，舞台设备，影院设备，印刷设备，游艺设备。该媒体旗下包括纸质期刊（《文化装备测评》），网站（www.whzbcp.com），微信公众号等，致力于搭建文化装备企业与消费者沟通的桥梁，与文化装备企业共同促进产业繁荣。

Title: wit - we are all creators
Description:
Welcome to Wit! - Open home ground for all creators.
You can share every ideas and information on every possible interest.

* Find and follow your interests
From entertainment to everyday concerns: new posts are being updated every second.
Check out stories, drawings, edits, covers, reviews, daily tips and many more.

* Don't hesitate, start create
Don't know where to start? Take your pick.
Various writing formats: Blog type, Chat type, and Image type will help you begin.

* Be a creator! Make friends!
Express yourself. Show who you are. Tell us your story. 
Your creation will connect you with others.

Wit official:
• Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/witapp.official
• Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/witapp_official
• Email: witapp.team@gmail.com

Title: wobb! Africa - where it swarms with wild animals. The Search Safari for little adventurers
Description:
Do you know the animals of Africa? -Then come with us into the Savannah, to the water hole and into the rain forest and see what is frolicking about there!

Flamingo, lion and giraffe, hippo, elephant and monkey, crocodile and scaly ant eaters, this is even okapi territory. Vultures, gnu and marabou and the zebra too, warthog and ostrich – and that’s by no means all!

You have to find five animals, then shake the iPad - and nothing is as it was before. wobb! Africa completely rebuilds itself, and the Search Safari goes on! Different each time, promise!

• wobb! Africa is an entertaining, hand-drawn hidden object game, for little Safari adventurers from the age of 3 on.
• There is a wealth of animals to discover in the app, lovingly drawn and realized in rich detail by Fides Friedeberg.
• With wobb! Africa, children learn the names of even little-known African animals, and learn to distinguish the shapes and outlines of animals.
• A plethora of image combinations yield continuously renewed hidden pictures.
• There are real animal sounds upon finding the animals being searched for.
• The background sound is parent-friendly (not annoying).
• There is an helper function if an animal isn’t found after a long search.
• iPad Retina is supported by default.

Title: word互动教程
Description:
【关于Word互动教程】
1、Word互动教程是一款简单、有趣、互动式的学习Office Word 2019的新工具。此应用将向您展示Word 2019的绝大部分功能点。

2、应用包含大量操作提示，指导您一步一步地实现Office Word 2019的所有操作细节。就像有一名专业的教师手把手地教您最新、最实用的Word技巧。

3、这是第一款互动式学习Word的工具。另外，本应用234节课都包含互动模式，同时也支持观赏模式，当您在互动式学习中肢体疲劳时，可以切换至观赏模式，这样意味着您同时也拥有了234节教学影片。

4、所涉及的具体内容包括输入文字录入、段落排版、样式编辑、表格制作、图表设计、图形绘制等功能应用，并结合大量精美的企业应用实例，以互动的方式将解决思路和操作过程逐一呈现。

5、本App可以帮助职场人士用轻松、愉快的方式，快速掌握Office Word最新版的使用方法！


【互动教程的特点】
•互动性
-首创互动式学习，不同于以往的任何一种学习方式，不看视频不看书，轻松，高效，好玩
-手把手教学，一步步引导操作，实时看到效果，就像自己在操作一样，信心满满
-即点即学，课程内可根据自己的需要，随时调整界面上方进度条，重复操作，加强记忆
-强大的学习跟踪系统，对整体学习进度一目了然，及时调整学习计划，查疑补漏

•人性化
-界面设计简洁，操作简单，没有繁琐的按钮，一点就可直接进入学习状态
-贴心小提示，读懂你的小心思，零基础快速入门，学习无压力，不尴尬
-超多原理解析，疑问解答，如同专业Word导师亲身指导，不翻书快速记忆，Word小白迅速成长

•实用性
-课程由浅入深，操作过程详细剖析，一步步模仿，马上就会做。
-互动+观看视频，两种学习方式切换，上班路上，地铁里享受随时随地自由学习


◈ 不看视频不看书，超级好玩的Word教程！
◈ 单击、双击、长按、拖动及各种快捷键，就像您在真正的Word 2019上操作一样！
◈ 比观看视频、阅读书籍更加有效、有趣！
◈ 哪里不会戳哪里，妈妈再也不会担心我的Word了！


【和传统学习方式的比较】
阅读书籍：动脑
观看视频：动脑 + 动眼
互动教程：动脑 + 动眼 + 动手


【建议学习步骤】
三步学习法、免疫恐惧、倦怠、遗忘、挫折：
第一步：通过互动教程App快速学习Word软件的使用
第二步：通过我们提供的练习素材，自己动手实现课程的内容
第三步：通过互动教程App中的刷题模块夯实理论水平，然后自己动手结合学到的知识实现一个小项目
提示：无论哪一步遇到困难，都可以通过顾问功能获得答疑服务。

【Word互动教程部分内容】
如何使用上标和下标制作数化和化学符号
如何在数学试卷中插入积分公式
如何制作氯化铜的电解方程式
如何收藏常见的公式

Title: wReader for watch 手表独立小说阅读器
Description:
Reader for watch:  txt and epub supported!
(1)use iTunes to copy txt files to wReader folder on iPhone

(4)touch the text to read next
txt and epub supported!
txt must be UTF-8 encoding.

Title: xkcd!
Description:
Stay up to date with the latest comic from xkcd.com, now directly on your TV.

xkcd is a webcomic of romance, sarcasm, math, and language, created by Randall Munroe.

Title: xkcd: Specials
Description:
"xkcd: specials" is a collection of the two huge projects by Randall Munroe: "Time" and "Click and Drag".

Follow the story of two people who wonder why the water level on the beach is rising.

Fly through the world and find out what is hiding everywhere.

Title: xxx男～アウトな男たち！～【メッセージ風恋愛心理ゲーム】
Description:
「女なんて…」
「ママから電話が！」
「地下アイドルはロマン…」

…藤崎　愛梨（ふじさき　あいり）30才
xxx男（ダメ男）しか寄ってこないです…

仕事も容姿もどこもかしこもいいのに
なぜか残念すぎる主人公の物語。

このアプリは「ダメ男ホイホイ」と呼ばれる主人公の愛梨（あいり）が
言い寄ってくるxxx（ダメ男）を次々と倒して本当の愛に辿りつく？！ゲームです

◇xxx男について◇
・会話の中から怪しい！絶対xxx（ダメ男）！
　と思われる男の言動をタップして見抜いちゃおう！
・56話までクリアすると、「真実の愛編」に突入！
・最後までクリアするとあの人とのまさかのEndingが！？

◇xxx男の流れ◇
Ⅰストーリーパートで会話文を確認して
Ⅱ最後に問題をよーく読むこと！
Ⅲxxx男調査パートで怪しいキーワードを選択
Ⅳ正解すると次のステージにへ

-----最後に待っているのは真実の愛？それとも…

◇こんな「あなた」におすすめしたい！◇
・恋愛・乙女ゲーが好きなあなた！
・わたしの彼が？若しくは片思いのあの人が？xxx男か確認したい！
・通勤通学中＆寝る前に気軽にできるゲームを探してた！
・ノベルゲームが好きなあなた！
・キュンキュンしたいあなた！

Title: ydsCepte : YDS Soru Bankasi
Description:
İstediğiniz zaman istediğiniz yerde istediğiniz kadar soru çözün 

Bu bir sınav uygulaması değildir

 - YDS Cepte  ile "İstediğiniz zaman, istediğiniz yerde, istediğiniz kadar soru çözebilirsiniz" 
 - Cep telefonu veya tabletiniz üzerinden "Soru Getir" diyerek YDS sorularını; 
Sınav stresindenden uzak istediğiniz zaman çözebilirsiniz. 
 - Ücretsiz olan Yds Cepte uygulaması, yds sorularını cep telefonundan çözmenizi sağlar. 
 - İstediğiniz zaman yds sorusu çözme işini sonlandırıp çözülen soruların raporunu alabilir ve kaldığınız yerden yds sorularını cep telefonunuzdan çözmeye devam edebilirsiniz.
 - Yds cepte programında soru ve süre limiti yoktur

* İstediğin kadar soru çöz istediğin an sonuçları gör. Kaldığın yerden devam et.
* YDS Soru Bankası
* YDS Cepte 
* YDS Sınavı
* YDS Çıkmış Sorular
* Üye olarak istediğin platform dan kaldığın yerden devam et.

Title: A&A Court Reporting

A&A Court Reporting and Videoconferencing, an independent, woman-owned business established in 1995, has an excellent reputation in the legal community for reliable, professional and personalized service.

Our group of highly-experienced certified reporters and knowledgeable office staff is a dedicated, dependable and professional litigation support team serving the Greater Delaware Valley and beyond. Our technical support agents offer a diverse range of legal-related services to facilitate courtroom and deposition processes.

The A&A Court Reporting app was designed to assist those on-the-go persons who specialize in the legal arena. In this app you will have instant access to scheduling an appointment, vital ordering forms, and your repository account. We believe you'll find our app to be a great asset to your day-to-day business.

Description:
Discover nearly 100 Hollywood stars captured in the lively, original works of the artist Antoinette-Fleur, who makes weekly sketches for the French magazine "Gala." Her colorful, delicate style combines energy with a very contemporary charm, and her portraits are both fresh and sumptuous with a exuberant, dynamic technique resulting in faithful renditions.
Her work appears regularly in the fashion, press and publishing worlds.
This books covers 2009 to 2011, and you can enjoy the drawings' details by zooming in with a double-tap or pinch. The Table of Contents will take you instantly to the drawing you want to see.

Description:
Learning the ABCs is child's play with this entertaining and educational app. Adorable artwork, colorful creatures, and smooth voice and sound effects enhance an already engaging hands-on experience keeps kids engaged.

Title: A-Z Dictionary Synonyms
Description:
A synonym is a word or phrase that is perfectly substitutable in a context for another word or phrase. People who study language professionally agree that there is no such thing as an ideal synonym, for it is virtually impossible to find two words or phrases that are identical in denotation (meaning), connotation, frequency, familiarity, and appropriateness.

This dictionary App comes with :
- Over 9000 entries
- Offline Dictionary
- Clearly definition with example
- Easy word searching ( begin or contain)
- Recent and Bookmark are included
- English text speech ( word and phrase by press or select on it).

Title: A-Z of Particle Physics
Description:
A to Z of Particles Physics is an interactive glossary to subatomic particles and particle physics.

Browse over 300 entries, from laboratories and key scientists to definitions of terms and the particles themselves.
 
Cross reference key phrases to discover who did what, when and how in particle physics.
 
Option to upgrade to The Particles for the definitive interactive guide to subatomic particles and particle physics. 
 
Many entries are illustrated, with images of particle detectors and laboratories, portraits of leading physicists, and historic and modern particle events pictures.

A to Z of Particle Physics has been developed by Science Photo Library in partnership with leading physicist Professor Frank Close. It is a modern source of information on particle physics for everyone.

Title: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam Quotes olx Quotation Flipkart
Description:
Avul Pakir Jainulabdeen Abdul Kalam (15 October 1931 – 27 July 2015) was the 11th President of India from 2002 to 2007. A career scientist turned reluctant politician, Kalam was born and raised in Rameswaram, Tamil Nadu and studied physics and aerospace engineering. He spent the next four decades as a scientist and science administrator, mainly at the Defence Research and Development Organisation (DRDO) and Indian Space Research Organisation (ISRO) and was intimately involved in India's civilian space program and military missile development efforts. He thus came to be known as the Missile Man of India for his work on the development of ballistic missile and launch vehicle technology. 

This App is a collection of APJ Abdul Kalam quotes. All that you need to express or send that you feel about the quotes. You get it here. This application is easy to handle and a quikie too. You just select the quote, tap on it and you will get the options to send it. Select that you want and here you go.

See it for yourself, download it now and get inspired every day!

Want to motivate your life towards dream, get inspiration now.
Wisdom spread through quotations all over the world and collected in a single place!

Just enjoyed it.

Title: A2 Business Studies
Description:
A2 Business Studies

Created for the AQA GCE A Level Specification (from June 2014 onwards). This is also suitable for other exam boards (see the topic areas listed below).

Has well over 100 multiple choice questions for both Unit 3 and Unit 4 (separate sections for each so you can tailor your revision).


Topics covered:

Unit 3

Strategies for Success 

Financial Strategies and Accounts 
  Understanding Financial Objectives 
  Using Financial Data to Measure and Assess Performance
  Interpreting Published Accounts 
  Selecting Financial Strategies 
  Making Investment Decisions 

Marketing Strategies 
  Understanding Marketing Objectives 
  Analysing Markets and Marketing 
  Selecting Marketing Strategies 
  Developing and Implementing Marketing Plans 

Operational Strategies 
  Understanding Operational Objectives 
  Operational Strategies: Scale and Resource Mix 
  Operational Strategies: Innovation 
  Operational Strategies: Location 
  Operational Strategies: Lean Production 

Human Resource Strategies 
  Understanding HR Objectives and Strategies

  Effective Employer/Employee Relations 


Unit 4

Corporate Aims and Objectives 
  Understanding Mission, Aims and Objectives 

Assessing Changes in the Business Environment

  The Relationship between Businesses and the Political and   Legal Environment 
  The Relationship between Businesses and the Social    Environment 
  The Relationship between Businesses and the     Technological Environment 
  The Relationship between Businesses and the   Competitive Environment 

Managing Change

  Key Influences on the Change Process: Culture
  Making Strategic Decisions 
  Implementing and Managing Change

Title: AA 12 Steps - For A Anonymous
Description:
Alcoholics Anonymous - 12 Steps, A Guide is  intended as a simple,  short and  concise interpretation of the rules for sober living   as  compiled  by   the  earliest   members  of the organization. Great care   has  gone  into  the preparation  of the  pamphlet. Most  of the  ideas  and explanations   were  brought  out   in  a  series of instruction classes  conducted by veteran members of AA.

Title: AA Audio Companion for Alcoholics Anonymous
Description:
Get the ultimate companion for Alcoholics Anonymous with over 350 hours of audio content including AA speaker tapes, recovery literature, 12 step workshops and much more. Listen to the entire Big Book of Alcoholics Anonymous or try one of our speaker workshops and learn the keys to the 12 steps of AA. Learn to live sober, one day at a time. If you can't get to a meeting, or whenever you need to connect with the program of Alcoholics Anonymous, just take out this app and listen to powerful recovery content.

FREE APP:
This app is free to download and includes over 30 hours of free audio programs, but you must subscribe or unlock to get all content (in-app purchase fees apply).

Audiojoy includes much more than just a few AA speakers and literature. You will find plenty of audio content for staying sober, getting clean and living a drug and alcohol free life. With over 500 AA, NA and Al-Anon speaker tapes, Big Book and Basic Text stories of recovery, daily reflections, living clean and sober. If you like what you hear you can unlock and download hundreds of hours of additional solution focused content from popular 12 step programs that will help you stop drinking, get relief from drugs and addiction, find the love you love and enjoy not drinking or using one day at a time.

This app is a great resource you can use anywhere and anytime. It?s like an AA meeting in your pocket. Listen on the go, whether you are online or offline. You can build a playlist of your favorite AA speakers from around the world; workshops, audiobooks and more from Alcoholics Anonymous and Narcotics Anonymous, and Al-Anon too.

FEATURES:
This app is packed full of amazing features to help you stay clean and sober and addiction free:

+ Daily featured audio content
+ Search and explore all content
+ Add to a favorites list
+ Listen while offline
+ Build a playlist of the tracks you want to hear
+ Read along with the text version
+ Sleep and meditation timer
+ Looping relaxation and meditation sounds (over 2.4 million combinations)
+ Daily inspiration notifications with powerful artwork to keep you motivated

Learn how to stop drinking. Learn how to stop taking drugs. Learn how to deal with people. Learn how to be confident and helpful to others. Get help to quit the struggle of addiction and dependance on alcohol and drugs. Learn how to live sober. Learn how recovering addicts stay clean.

CONTENT INCLUDED:
This app includes hundreds of hours of amazing content for becoming sober, staying clean, free from drugs and alcohol and living the life you've wanted.

+ The Big Book of Alcoholics Anonymous

Title: AA Big Book Sobriety Stories
Description:
Start listening to more than 100 hours of audio regarding Big Book stories you wouldn’t want to miss. Sober daily readings, speakers from AA and more. You will even get stories from Bill Wilson the founder of Alcoholics Anonymous. These alcohol addiction stories, talks, prayers and worksheets are some of the best ways to benefit you in recovery. They are filled with wonderful information on all-things recovery related. This app will offer you meditations to use during your recovery journey. These talks about the 12 steps will be just what you need to help you focus your life more around recovery.

FORMING YOUR RECOVERING LIFESTYLE: Would you finally like to have a life where you can be free from alcohol ruling your life? Has it been so long since you have had a day fully focused, happy events in your life or contentment without having to force it? By hearing this collection of speakers, meditations and more, you can finally overcome addiction and be the true you once and for all. Substance abuse doesn’t have to be a part of your life anymore.

GAIN KNOWLEDGE FROM RECOVERING SPEAKERS: Recovering without support is nearly impossible. If you are going to overcome an addiction to alcohol, it can be beneficial to get help and support from people who have been in your shoes. Throughout this app, you will gain knowledge from recovering speakers in Alcoholics Anonymous and hear inspirational Big Book stories. If you have felt alone throughout your addictive lifestyle, don’t feel that way any longer. There are people who understand what you are going through and you are going to hear them speak on these tapes. You will hear their stories, what they did to overcome alcohol addiction and tips they have for you too. 

CHANGE YOUR LIFE: You deserve to live a life without alcohol and you can. If you are sick and tired of letting this substance control your life, now is the time to do something about it. It is time to get sober. Choose today to get this app and let people speak to you. You may have been feeling angry about the choices you have made in the past but you can overcome it all starting today. Through the help of these speakers, the meditations on this tape and the worksheets, you can change your life for the better in so many ways. With the daily reflections, inspirational notifications and stories from Bill Wilson, founder of AA, himself, you can encourage yourself each day to stay sober. 

FEATURES: 

+ 1000+ audio tracks, 100+ hours of content
+ Listen when offline
+ Build a playlist of the tracks you want to hear
+ Sleep and meditations timer
+ Looping relaxation and meditation sounds (over 2.4 million combinations)
+ Daily inspiration notifications with powerful artwork to keep you motivate

CONTENT INCLUDED:
Some of the samples of content that you will find throughout this amazing app are:

+ Alcoholics Anonymous Book Study Workshops
+ Living Sober Daily Readings
+ 100+ AA Meeting Speakers
+ 100+AL-ANON Meeting Speakers
+ 100+ NA Meeting Speakers

And much more…over 100 hours of recovery audio content!

Title: Aa Gym Corner
Description:
Aa Gym Corner adalah stand toko buku yang khusus menjual buku-buku karya Abdullah Gymnastiar atau yang lebih populer dengan Aa Gym. Dalam setiap buku yang di jual di newsstand ini adalah hasil karya otentik dari Aa Gym sendiri, dimana berisikan berbagai hal dalam perspektif Islam yang di ulas secara lengkap dan ringan oleh Aa Gym sendiri. Dalam buku-buku ini pula, Aa Gym ingin membagi setiap opini nya dan menyampaikan setiap ajaran Nabi Muhammad dalam setiap aspek kehidupan. 

Tak hanya buku, Newsstand ini pun berisi beberapa audiobook tentang beberapa topik yang di bawakan sang Daih dalam kotbahnya. Dari audiobook ini, para pembaca dan pendengar bisa serasa lebih dekat dengan Aa Gym dan lebih personal dalam mendengarkan firman yang di sampaikan.

Buku-buku dan audiobook yang di jual di stand ini akan terus bertambah seiring berjalannya waktu, baik dari segi programing ataupun jumlah. Selain itu, buku-buku yang di jual nantinya akan di buat 3 bahasa, yaitu Indonesia, Inggris dan Arab. Hal ini akan memudahkan bagi mereka yang mahir dan nyaman akan salah satu bahasa yang bisa di pilih.

Aplikasi ini bisa di akses melalui iPad, iPhone dan iPod touch, serta bisa di unduh di App Store. Lengkapi koleksi buku-buku dan audiobook Aa Gym ini, untuk memperkaya iman dan untuk mengetahui setiap ajaran baik yang ada di dalamnya.

Title: AAAFM-UCLA, 2019
Description:
AAAFM-UCLA International Conference on Advances in Functional Materials will held at University California, Los Angeles, from August 19 to August 22,
2019. AAAFM-UCLA has held once in each two year since 2017 sponsored by the
various universities throughout the world.
In particular, the AAAFM-UCLA, USA’s largest conference on the advancement of
functional materials science and technology, will be a meaningful occasion to
confirm major research results and up-to-date research trends in the world,
increase exchanges among researchers in relevant fields, and materialize the
results of research.

The app offers users a personalized event experience, bringing them closer to organizers. The app keeps participants up-to-date and makes sure every opinion is heard.
- Users can always see the actual schedule and all the relevant information regarding the event both online and offline thanks to seamless synchronization;
- A special feature lets participants create their individual conference program and keep track of sessions they attend;
- The app allows users to provide immediate feedback about a session to encourage better organization and services;
- Attendees can see the venue of the event and the plan of the building for a more comfortable event experience;
- Users also get quick access to Twitter hashtag of the conference, enabling them to read the relevant information and share their thoughts on Twitter.

Title: AAD Shriners
Description: AAD Shrine app was designed to be able to take payments and donations from people all over the world to help benefit the Shriners Hospitals. What is a Shriner you ask? Be the premier fraternal organization for men of good character. Shriners provide attractive, quality, programs, and services for its members, their families and their friends in a spirit of fun, fellowship and social camaraderie. Foster self-improvement through leadership, education, the perpetuation of moral values and community involvement. Serve mankind through the resources of its philanthropy, Shriners Hospitals for Children. A Shriner is a man who professes a faith in God. As a man of faith he uses the tools of moral and Ethical truths to serve mankind. A Shriner binds himself to like-minded men in a brotherhood that transcends all religious, ethical, social, cultural, and educational differences. In fellowship, with his brothers, a Shriner finds ways in which to serve his God, his family, his fellow man, and his country. A Shriner is dedicated. He recognizes his responsibility for justice, truth, charity, enlightenment, freedom and liberty, honesty and integrity in all aspects of human endeavor. A Shriner is such a man!!

Title: Aadje Piraatje
Description:
Bekijk de vijf vrolijke verhalen over hoe Aadje Piraatje opgroeit op zee. Dat valt soms niet mee: Aadje moet leren zwemmen tussen de haaien, minstens zeven happen schildpaddensoep eten, en hij krijgt heimwee naar zijn moeder. Gelukkig krijgt Aadje hulp van Jan-zonder-hand, Joop-houten-poot en alle andere stoere piraten.

De vijf vrolijke verhalen zijn in de app te zien: 
- als filmpje en
- als bladerbare versie met voorleesstem en inzoomfunctie

Daarnaast zit de app boordevol spelletjes met Aadje Piraatje, zoals:
-zelf een filmpje maken
-tekenen en kleuren, oa met kleurplaten van Aadje
-educatieve tel- en zoekspelletjes
-puzzels en memospel 

De spelletjes zijn ingedeeld op verschillende niveaus zodat kinderen van verschillende leeftijden worden uitgedaagd. 

De tekst van Marjet Huibert is bekroond met een Zilveren Griffel en Sieb Posthuma ontving een Vlag en Wimpel voor de illustraties.
 
De app staat garant voor zeer lang speel- en kijk- en luisterplezier!

NRC Handelsblad, 8-6-2012

Title: AAMC Training Group
Description:
AAMC Training Group’s app is for on-the-go learners who want to study at their own pace. The app allows you to download and study your course materials, track your enrolment history and CPD, browse all our courses, and connect with us on social media wherever you are.
 
If you are already registered with us as a member, you can also use this mobile app to access the Member's AAMC Training Group’s app is for on-the-go learners who want to study at their own pace. The app allows you to list all the available courses, enrol in any AAMC Training course, do online payments, download and study your course materials, give online assessments, track your enrolment history and CPD, chat with people enrolled in same courses, connect with us on social media wherever you are and many more features.
 
Gain access to a quality learning experience wherever you are by downloading now!
 
For support, email us at info@aamctraining.edu.au.

Title: Aanjaneya e-SHOP
Description:
Aanjaneya eSHOP is an official app of Aanjaneya e-SHOP website. 

Introduction
=========

This app facilitates users to read eBooks which they have already purchased from Aanjaneya e-SHOP website.

Using this app, you can:-

- Download and read your purchased Aanjaneya e-Publications offline anytime, anywhere.
- Browse the rich collection of Aanjaneya e-SHOP e-Publications.


Please refer to the below sections for knowing more about the usage guidelines of the app.

Login to the App
=============
You can login to the app using your login credentials of Aanjaneya e-SHOP website. To create your own account, please visit Aanjaneya e-SHOP website.


App has 3 main sections as follows:

Books 
=====
This section shows all available e-Publications.
- Without login, you can download demo version of the e-Publications.
- After login, you can download full version of your purchased e-Publications.


My Books
========
This section shows your subscribed e-Publications. You can download full version of the subscribed e-Publications which you have already purchased from this section.


Downloaded Books
==============
This section shows all the e-Publications which you have downloaded. These e-Publications can be read offline.

Title: AAO eBooks
Description:
In the busy, demanding profession of ophthalmology, it is important to have access to up-to-date, reliable information at all times. With the American Academy of Ophthalmology’s eBook app, you get convenient access to essential Academy textbooks from your iPad or iPhone. Download this free app to:
• Access your purchased eBooks online, or download them for offline use
• Search and browse across all AAO eBook titles
• Customize your learning with easy highlighting, note-taking and bookmarking
• Quickly find relevant images and videos
• Participate in activities that provide opportunities for earning continued medical education (CME) credits (select titles only, see individual publications for more information)
Academy publications are written and reviewed by expert ophthalmologists and are designed to help you improve patient outcomes and practice efficiency. Academy eBooks must be purchased from the Academy before they can be accessed via the app. First, download this app to your device, then visit AAO Store to make your purchase. Return to the Academy eBook app anytime you want to read your eBooks. 
About the Academy: 
The American Academy of Ophthalmology is the world's largest association of eye physicians and surgeons — Eye M.D.s — with more than 32,000 members worldwide.  Eye health care is provided by the three "O's" – ophthalmologists, optometrists, and opticians. It is the ophthalmologist who has the education and training to treat it all: eye diseases, infections and injuries, and perform eye surgery. Ophthalmologists provide comprehensive eye care, ranging from optical to medical to surgical.
The mission of the Academy is to advance the lifelong learning and professional interests of ophthalmologists to ensure that the public can obtain the best possible eye care.
Academy members are dedicated to enhancing the quality of life for every individual they treat by helping each to see his or her best and by protecting their patients' vision and eye health throughout life. Academy members are committed to responding compassionately to their patients' individual needs and to advancing the highest standards of comprehensive eye care.
The American Academy of Ophthalmology is accredited by the Accreditation Council for Continuing Medical Education to provide continuing medical education for physicians.

Title: AAP eBooks Reader
Description:
Access your American Academy of Pediatrics (AAP) eBooks on the go, offline, or anytime. Download eBooks from the leading pediatric publisher, covering all areas of health care for children. AAP eBooks can be searched, browsed, and read by professionals looking for best practices when diagnosing, treating, and managing clinical conditions; as well as parents and patients looking for answers. Over 130 titles are available; log in to your AAP account to access titles offered by your institution, membership, etc.

FEATURES:
● Access your AAP eBooks at any time, even offline
● Rapidly search across the individual titles or the entire collection.
● Full text, visuals, and data tables.

BENEFITS:
● Find proven clinical and parenting solutions faster
● Spend less time researching vital reference information. 
● Stay up-to-date via automatic access to new AAP editions and titles as they appear.

The American Academy of Pediatrics (AAP) is the leading pediatric publisher. With titles in both print and electronic formats, covering all areas of health care for children, AAP Publications are among the most respected and frequently referenced in the world. Throughout the last quarter-century, AAP Publications have been impacting the practice and clinical application of pediatric medicine worldwide.

Title: Aarti Collection
Description:
Aarti Collection App has 12 commonly recited Hindu Aarti's combined into one App for your convenience with readable text, background audio and related graphics!

Hinduism as a Religion and Culture is built on principals of belief in "higher powers". While our regional backgrounds may be different, Hindu's globally continue to practice a faith that has stood the test of time and advancement of lifestyles and thinking. The basic tenet of "do good" and "reap rewards" is applicable in how Hindu's look at their religion. While the measurement of "rewards" may vary from person to person, the idea of "do good" is universally applicable - and hence easy to follow. 

This App Contains:

1) Ganesh Ji ki Aarti
2) Lakshmi Ji ki Aarti
3) Shiv Ji ki Aarti
4) Om Jai Jagdish Hare
5) Kunj Bihari Ji ki Aarti
6) Hanuman Ji ki Aarti
7) Durgaa Ma ki Aarti
8) Saraswati Ji ki Aarti
9) Kali Maa ki Aarti
10) Satyanarayan Swami Aarti
11) Ram Ji ki Aarti
12) Santoshi Maa ki Aarti
13) Sai Baba ki Aarti
14) Shani Dev ki Aarti

We hope that if you like this App - you will decide to tell your friends and family about it! We strive hard to fix any identified errors in our Apps. If you encounter an issue within the App - please email our support contact via iTunes and or submit a request on our website.

Title: Aathichoodi by Avvaiyar
Description:
Welcome to Āathichoodi Mobile App in Tamil with English Translation (with audio)

From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia:

The Aathichoodi is a collection of single-line quotations written by Avvaiyar and organized in alphabetical order. There are 109 of these sacred lines which include “Intend to do right deeds”, “Never degrade learning”, “Don’t exaggerate what you saw”, “Don’t forget gratitude” and many other instruments rightful quotes expressed in simple words. It teaches good habits, discipline and doing good deeds.

Title: Aathichoodi With Meanings
Developer_Name: SOFTCRAFT SYSTEMS AND SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED
Description:
Aathichoodi  is a collection of single-line quotations written by Magaan Avvaiyar and organized in alphabetical order. There are 108 of these sacred lines. The expressions in the lines of Aathichoodi are intended to address everyday problems. It teaches good habits,discipline and good works for all.

Thanks to Project Madurai (www.projectmadurai.org) for providing us the content for free distribution.

With great pleasure and pride we publish this app as one of our efforts to bring useful Tamil literary work in mobile platforms.

Your suggestions and feedback are always welcome. 

Support us by rating and leaving a comment.

Title: Abby's Stories
Description:
Abby's Stories is an immersive storytelling app that teaches kids Mandarin and Cantonese Chinese.

Kids learn most effectively when they are having fun. Learning Cantonese and Mandarin Chinese can be challenging, especially useful everyday Chinese. Kids will effectively learn Chinese when they immerse themselves in the Abby's stories and have fun along the way!

Features:
- Stories focused on different themed words.
- Cantonese Chinese, Mandarin Chinese and English read-aloud.
- English translation to enable parents and kids to learn Cantonese and Mandarin Chinese together.
- Simplified and Traditional Chinese words.

Designed for kids 4 and above.

Compatible with iPad 3rd Generation and above, iPhone 5 and above.

Title: Abby's World - Activity & Story Book
Description: A learning to read story book with activities on each page, word search, crosswords, dot-to-dot, colouring, mazes, geography and word jumbles featuring Australian animals and flora. Beautifully illustrated, the story can be read to the child whilst words are highlighted or the child can get help with words or just read themselves.

Title: Abby’s Aquarium Adventures- Predators: Learn about the world of sea predators through this enticing story filled with facts and fun quirks about fish and sea animals; written by Heidi de Maine. (iPad Lite version; by Auryn Apps)
Description:
Welcome to the World of Sea Predators with Abby’s Aquarium Adventures, part 2: Predators.

Children at younger age are more curious to find out about new animals and creatures. Abby’s Aquarium Adventures 2, introduces kids not only to sea predators, but also gives an insight into the world of people who work inside the aquarium. Useful facts and fun ‘quirks’ about each fish or sea animal is presented in a language that is easy to understand but also leaves space for more exploration. Your little one would want to learn more about the sea creatures after reading this story.

Abby’s Aquarium Adventures 2 is a part of the Auracle line from Auryn Inc. The app is based on the second book by the same name written by marine biologist Heidi de Maine and illustrated by Keli Hazelton. 

▶ KEY EDUCATIONAL THEMES: 
- Intorducation to predators
- Learn about different types of Sea predators and their characteristics
- Introduce kids to the concept of Aquariums and Zoos

▶ EXTEND THE LEARNING! ASK YOUR CHILD: 
- Name the fishes and their colors mentioned in the app
- The difference between an Aquarium and a zoo. 
- What does a predator fish eat?

▶ ENHANCE CREATIVITY BY PERSONALIZING THE STORY: 
- You can write your own version of the text for the book 
- Personalize the narration: kids or parents can re-record the narration to make it their own! 

▶ DEVELOP READING SKILLS WITH THESE LITERACY TOOLS: 
- Image and word association vocabulary builder - when an image on the screen is touched, the associated word is spoken and the written word is displayed. 
- Karaoke effect - when a word is spoken during narration then the word is highlighted. 
- Touch a word to hear it being spoken in “Read Myself” mode (almost like “training wheels” for new readers) 

▶ THREE WAYS TO READ THE BOOK: 
1) "Read to me" - Listen to the narrated story while the text is displayed Karaoke style. After the narration finishes on a page the child can interact with objects until they are ready to move to the next page. 
2) "Auto Play" - same as "Read to Me" except the page advances automatically once the narration is finished. Useful for those long car rides when you want the child to have a complete book experience. 
3) "Read myself" - There is no narration but the child can touch a word to hear it being spoken aloud. 

The lite version contains the first six pages of the original app with all the functionalities. The user also gets an overview of rest of the pages in thumbnail format. 

Please rate and review the app. Your feedback means a lot to us! 
Stay in the loop: www.auryn.com

Follow us: Twitter.com/aurynapps
Follow us: Pinterest.com/appsbyauryn

Our mission is to inspire children to Love Learning. We accomplish this by designing a program which rewards kids for every effort they make towards learning. During the course of this program child will be introduced to all the essential phonemic awareness skills focussed here. 

Child can practice the skills at his/her own pace and learn to spell and read more than 100 words using this program. Three Letter Short Vowel Words are practiced in every possible way, equipping child to perform best at school as well.  Activities are appropriate for special needs and home-schooling kids as well.

Utmost care has been taken in the selection of words, pictures and sounds.

Title: ABC Alphabet Letters by The Little Book
Description:
★★★★★ Fun, simple, and instructive! ★★★★★

The only customizable ABC book of its kind!


The "Little Book" series is a fun, simple, and engaging way to learn.  The books offer a great learning experience for small children.  The little ones will enjoy listening to colorful examples while looking at gorgeous photos that are carefully chosen. Toddlers will love the interactivity of the little books and click on the images to hear the sound of the words play back out loud.  

If your little one loves hearing new stories and learning about new things, then The Little Books will become one of their treasured apps and soon they will even be able to read them on their own!

Features:
♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡

✔ Add your own voice - now your toddler can listen to the entire story in mommy's or daddy's voice
✔ Story highlights - Each word is highlighted in read as it is being read, making this a perfect learning to read tool
✔ Word highlights - Words respond to touch - individual words highlight and are read out loud when tapped
✔ Picture highlights - Words respond to touch - in other words, click on any word and hear it being read out loud
✔ Supports three playback modes - read to me, read by myself, and auto-play which automatically turns from page to page
✔ Uses real, crisp professional images that are carefully designed vs. cartoonish illustrations
✔ Fun & engaging voice artist keeps kids engaged
✔ Multi-sensory learning tool - combining seeing, hearing, and tactile feedback
✔ Multi-language support - since you can edit all existing items and sounds so you can record everything in your native tongue

Customization:
♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡
 

✔ Customize story - you can fully customize the entire story and even change it!
✔ Record your own voice - you can record everything in your own voice
✔ Change the story - want to personalize the story and change it, no problem, everything is customizable
✔ Change picture highlights - you can edit or delete all existing highlights
✔ Add picture highlights - if you want your child to learn a particular object in the photo, just click on it and add the word and recording.  You can even adjust the area of what can be highlighted and make it bigger and smaller
✔ Playback mode - at any time you can either play back the original story or the one that has been customized by you
✔ Story highlights - Turn on / off the ability to have each word is highlighted as the story is being read
✔ Word highlights - Turn on / off the ability to highlight words
✔ Picture highlights - Turn on / off the ability to click on picture highlights to make the story either more immersive or less distracting
✔ Page swiping - Turn on / off the ability to move from page to page by click vs. by finger swiping too


Heroic Support

♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡


Heroic Support is not just what we do.  It's really what makes us, well, us.  It's that drive to make a difference in your life - no matter how big or small.  Really, it's our way of life because we want you to be our customer for a lifetime of fun and learning.

Have questions?  We are here to help.  Email us at support@grasshopperapps.com

Title: ABC Animals AR
Description:
Surprise your child with ABC Animals, the app that uses Augmented Reality to bring the alphabet alive through print, audio and video.  This is a first-of-its-kind experience that will delight both you and your child!

Use the free app with the beautifully illustrated ABC Animals, Alphabet in Motion book, to help your toddler or preschooler learn the letter names and discover adorable animals as the animals come alive in live-action video. The app includes a free downloadable book page so you can sample the magic!

Read the book with your child, emphasize the letters, and then ask the questions related to each letter and animal. Point your device at the photographs in the book and hear and see the answers to each question as the animal photos seem to magically turn into motion video and the questions are answered.

Features:
•	Simple to use!  Uses Augmented Reality technology in a highly intuitive and user-friendly way. 
•	Increases parent-child engagement. 
•	Combines the positive emotional and intellectual impact of reading books to children with the power of video to enhance learning!
•	Teaches letter names and interesting animal facts.
•	Companion book features more than 26 beautifully illustrated “pages.”
•	Companion book features 26 live action video clips especially chosen to reinforce letter names and teach toddlers and preschoolers about animals


To learn more about how to enjoy this amazing app and how to get its companion book, ABC Animals, Alphabet in Motion, please go abcanimals.sapienco.com.  

For any additional assistance please contact us at ABCAnimals@northsouthtudios.com.

Title: ABC Book by Story Time for Kids
Description:
Get ready to gift your child with the most fun filled interactive book that makes learning alphabets all the more exciting. 

This book for toddlers would surely engage your child in the most interactive and intuitive way. Learning alphabets has never been more fun and effective. The book not only your child to learn alphabets, but also recognizing them phonetically. And guess what's more? Your child will also learn words that start with the individual alphabets as well!!!

Your child can see it, sing it and also learn it. The letters are shown in capitalized so that the child can recognize the letters easily. Several objects are also included in each page, increasing the knowledge of your child in a unique way. 

Download this unique, engrossing book and let your child discover the world of alphabets all ina magical way. 

FEATURES:
- Original and superb music and sound effects 
- Captitalized text for toddlers to recognize letters easily
- Interactive learning
- Text highlighting 
-  Impeccable effects and colourful illustration for kids to enjoy
- 26 pages of fun filled effects
- Fun activities like- card designing, spot the difference and coloring game and much more!
- Swipe on text to make it read! Tap on the word to listen to the pronounciation!
-Tap on the objects and discover their names

Have fun!

Title: ABC Circus- Alphabet&Number Learning Games kids
Description:
** 9 Games play, tap, trace, match and print with A-Z, a-z and 0-10.
** Each letter and number displayed and gamed with Cute Animal Circus.
** Print and  customize with cute and unique Letters, Numbers and Papers.

Walk up! Walk up! ABC CIRCUS! The greatest circus show on earth is about to begin!

“A” is for Playing Ant, “B” is for Unicycle Bear, “C” is for Acrobatics Camel…Playing with 26 amazing circus, kids practice essential skills in exciting games per letter.

1.SHOW: Each of the letters and numbers show its unique circus firstly and attracts kids learning interest;
2.TAP & TRACE: Learn where to start, change direction and finish by 63 animations(26 uppercase letters, 26 lowercase letters and 11 numbers);
3.WRITE: Write the letter by tracing the dots. (each letter has its unique circus dot)
4.PLAY: Play 63 wonderful circuses after write it and you can choose “TRACE”, “WRITE” or “SHOW” by yourself.

You can Customize the 9 games by turning each activity ON or OFF

1 A-Z all 26 uppercase alphabets  show, trace and write with 26 cute animal circus.
2 a-z all 26 lowercase alphabets display, tap, trace and write with 26 circus.
3 0-10 all 11 numbers tap, trace and write with 11 animal circus.
4 Identify letters with  Canon circus game.
5 Find numbers in bubbles popped by cute Clown.
6 Match the uppercase letters with lowercase letters.
7 Match the animals with correct numbers.
8 Magic ABC song show.
9 Customize and Print your letters and numbers Worksheets.



ABC Circus! The Circus Supreme! 
Colossal! 
Astounding!
Fantastic!

Title: ABC少儿英语培训 - 婴幼儿语感启蒙大全
Description:
选用护眼色系，保护宝贝眼睛
0-10岁，1000部以上的儿童英语学习视频资源，您想要的这里都有了。
英语儿歌、英语故事、培训机构视频足以满足您宝宝所有年龄段的学习。

内容包括：
英语儿歌系列：英文语感训练、口语训练、A-Z字母歌、语感启蒙、流行英文儿歌、数学英语儿歌、动物英语儿歌、英文游戏歌、经典英文童谣、常识英文儿歌、英文摇篮曲、节日英文儿歌、识字识物英文儿歌等等。
英语故事系列：少儿英语绘本、鲍勃火车英文故事系列、玛莎和熊英文故事系列、英文朗读故事系列、英语动画片系列、洪恩英语系列、三只小猪英文故事系列、儿童英语圣经故事系列、东西方英文故事，应有尽有。
英语培训系列：牛津英语培训、励步英语培训、洪恩英语培训、剑桥儿童英语培训、清华英语培训、瑞思英语培训、美乐蒂英语培训、派乐多英语培训、巧虎英语培训、智慧鸟英语培训、蓝猫英语培训等等，几乎覆盖所有视频，这里您都能找得到。

功能介绍：
1，英语儿歌：字母歌、动物歌、数学歌、流行歌、日常用语歌。。。
2，英语故事：英语绘本、三只小猪故事、小红帽、狮子王等更各种故事。
3，英语培训：包含各种培训机构英语，您不用再东找西找了。
4，探索频道：探索更多儿童应用，儿童英语故事。

用户评价：
用户子豪宝妈：偶然间下载了这个应用，只为让我儿子在乐趣中学英语，这个应用里的东西太全了，省了我的大力气，以前找很多东西找不到，这里都有，太棒了，儿子特别喜欢，而且学的英语我都看不懂了！强烈推荐。

用户一骑红尘：自从有了这个app，我家娃的英语水平蹭蹭往上飞，简直奇迹了，而且这个app的颜色很好，我看了都不觉得眼睛累，作者还是挺用心的，肯定是个有孩子的作者，推荐使用。

Title: ABC Reading-家庭英语启蒙早教
Developer_Name: Beijing Ledulekao Education Technology Co., Ltd
Description:
【 关于我们 】 
“ABC Reading”产品由好未来教育集团（学而思）斥资数千万美金独家引进“美国ReadingA-Z”原版绘本内容，并且贴合中国“3-12岁孩子”特点研发而成。
实践证明：英语分级读物可以有效地辅助孩子英语学习，尤其对孩子的语言知识、阅读理解及文化意识等方面有显著效果。

【 关于ReadingA-Z 】
ReadingA-Z分级阅读绘本又称“RAZ”。因其话题广泛、分级科学、难度螺旋上升的特点，成为美国和加拿大1000多所公立校的指定阅读产品，符合美国CCSS教育体系。RAZ涵盖27个级别，2000本英文原版绘本，共计1.7万+词汇。

【 产品特点 】
-独家版权
ABC Reading产品拥有“ReadingA-Z分级绘本”国内独家版权，网名“祖国版RAZ”

-海量原版书籍：
涵盖20多个话题和科目，2000本原版书籍，与美国原版同步更新

-科学的分级体系：
aa-Z共计27个级别，全面覆盖英语启蒙—高中毕业。每级别平均90本

-英语开口神器：
国际领先的语音评测功能，附带最纯正的美式发音教学，解决哑巴英语

-亲子互动/游戏化体验：
丰富的游戏互动配合严谨的教学体系，提升孩子的学习兴趣和学习效果

-完善的学习闭环：
课前单词预习-课中绘本阅读-课后习题测试，在兴趣阅读的同时，通过科学完整的学习闭环，提高学习效果

Title: ABC's of Phonics
Description: ABC's of Phonics was created with the collaboration of my sister Marie Zofrea who holds a masters in education. The app was designed to support teachers in the class room or private tutoring. The teacher may prepare up to five different lessons using flash cards that revolve around phonics. CLOVER is built into the app along with a 5 card, 1 card and vowel sounds pack. The teacher may save lessons for all students under their name, this allows the teacher to prepare the lesson before visiting the student. The app also contains a client list where the teacher may keep notes on the students progress. There are over 500 flash cards that may be used to build the lessons. With clear instructions and easy functionality ABC's of Phonics will save you time and clutter when preparing your lessons. This version of the application has be updated to support pronunciation of sounds or words. The student also may trace the letters in certain lessons.

Title: ABCs alphabet phonics based on Montessori approach for toddler Lite
Developer_Name: TINYHANDS APPS EDUCATIONAL LEARNING GAMES FOR BABIES TODDLERS AND KIDS CORP.
Description:
Learning ABCs has never been more fun! With Montessori ABC for Kids Lite your kids will not only learn to write letters, but will also develop good handwriting skills! The app turns the learning process into what kids love the most - a game! 

---Features---

* Delightful animations to help your children learn letters and words in a fun and engaging way
* Left hand and right hand modes 
* Animated flashcards to teach your kids letters and words
* Worksheets to teach your children to trace letters
* Funny, bright, creative artwork 
* Uppercase and lowercase letters, sounds and phonics
* Aligned to Kindergarten Reading Foundation skills of Common Core Standards
* Your children can interact with the app at their own pace

Set the stage for reading and writing success with this delightfully interactive educational app! Kids will have a blast learning alphabet with Montessori ABC  for Kids Lite!

WHAT THE PRESS SAYS

--- Featured by The Guardian ---

--- AppAdvice ---
"Designed for ages two through five, Montessori ABC for Kids combines the enjoyment of cartoon animations and a simple to use touch interface to help kids learn the alphabet."

--- Kids Games Club ---
"Montessori ABC for Kids features over 100 different animations corresponding to letters of the alphabet. The illustrations are very clean and help reinforce sounds and words to the respective letters."

--- iHeartThisApp ---
"#1 App in Category: Pre-Reading, Vocabulary"

Title: ABCs alphabet tracing based on Montessori approach for toddler HD
Developer_Name: TINYHANDS APPS EDUCATIONAL LEARNING GAMES FOR BABIES TODDLERS AND KIDS CORP.
Description:
Learning to write has never been more fun! With Montessori Worksheets for Kids HD your kids will not only learn to write letters, but will also develop good handwriting skills! The app turns the learning process into what kids love the most - a game!

FEATURES:

•A proven multisensory approach teaches children to write uppercase and lowercase letters 
•Kids are encouraged and praised at every stage of the learning process
•Dotted lines and arrows guide kids through the letter tracing process
•Left hand and right hand modes 
•2 levels of difficulty 
     -tracing a letter with hints
     -writing a letter independently
•Kids build their skills progressively, from tracing to writing, at their own pace
•Positive reinforcement through use of audio and visual cues
•Kids learn age-appropriate vocabulary and the ways each letter can sound in a word
•Kids get stars for their performance: 
     -3 stars - for successful task accomplishment at first or second attempt
     -2 stars – if they had 3 or 4 goes at tracing and writing
     -1 star – if they had more than 5 tries
•Clean graphics
•Soft and encouraging voice over
•Progress Chart to track success of your kids 
•Possibility to create and edit multiple multiple profiles
•Clear voice instructions 

Enjoy watching your kids get more and more confident at writing while having loads of fun on the way!

Title: ABCs with Animals
Description:
ABCs with Animals is an illustrated children's book, written by Monica Simpson and illustrated by Kiya Coon.  It is a fun rhyming ABC book designed to help children learn their ABCs, introduce them to rhyming, and entertain them with colorful animals.  The included sticker pack for iMessage is fun for all ages! This app includes every page of the published book along with some additional features including:

- An optional page by page narration from the author herself, Monica Simpson.
- A fun matching game using all of the animals from the book.
- A sticker pack for iMessage that includes all of the animals from the book including several bonus animated stickers!
- No ads and no in app purchases.

Stickers are accessed through your Messages app.   Swipe left or right on the App drawer to find the icon for "ABCs with Animals" to open the sticker pack.  Touch and hold on a sticker then drag it to a message bubble to add the sticker to your messages!

Acknowledgments:
Narration by Monica Simpson
Background Music by Slaking_97 on Freesound.org
Icons by https://icons8.com/

Title: ABeCeDarian Level A Classrooms
Description:
This app provides all of the same activities and exercises in the same order as found in ABeCeDarian Level A for Classrooms, but presented in a convenient and engaging digital form. 

Children easily move letter tiles across the screen to spell words, use a finger or stylus to practice handwriting and spell words, sound out new words, and read sentences.

Tutors can now easily keep multiple students organized and parents can easily continue lessons at home.

This is not a game but a powerful and comprehensive beginning reading program suitable for non-readers and very beginning readers.

To use the app effectively you must be familiar with how to conduct the lessons in ABeCeDarian Level A.  If you do not already have Teacher Manual Level A for Homeschoolers and Tutors please purchase it at www.shopabcdrp.com or on Amazon.com.

Story outline:

ABHIMANYU
Star-Crossed Prince

The Kauravas had made a fateful error. Lusting after their cousins’ kingdom, they underestimated young Abhimanyu’s determination and ability to defend it. Brilliantly distilled in this handsome and much-loved Pandava prince were his father Arjuna's courage, Lord Krishna's wisdom, and the patience, strength and gentle humility of his uncles. 

Even as he thwarted his enemies’ ambitions, Abhimanyu earned their grudging admiration and a very special place in the saga of the Mahabharata.

This is an episode from the great epic Mahabharata.
   
About Amar Chitra Katha(ACK-Media):   

ACK-Media is India's leading entertainment and education company for young audiences. ACK has enthralled generations of readers for the last four decades with over 600 + Indian mythology, humor and folk tales with over 90 million titles sold worldwide.

ACK has partnered with iRemedi in bringing the timeless classics to the iPhone and iPod community. 

About iRemedi:

iRemedi's ETHER MEDIA is a proprietary mobile content delivery technology that provides revolutionary touch media viewing. iRemedi works with rich content publishers to bring their rich content to the iPhone community.

Enjoy full color high-resolution art and story in an award winning and intuitive user interface.

App features:

- Panel by Panel Page view
- Tracking Page numbers
- Slider for fast page navigation in forward or reverse
- Over 7 color backgrounds
- Option to frame pages for a book feel
- Option to curl pages while changing
- Intuitive slideshow with interval settings for paced reading
- Slideshow can be stopped with a single tap or continue anytime with double tap.
- App optionally remembers last page to automatically take you where you left(no need for bookmarks)
- If original art in panel is small for portrait or landscape simply rotate iPhone to landscape or portrait. App automatically resizes to full screen to use up any extra space available(no need for zooming in and out often).

Other iRemedi top ranking Apps in iTunes Book section:

DASHAVATAR(ON SALE), KRISHNA, TALES OF SHIVA, MAHABHARATA, GANESHA, SHIVA PARVATHI, BIRBAL, JESUS CHRIST

SUPPANDI

Other:
