Title: Advanced American Dictionary
Description:
●●● Advanced American Dictionary 
A dictionary for learners of American English

● The Advanced American Dictionary is an advanced-level monolingual dictionary for learners of American English. It includes 145,000 words, phrases, and meanings and 85,500 examples showing how words are used.

● Easily find any word: use the search box, follow links within entries and see other results for your search word

● Check pronunciation: American English pronunciation is included at every entry, with a written transcription and accompanying audio

● Understand meanings: entries are written using only the Longman 5000™ keywords

● Expand vocabulary: use the colour illustrations and usage notes to explore related words and phrases

● Include collocations: support words collection for IELTS learner's English.

●●● Main Features:
* Support offline version.
* Search words very fast, allow filter by type such as: noun, verb, ...
* Support top 3000 spoken words offline.
* Support top 3000 written words offline.
* 100,000 words and phrases 
* 160,000 usage examples that show how each word is used 
* More than 22,000 idioms, verbal collocations, and commonly used phrases
* Voice Search – Say the word and the app will find it for you!
* Audio Pronunciations – by native speakers of American English and British English
* Favorites – lets you keep track of words you want to remember
* Recent History – lets you keep track of the words you've looked up
* Write note – lets you comment what you are understand.
* Create group - lets you group the words.

* Video English: You can watching and improve new vocabulary, conversations ...

– PRAYERS – a cycle of prayers for morning, evening and night inspired by the Liturgy of the Hours
– MEDITATION – daily original meditations on the Gospel reading by twenty-four gifted authors

Each year's Advent Companion is different from the last, and contains these one-of-a-kind extras that you won't find anywhere else:
- a variety of beautiful blessings and essays
- an Advent Penance Service
- specially-commissioned poetry
- a unique feature: the Advent Stations
- Praying the O Antiphons 



If you like this Advent Companion App, you'll want to try the Magnificat App too!

Liturgical source: United States Conference of Catholic Bishops & ICEL.

Title: Advent with Pope Francis
Description: An app for the 2019 Advent Season Celebration readings quotes by Pope Francis.

Title: AdventAudio
Description:
People are living on the go. Every moment is precious.

Wouldn't it be nice to be able to use moments that would otherwise be lost? Every day people spend much more time than they would want in car traffic, waiting for appointments, or even insomnia.

The AdventAudio App was designed to help you use your precious moments to store your mind with sacred and heavenly truth. The writings of the Adventist Pioneers are now if audio format and can be listened to whenever you desire to do so.

Download hundreds of books of Ellen G. White and other pioneers such as Andrews, Bates, James White, Jones, Waggoner, Haskell, Loughborough, and many more.

You will wonder how could we ever live without these resources God has provided for us in the last days.

This App was designed for you. Enjoy it. And give us your feedback. We are always wanting to improve it.

The EllenWhiteAudio.org Team

Title: Adventserotik
Description:
So wird dir die Adventszeit versüßt. Hiermit bekommst du eine erotische Vorweihnachtszeit.

Auf dich warten im Adventskalender 24 erotische Gedichte, die nie ein Mensch zuvor gelesen hat. Denn sie sind brandneu.

Mal geht es in den Geschichten derb zu, mal sehr lustvoll. Es ist für jeden Erotikfan etwas dabei. Tauche ein in die worweihnachtliche Lüsternheit. Und der Humor kommt auch nicht zu kurz.

Title: Adventskalender 2019 - Advent
Description:
24 Türchen, 24 Überraschungen
– ein Adventskalender mit allem, was glücklich macht!

• Weihnachtslieder mit Musik und Co.
• Weihnachtsgeschichten zum Lesen und Vorlesen
• Weihnachtsmärchen zum Anhören (mit Ton)
• Grußkarten zum Verschicken
• Plätzchen-Rezepte für himmlischen Genuss

Hinter jedem Türchen steckt eine himmlische Überraschung – so macht das Warten auf Weihnachten noch mehr Freude!

Title: Adventure @Burj Khalifa, HBZ
Description:
Autism Awareness Project, 2018
A group of Grade 9 students at Hamdan bin Zayed School, wanted to participate in a project that would raise awareness of an issue that impacts on some of the younger students that they know in their school who are autistic and members of the New England Center, Abu Dhabi.  The Grade 9 students wanted to find out more about Autism, help celebrate the children's differences and highlight to the world, through storytelling, that they are just like other children.  They want to have friends, play and have fun.  The experience helped the Grade 9 students develop understanding, tolerance and love for their new friends. All the students involved in the project made new friends and developed a deeper understanding of the challenges that some children face. 

VOICES is a storytelling workshop dedicated to supporting the self-expression of young people. 

FEATURES
•	Swipe-to-Read
•	Read-to-me and read-it-myself options

Customise your book:
•	Record yourself reading the story
•	Colour the illustrations (paint mode has a palette, adjustable brush width, and move, zoom and undo abilities)
•	Export your coloured pictures

Other interactive features:
•	Animation and sound effects
•	A child-friendly user interface
•	Background music that can be turned on and off
•	Arabic and English Language sync audio

This digital book contains audio narration in two languages: Arabic and English

NEED HELP?

KIWA® Middle East FZ- LLC partners with Kiwa Digital, NZ as a world leading production house for multi-lingual enhanced digital books, bringing mother tongue languages to the internet. Contact us for your VOICES! Storytelling Workshop, in your school, community or business. 

Check out our website: www.kiwa.ae

Description:

Title: Adventures Of Krishna & Kaliya
Description:
Take a great imaginative journey with your child by accompanying Lord Krishna on their adventures to destroy the evil!
Once a huge black serpent named Kaliya came to live in the river Yamuna. He poisoned the water of the river with his venom. The people of Vrindavan were very scared of the serpent, who was very strong.
One day, Krishna decided to teach Kaliya a lesson. He jumped into the river to kill the serpent. Kaliya was furious and rushed to attack Krishna. But before the snake could catch him, Krishna quickly climbed on Kaliya's head. To shake him off, Kaliya tried to coil around Krishna and crush him. He even tried to drown him but Krishna stayed underwater without breathing. Eventually, Kaliya got tired. Krishna then started jumping and stamping on Kaliya’s head and the serpent started vomiting poison.
Kaliya begged Krishna for forgiveness and Krishna ordered the serpent to leave the Yamauna. kaliya bowed his head and quietly left, and the people of Vrindavan rejoiced.
We have interpreted “Adventures Of Lord Krishna” mythological classic short story in a modern way by designing it in the form of an interactive ebook application.

HIGHLIGHTS:
- Interactive storybook with great animations stimulating the imagination
- Professional narration and music create delightful ambiance
- Pages with lovingly designed graphics and animations that bring characters to life 
- Cute recognizable characters from your favorite story book
- Simple and intuitive interface
- Languages: English and Hindi.
- No Ads
- Fun animations
- Interactions
- Multiple Languages
- Parental gateway
- Wonderful music
- Read along background voices
- Learning through fairy tales, stories, rhymes and books.

Title: Adventures of Sherlock Holmes!
Description:
This reader is equipped with various auto-scroller speed technology to allow for a more enjoyable and relaxing reading experience.

The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes is a collection of twelve stories by Arthur Conan Doyle, featuring his famous detective.  These are the first of the Sherlock Holmes short stories, originally published as single stories in the Strand Magazine from July 1891 to June 1892. The book was published in England on October 14, 1892 by George Newnes Ltd and in a US Edition on October 15 by Harper.

Included in this collection are:

"A Scandal in Bohemia"
"The Red-Headed League"
"A Case of Identity"
"The Boscombe Valley Mystery"
"The Five Orange Pips"
"The Man with the Twisted Lip"
"The Adventure of the Blue Carbuncle"
"The Adventure of the Speckled Band"
"The Adventure of the Engineer's Thumb"
"The Adventure of the Noble Bachelor"
"The Adventure of the Beryl Coronet"
"The Adventure of the Copper Beeches"

Description: This app is a course pack for AE4630 Aerospace Structural Design at WMU. The materials contained in the app will be updated regularly as the course is taught.

Title: AECT CEB
Description: Each machine uses a minimum amount of electrical power or diesel fuel.  The low fuel cost helps the concern for energy savings in the cost of  production of blocks as a building material. Compressed soil blocks have now become a viable product that can be  mass-produced to high technological standards. Soil Block Construction  offers people a natural, environmentally friendly and inexpensive  solution to the rising costs of building and energy. Due to heating and cooling efficiency, the real savings is in the  cost of ownership, as well as the construction savings that apply. Thank you.This APP is meant to help people learn more about earthen construction. Information about our company and the equipment we manufacture  will be provided as well as helpful articles relating to the industry. This app will give users access to articles and insight related to earthen construction, as well as the ability to chat and share information with other users. New functionality will be added in future updates including construction calculators and troubleshooting.

Title: AEF ePub Reader
Description:
Unsere AEF ePub Reader App mach dein Smartphone oder Tablet zum tragbaren Coach. Ob in der Bahn, im Flugzeug oder zu Hause, Du hast mit unserem Reader die Coachinginhalte immer und überall dabei und musst dabei nicht einmal online sein! Lade einfach die ePubs deiner Wahl herunter, lese darin, setze Lesezeichen an Dir wichtigen stellen oder schaue Dir die in unseren ePubs enthaltenen Videos an. Und das alles offline!

Und wenn du dann deine ePubs durchgearbeitet hast, kannst du gleich in unseren Leseproben nach weiteren für Dich interessanten Inhalten suchen!

Title: AEF ISOBUS DB
Description:
Get mobile access to the AEF ISOBUS Database.

Who is responsible when something is incompatible – the tractor 
manufacturer or the device manufacturer? How can I find an implement for my ISOBUS tractor which is also fully ISOBUS-compatible, and with which I can benefit from significant advantages? Is the implement that I already own ISOBUS-certified and compatible with the new ISOBUS tractor that I want to buy? And if so, which functionalities can I use with both of them?

The AEF database answers these and many other questions. This database contains all relevant information about all machines and devices, which have been ISOBUS-certified so far. With just a few mouse clicks the user can configure his tractor/implement combination and immediately see whether the selected combination is compatible, and with which common functionalities it is equipped. The user can even compare alternatives. Selected ISOBUS combination can be sent easily by using the „Tell-a-friend“ function to the desired person.
If a device cannot be found in the database, it is not certified.
Existing user accounts can also be used for the mobile version of the database.

Title: Aeon: Miracle
Description:
Aeon: Miracle is a science fiction app, combining episodic video (internet connection required) with original short fiction.

Set against a backdrop of a future transformed by climate change, Julius Bach’s Halcyen Corporation is about to release Aeon, a new drug that will fight a range of deadly diseases.

But Bach has a secret he must protect from investigative journalist Annika Hollis, from his ambitious rival Rudi Mendel and from a former love, Nina Marrs.

As Aeon’s launch gets closer, Bach's plans are thrown into disarray following a test procedure on Dari, one of the company's experimental subjects.

Aeon: Miracle features:

– Episodes from the Aeon web series.
– A multi-part text story, HoloCity Calling, that adds deeper layers to the investigation by journalist Annika Hollis.
– Official statements from Pulsar News editor, Gordo Fleet.
– E-cards featuring stills from the stories to download or share.

Aeon stars Paul Warriner (The Village, The Five), Geraldine Sharrock (Emmerdale, Spike Island), Wiebke Acton, Angela Costello and Haydn Holden (Myra Hindley: The Untold Story).

Aeon is written & directed by Richard Evans and produced by Cold Star Media & Ric Michael. The app is supported by Arts Council England.

Title: Aeronautical Knowledge Test
Description:
Hello!

This app will help you study the FAA's Pilot Handbook of Aeronautical Knowledge through a complete test of each chapter.
It will also help you evaluate your overall Aeronautical knowledge.

It Includes a brief explanation for each answer, and the exact reference of the page where you can find the subject.

You can download the Pilot Handbook of Aeronautical Knowledge here:

https://www.faa.gov/regulations_policies/handbooks_manuals/aviation/phak/

We appreciate your feedback.

**** Preliminary Version *******
By March, 2019 we have included:

Chapter 1: Introduction to Flying
Chapter 3: Aircraft Construction
Chapter 4: Principles of Flight
Chapter 5: Aerodynamics of Flight
Chapter 6: Flight Controls
Chapter 7: Aircraft Systems
Chapter 8: Flight Instruments
Chapter 9: Flight Manuals and Other Documents
Chapter 12: Weather Theory
Chapter 13: Weather Services
Chapter 15: Airspace
Chapter 16: Navigationt
Chapter 17: Aeromedical Factors

By now, it comprises more than 500 questions. However we are speeding up in order to bring you the remaining 4 chapters ASAP ( with NO EXTRA Charge) through the updates.

Title: Aeroplane Company Profile
Description:
The Company Profile series endeavours to cover all major British and American aircraft manufacturers from its formation to its demise (where appropriate) drawing photographic material from the Aeroplane/Kelsey photographic archive and the editor and author Martyn Chorlton. To a lesser extent (depending on the availability of material) other nation’s manufacturers will also be covered such as Germany, Italy and France.
  
Each ‘Bookazine’ will be a 132 pages, and entry will include a 400 to 500 word history made up of Development, History, Operational Service and Production. There will be a technical data panel, dissected into dimensions, weights and performance for each aircraft and a mini timeline as well.  At the back will be four to six page section called ‘The Drawing Board’ or a designation/type listing as well. The former will cover projects that were only made on paper or just reached the mock-up or part-built stage.

Copyright Key Publishing Ltd. 2015

Title: Aesop Fables - School Version
Description:

'Aesop's Fables' contains 20 classic and popular stories for children in the age group of 1-5 years old. With completely interactive animations, cute characters and attractive environment, this app is the perfect storybook for children.

The text is simple to read and understand for early learners. There are two options for reading - Read For Me and Read By Myself. Title: Aesop for Children
Description:
The Aesop for Children interactive book is designed to be enjoyed by readers of any age. The book contains over 140 classic fables, accompanied by beautiful illustrations and interactive animations.

“Aesop's Fables”—also called “the Aesopica”—are a collection of stories designed to teach moral lessons credited to Aesop, a Greek slave and story-teller thought to have lived between 620 and 560 BCE.

Aesop's fables are some of the most well known in the world and have been translated in multiple languages and become popular in dozens of cultures through the course of five centuries. They have been told and retold in a variety of media, from oral tradition to written storybooks to stage, film and animated cartoon versions—even in architecture.

The fables remain a popular choice for moral education of children today. Younger scholars will be able to trace the origin of aphorisms such as “sour grapes” and “a bird in the hand.”

This interactive ebook is presented by the Library of Congress, adapted from the book “The Aesop for Children: with Pictures by Milo Winter,” published by Rand, McNally & Co in 1919. This work is considered to be in the public domain in the United States.

Title: Aesop's Fable - The Goose with the Golden Eggs - QLL Kung Fu Chinese (Bilingual Storytimes)
Description:
Immerse yourself in rich language and easily learn Chinese, in an entertaining way. Now with a I SPY style Game in the book and make your learning much more fun.

All you have to do is download The Goose with the Golden Eggs. You’ll enjoy reading The Goose with the Golden Eggs while picking up Chinese language with the proven effective technique of storytelling.

You and your child are learning a new language together, just by reading a fairy tale. Sometimes, you do the reading, sometimes you both take turns. You used to switch the voice reading on and let the program tell you the story but you don’t need it anymore because you’re learning fast. 

Thanks to the powerful The Goose with the Golden Eggs, you and your child are picking up another language while having quality time together, becoming bilingual, simply by having story time on a regular basis. 

Storytelling is one of the most enjoyable and effective techniques to learn a new language. 

When you read or tell stories to people you immerse them in rich language in context, which in turn leads to higher levels of sophistication in speech and literacy. 

Yup, just by reading a story the right way.

In The Goose with the Golden Eggs, you get both English and Chinese subtitles and optional voice dubbing to help you with correct spelling, pronunciation and word recognition. The audio and visual presentation of the story is not only cute but also helpful for your listening and reading Chinese skills. 

Look at some of the features you get in The Goose with the Golden Eggs:

* More than a million users have downloaded our language learning picture books already!

If you’ve been hoping for a fast, fun way to learn Chinese, you only have to download The Goose with the Golden Eggs. Do it right now and you can begin to pick up another language as soon as today!

Title: Aesop's Fables Remixed by 30hands
Description:
Aesop’s Fables Remixed is a collection of commonly known fables retold and remixed into intertwining stories. We are starting with 5 stories and will be adding more based on interest. Your child can listen to the stories together with you, while riding in the car, just before Mr. Sandman comes to visit at bedtime. Discuss the lessons of the stories and find the science in everyday life. Give your child an opportunity to read the stories aloud by himself or herself, too. 

If you want to create your own stories like this, you can do that with 30hands Pro. (Please note that 30hands Starter is no longer available.)

The first 5 stories include:
1) The Village (by 30hands)
2) The Tortoise and the Hare, Part 1 (by Aesop)
3) The Lion’s Share and the Three Bulls (2 Aesop’s fables combined)
4) The Milkmaid and the Pail (by Aesop)
5) The Miser (by Aesop)

The fables cover 5 areas of learning based on standards and Bloom’s Taxonomy:
1) Listening to a story
2) Reading a story
3) Thinking about a story and answering questions about it
4) Performing activities that emphasize concepts in the story, often times a science concept
5) Creating a story from scratch, either by recounting the same story in the child’s own words or creating a new story

The stories are narrated multimedia picture books that can be played back by kids independently or with an adult and can be read like a traditional story book. Included in every story are 1 or 2 video clips relating to the story. At the end of each fable is a moral (or two), a series of 2 or 3 questions and activities to get children thinking about the stories and interacting with parents and teachers. 

The stories are fun, but they also include fundamental learning skills, including reading silently and aloud, listening, thinking about what was in the story, drawing conclusions about what happened in the story and trying out hands-on activities related to the aspects of science, technology, engineering, arts and math (STEM & STEAM).

How does this relate to standards?
--------------------------------------------------------------------
Reading fables, listening to them, recounting them and answering questions about the stories are key elements of the Common Core and state standards for Reading Literature and Speaking & Listening, especially in grades K-3. 

Children’s Story Collections
--------------------------------------------------------------------
Let us know if you are interested in submitting 30hands Pro stories by your child or student to include in collections on the web or in an app. info@30hands.com.

This English Language Arts app is also good for English Language Learners (ELL), ESL and EFL students.

Title: Aesop's Fables, short stories for kids, read to your toddler as bedtime lullaby
Description:
Bedtime stories are always interesting. If these stories are about animal or birds, the fun becomes double for kids. 

"Aesop's  fables short stories for kids" is a collection of short stories. Read famous Aesop’s fables and let your kids learn priceless moral lessons.

Features:
1) 150  timeless classics of Aesop’s Fables
2) Mark Stories – Mark a story read, unread, or favorite  to remember  your preferences
3) Search – An easy search filter lets you find story title 
4)Multiple Languages – available in English, Spanish, and Hindi
5)Customize Font Size to your need,  we make it even easier to read for grandparents  
6)Night Mode –Turn the background black and the font white, giving you the perfect mode for nighttime reading. 

Aesop’s Fables are a large number of ancient Greek stories that teach a variety of moral lessons through the use of fascinating characters and their adventurers. 

There are no better classic stories to read alongside your child in order to educate them on how to treat others and live their lives. 

This App compiles a huge number of the fables, one hundred fifty short stories, into a single edition for you and your kids. This provides a vast variety of tales that you can look through and read with your child, assuring you that you’ll always be able to find the perfect bedtime story. 

Designed to be one of the best reading experiences of these classic fables on the market, this app comes with a multitude of features to provide the most enjoyment and learning possible.

Stories have been one of the best pass time activity for children and telling story to kids at nighttime has always been a beautiful way to put children to sleep.  


Some of very famous stories in this App are:
* The Thirsty Crow
* The Fox and the Grapes
* The honest wood Cutter
* The ant and the grasshopper
* The two hungry dogs
* The ant and the dove
* The Fox and the cat
* The Fox and the goat

Teaching your children morals, the difference between right and wrong, and how to make good choices doesn’t have to be a dry speech from you. This Aesop’s Fables app provides you with every resource you need to help tell an engaging story to your child, allowing you to lay the groundwork for a quick discussion over morals. 

These stories have entertained and taught children for generations, let them entertain and teach for one more time.

Download the app now and start enjoying Aesop’s fables. Kindly share these stories with kids around. Enjoy quality fun with Aesop's Fables , short stories for kids!!

Title: Aesop. Doctor Froggy
Description:
AESOP IN THE VALLEY OF TRIDENTUM. DOCTOR FROGGY.
A Magical Motion Book in your hands.

Imagine a beautiful, uncontaminated land where Nature reveals herself in all her glory and timeless magic is to be found hiding in every corner. Welcome to the Valley of Tridentum, where fairy tales come to life to guide young children to a discovery of themselves and the environment that surrounds them, to a clean, green world in which a frog, a fox or a crow have something to teach them...

The Series begins its adventure on the App Store with the first story Doctor Froggy, set on the wonderful shores of Lake Cei, in Trentino, Italy.

WITH UNICEF FOR THE CHILDREN
The series of Apps Aesop in the Valley of Tridentum has been highly praised and endorsed by UNICEF that has highlighted the human and civil values these fables are based upon. The stories, inspired by Aesop’s own brief fables, have been written for the new generations and illustrated with the most advanced 3D computer graphics technology and digital image animation. The stories are specially written to stimulate young people interest and encourage them to follow the example of positive heroes.

A WHOLE NEW READING EXPERIENCE
Every App of Aesop in the Valley of Tridentum features the Living Comic System™ 2.0 Technology. Artworks and contents come to life in Retina Display resolution with visual effects, sounds, animations, atmospheric elements and lights. It's a whole new reading experience. An original and engaging way to transmit to young people and their families the values of life through art, animation lyrical naturalism and positive adventures.

MAIN FEATURES

• A LIVING BOOK IN EVERY SENSE
All artworks are animated and presented in Retina Display resolution.

• ETHICAL CONTENTS
Aesop in Tridentum is an original publishing series of Apps for young readers endorsed by UNICEF

• EASY READING
Young readers can follow the story progressively and easily understand the contents.

• CREATED WITH THE FAMILY IN MIND
Aesop in Tridentum is for families in search of entertainment with an eye to educational and ethical values.

• LISTEN TO THE IMAGES
Immerse yourself in the story with music and sound effects.

• DYNAMIC TEXTS
Enjoy the reading. Text automatically resizes to fit your device!

• SHARE THE EXPERIENCE!
Share via Facebook, Twitter or email as you read!

• DOTTED INDEX
Access any content with a simple tap, any time you want.

T.C. Gıda Tarım ve Hayvancılık Bakanlığı Tarımsal Araştırmalar ve Politikalar Genel Müdürlüğü tarafından hazırlanan Afacanlar İnteraktif Mobil Çocuk Kitabı Serisi ile çocuklarımızın su ürünleri konusunda bilinçlendirilmesi hedeflenmektedir. 

Hayatta bazı  şeyleri sevmemiz veya nefret etmemiz genellikle çocukluk döneminde başımızdan geçen olaylarla veya aldığımız eğitimle güçlü bir şekilde ilişkilidir; bu nedenle bu çalışma ile çocuklarımızı hem eğlendiriyor hem de onların bilinçlenmelerini sağlıyoruz.

Title: Afarin
Description:
Afarin is built by a team of computer scientists, linguists and illustrators to preserve, teach, and celebrate the Farsi language through Persian children’s poetry. This educational app takes language learning to new dimensions by combining words with the power of touch, sound, and stunning visuals so that kids can learn Farsi in a playful and engaging way. The interactive products available in the Afarin Bookstore are based on the works of some of the most famous Iranian poets, including Abbas Yamini Sharif (عباس یمینی شریف), Mostafa Rahmandoust (مصطفی رحماندوست) and Banafsheh Rasoulian (بنفشه رسولیان).

آفرین برنامه کاربردی آموزش زبان فارسی با بهره گیری از شعر و ادبیات کودکان است که توسط گروهی از متخصصین علوم کامپیوتر، زبان شناسان و تصویرگران کتاب کودک تهیه شده است.  دراین روش نوین، با بهره‌گیری از لمس صفحه، صدا و تصاویر زیبا، کودکان در محیطی شاد و جذاب به یاد گیری زبان فارسی ترغیب می شوند
شما همچنین میتوانید محصولات فرهنگی مرتبط را از کتاب فروشی آفرین تهیه فرمایید. این محصولات شامل مجموعه ای از آثار برخی از معروف ترین خالقان شعر کودک از قبیل: عباس یمینی شریف، مصطفی رحماندوست، بنفشه رسولیان و ... می باشد

Title: Affairs of the Court (Legacy)
Description:
Plunge into court politics and change the course of history, or pursue a love affair that rocks the kingdom to its foundations!

"Affairs of the Court: Choice of Romance" is an epic interactive fantasy novel by Heather Albano and Adam Strong-Morse. It's a tale of romance, deception and court intrigue, where your choices control the story. The game is entirely text-based--223,000 words, without graphics or sound effects--and fueled by the vast, unstoppable power of your imagination.

Will you play as male or female? Gay or straight? Match wits with the schemers of the court, or play your suitors off each other? Will you find true love? Gain a crown? Lose your head?

Title: AFJ
Description:
The mobile Almanac of the Federal Judiciary has built its considerable reputation by providing balanced, responsible judicial profiles of every federal judge and all the key bankruptcy judges and magistrate judges -- profiles that include reliable inside information based on interviews with lawyers who have argued cases before the federal judiciary.
Containing valuable, hard-to-find material on every federal trial judge and appellate judge in the nation, this unique resource includes:
•Each judge's academic and professional background, experience on the bench, noteworthy rulings, and media coverage
•Candid, revealing commentary by lawyers, based on first-hand experiences before their local federal judges
•Helpful tips for your litigating team in shaping case strategy
•Important insights into each judge's style, demeanor, knowledge, and management of courtroom proceedings
•And continuing in-depth research, with semiannual updates

Search function

Version Information
Meer inligting oor hierdie Titel:
Gedeeltes uit die Bybel is in 1878 vir die eerste keer in Afrikaans vertaal deur CP Hoogenhout, het evangelie, A Pannevis en SJ du Toit, volle evangelie kerk. Die eerste volledige Bybel is egter eers in 1933 gepubliseer. ‘n Hersiene uitgawe word in 1953 uitgegee. Dié vertaling staan vandag bekend as die 1933/53-vertaling en is steeds ‘n baie gewilde tradisionele vertaling wat uit die Hebreeuse, apocriefe boeken, Griekse en Aramese brontekste vertaal is. Besoek gerus om ‘n gedrukte weergawe van hierdie Bybel te bestel.
Kopiereg inligting:
Die teks van die Bybel in Afrikaans (1933/53-vertaling) wat in hierdie elektroniese formaat of webblad verskyn is slegs vir persoonlike gebruik, preek.
Tot vyfhonderd (500) verse van hierdie Bybel in enige formaat (geskrewe, visueel, elektronies of oudio) mag sonder toestemming aangehaal word. Die aangehaalde verse mag egter nie meer as 50% van ‘n volledige boek van die Bybel, christelijk, of meer as 25% van die totale teks van die werk waarin hulle aangehaal word uitmaak nie, anders moet voorafgaande skriftelike toestemming verkry word, het christendom.

Title: Afrikaans Bible (DIE BYBEL)
Description:
Afrikaans Bible (DIE BYBEL) is a FREE, easy and friendly way to read the whole Bible with no need of internet connection. The Afrikaans Bible (DIE BYBEL) App gives you an improved Bible experience by keeping track of your readings, having instant access to any chapter, adding customized bookmarks and much more. 

Afrikaans Bible (DIE BYBEL) the best Application to carry God’s Word. Have the Holy Bible at your fingertips anytime and anywhere you go. This daily Bible App contains the 66 books of the Old Testament and New Testament, providing an easier way to feel God’s word in your heart and to feel heaven closer to you and your loved ones. Carry your Afrikaans Bible (DIE BYBEL) App wherever and whenever you want to help enlighten your mind with the most complete, fast and easy to use daily Bible App on App Store. 

MAIN FEATURES

# Works Offline: All the Books, chapters and verses in Afrikaans Bible (DIE BYBEL) stored on your mobile device, so you will never need an internet connection to study, read and enjoy the Holy Bible.

# Audio Feature: Listen the Bible with good quality Audio feature.

# Reading Plan: Read the Bible by following the existing best customized reading plans and also create your own reading plan.

# Bible Quiz: Sharpen your biblical knowledge by playing simple bible quizzes. The quiz content will be updated periodically.  

# Bible Quotes: Get category wise Bible Quotes to shape yourself and share your love on Jesus.

# Bible Dictionary: Learn new biblical words everyday with the advance inbuilt Bible Dictionary.

# Track your Reading: When you open Afrikaans Bible (DIE BYBEL) App you will be able to resume your last reading and every time you finish a chapter you can mark it as completed to keep track of your progress.

# Bookmarks and Notes: Customize your Afrikaans Bible (DIE BYBEL) by adding colorful bookmarks and notes just by tapping on any verse.

# Quick Access: By just a few taps you can quickly navigate to any book, chapter, and verse.

# Easy to Use: Swipe left or right to move between chapters and tap any verse to share, add bookmarks/notes or copy to clipboard.

# Share Bible Verses: Create custom images of your favorite Bible verses to share with your loved ones. Share up to 10 verses in a single image on any social media such as Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp, etc. 



OTHER FEATURES
- Discover Bible verses with the Verse Explorer 
- Look for specific words with our Search tool 
- Customize your font size for a better Bible Reading experience

Download the free Afrikaans Bible (DIE BYBEL) and start your day fresh with a daily verse and Carry your soft-copy of the Afrikaans Bible (DIE BYBEL) with you anytime and anyplace you are or wish to go, and share God's Word to spread light and love to your close ones. The Afrikaans Bible (DIE BYBEL) App offers immaculate friendly features that will make your daily Bible reading a wonderful experience. 

Help us spread God’s word by sharing the Afrikaans Bible (DIE BYBEL) with your friends. 

=> Download Afrikaans Bible (DIE BYBEL) for FREE and carry your own pocket soft copy of The Holy Bible. Try it Now!

We value your feedback and welcome any comments you may have to help improve our services. Please write to us at feedback@bibleall.net and we'll be happy to hear from you.

Find more at www.bibleall.net

Title: Afrikaans Dictionary Offline
Description:
AFRIKAANS DICTIONARY OFFLINE OFFLINE

Presenting the AFRIKAANS DICTIONARY OFFLINE - One of the Most Compact, Feature-Rich & Powerful ENGLISH TO NEPALI APP out there! 
AFRIKAANS DICTIONARY OFFLINE is an INTELLIGENTLY crafted app that caters ALL YOUR ENGLISH TO NEPALI WORDS MEANINGS NEEDS - Be it for COOKING, TRAVEL or SIMPLE WORDS MEANING in general! 
SMALL INSTALLABLE SIZE, STYLIST ANIMATION and FEATURE-RICH EASY INTERFACE - This app has got it all!
					
-----WEALTH OF WORDS - OVER 50,000 & COUNTING-----
AFRIKAANS DICTIONARY OFFLINE will provide you wealth of English words that you mostly use in your daily life and their meanings in NEPALI.
Having a stock full of more than 50,000+ words and counting, you will not need any other DICTIONARY APP for sure. With our regular updates, we are planning to add even more words so that our pirate chest of words keeps on increasing and informing you! 

----- OFFLINE SUPPORT -----
We understand that it is not always possible for everyone to connect to the internet all the time and that is why we have made our AFRIKAANS DICTIONARY OFFLINE app to work OFFLINE. 
Yes, you heard it right! You do not need any active internet connection to work our dictionary app. Just open the application and use it as per your liking - WITHOUT BEING BOTHERED ABOUT INTERNET CONNECTIVITY. 
All the 90,000 words, their NEPALI meaning and much more info is at your disposal, to use anywhere, anytime and WITHOUT any internet connection! 

----- SMALL SIZE - HIGHLY RESPONSIVE -----
AFRIKAANS DICTIONARY OFFLINE app is extremely COMPACT and EFFICIENT!
Despite being full of more than 50,000+ English words and their meaning in NEPALI, the ap is not even 30 Mb in size.  High efforts are put to make sure that app size is compact. The size is so compact that it will neither hurt your data usage nor the phone memory.  
The OFFLINE MODE makes the application HIGHLY RESPONSIVE and EXTREMELY FAST as well. You don't have to look up for the words meaning every time on internet and wait for the results!
The OFFLINE MODE will make sure that you get HIGHLY RESPONSIVE app with EXTREMELY FAST RESULTS!
 
-----  QUIZ & FUN GAMES -----
This AFRIKAANS DICTIONARY OFFLINE also contains FUN GAMES & QUIZ. 
Test you NEPALI skills using beautifully crafted multiple choice quiz and can improve your NEPALI as well. Our app will keep you hooked & entertained.

-----  EXTREMELY EASY NAVIGATION & DESIGN -----
The AFRIKAANS DICTIONARY OFFLINE is one HELL OF A DESIGN App...and we mean it! 
Our designers have crafted this app with utmost care making sure it is easy to use and navigate around!
The design is EASY TO UNDERSTAND YET STYLISH at the same time.

----- STYLISH GRAPHICS & USER INTERFACE -----
The AFRIKAANS DICTIONARY OFFLINE has a STYLISH & APPEALING USER INTERFACE. 
We have kept the design easy to understand but at the same time, the INTERFACE IS STYLISH & TRENDY.
The app is full of APPEALING GRAPHICS & BUTTONS that will you not get enough of this app.
We have explicitly used SMART GRAPHICS that will make sure you will understand the information before you have to read it. 
All the GRAPHICS ARE IRRESTIBLE AND TOP OF THE CLASS.

Our team has put in a lot of effort to bring this WONDERFUL AFRIKAANS DICTIONARY OFFLINE APP for you.
We hope you like our efforts and will have the same fun using this app as we had designing it.

We also hope that this app will take care of all your ENGLISH TO NEPALI WORDS MEANING troubles going forward.
So relax, just install and enjoy a whole new INFORMATIONAL JOURNEY. 

Please leave us your review and comments about the experience of our app. 
We will be eagerly waiting for your feedbacks!
Thank You!

Title: Afrikaans German Dictionary
Description:
Dit is ’n Afrikaans - Duits en Duits - Afrikaans woordeboek; Afrikaans - German and German - Afrikaans dictionary / Wörterbuch Afrikaans - Deutsch und Deutsch - Afrikaans. Die toepassing is VANLYN en het nie ’n internetverbinding nodig nie.
Die databasis sal afgelaai word wanneer die toepassing die eerte keer gebruik word. Ons beveel aan dat jy ’n Wi-Fi-verbinding gebruik.

Vernaamste kenmerke:
1. Geskiedenis - elke artikel waarna jy al gekyk het, word in geskiedenis gestoor.
2. Gunstelinge - jy kan artikels by gunstelinge voeg deur op die "ster"-ikoon te klik.
3. Beheer geskiedenis- en gunstelingelys - jy kan hierdie lyste wysig of skoonmaak.
4. Verskeie instellings - jy kan die toepassing se font en tema verander (kies een uit ’n paar kleurtemas).

Hierdie app bevat advertensies.

=====

This is Afrikaans - German and German - Afrikaans dictionary; Afrikaans - Duits en Duits - Afrikaans woordeboek / Wörterbuch Afrikaans - Deutsch und Deutsch - Afrikaans. The Application works OFFLINE and does not need the internet connection.
Database will be downloaded when the application is run first time. We recommend you to use Wi-Fi connection.
 
Main features:
1. History – every article you ever viewed is stored in history.
2. Favorites – you are able to add articles to favorites by clicking the “star” icon.
3. Managing History and Favorites lists – you are able to edit those lists or clear them.
4. Various Settings – you may change application’s font and theme (choose one of several color themes).

This app contains advertising.

Title: AFTER 11 PM
Description:
In our app you will snoop through people’s conversations, see photos and videos they send to each other, listen to their audio messages, you will even be able to listen to somebody’s phone conversations calls in our app without feeling guilty. Choose a story and start your adventure even if you only have 6 minutes!

A few reasons to download After 11 PM:
1. Plenty of highly addictive 6-mins chat fiction stories
2. A fascinating read with various types of content:
• Text messages
• Audio messages
• Photos
• Videos
• Notes
3. The effect for a reader of being plunged into someone’s conversation

So... What are you going to do After 11 PM tonight?

Privacy Policy: https://admin.after11pm.app/content/privacy_policy.html
Terms of Use: https://admin.after11pm.app/content/terms_of_use.html

Subscription plans (the final cost may vary depending on your location):
Weekly: $2.99
Monthly: $9.99
Lifetime: $14.99

Auto-renew subscription:
• A free trial period of 7 days is provided
• Payment will be made to the iTunes Account upon confirmation of purchase
• Subscription automatically renews if automatic renewal is not turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period
• Accounts will be charged for renewal within 24 hours before the end of the current period based on the selected plan
• Subscriptions can be managed by the user and automatic updating can be disabled in the user account settings after purchase
• Any unused portion of the free trial will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription.

Title: After Dark - Creepy Stories
Description:
New Stories EVERY Friday!

100+ original stories and counting!

Wolf: welcome to the nightmare after dark
Wolf: where your deepest fears come to light
Wolf: you wouldn’t know until you start
Wolf: let’s play a game..ready for a fright?

After Dark lets you read incredible, nail-biting stories for FREE. These nightmare stories are filled with suspense and cliff-hangers guaranteed to keep you reading all the way until the very end.

Every After Dark story is told in an easy-to-digest text message format. Read whenever you have free time. Come back later and continue where you left off.

Every story contains images and soundbites to make it as realistic and immersive as possible.

CHECK FOR NEW STORIES EVERY FRIDAY. Just swipe down from the top of the screen in the story selection page to refresh. New stories will be updated automatically.

ENABLE PUSH NOTIFICATIONS to stay up-to-date on new story releases!

TURN SOUND ON to have the full, immersive experience.

These stories will keep you up at night. Have fun. You've been warned :)

AFTER DARK UNLIMITED SUBSCRIPTIONS:

-Your subscription will grant you unlimited access to all stories for the duration of your subscription.

-Prices are $2.99 weekly, $7.99 monthly, and $39.99 yearly

-Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase 

-Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period 

-Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal 

-Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase 

-Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable 

-By using After Dark, you agree to our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy: http://perpetualapps.co/docs/terms.pdf

*Prices are equal to the value that "Apple's App Store Matrix" determines is the equivalent subscription price in $USD.



Questions? Click "Send feedback" within the app

If you would like to add your stories to our app, please email us at perpetualappsllc@gmail.com
Thanks!

Title: AFUDOKU
Description:
アマチュアの漫画家が活動してするプラットフォームアプリです。

現在は漫画家が自身の描いた漫画をJPEGファイルにしたものをトップページに掲載している段階です。

漫画の投稿をすることによって漫画家の副業を支援するサービスを実現します。
将来的には漫画家だけでなくアニメなどのコンテンツにスタートを切る人材サポートアプリにしていくのと同時に一般ユーザーの新規コミュニティ生成を支援します。

Title: AFV Modeller Digital
Description: As the publishers of the highly regarded AFV Modeller and AIR Modeller magazines it seemed to be a natural progression for us to enter into book publishing and we have been working over recent years towards this goal. We are very excited about this area of the hobby and hope in the future to have many interesting titles on offer. Our visually-led approach is carried over into our various themed books.  The 'AFV Modeller Digital' App is a platform that allows us to publish our Digital Books on Smartphone and Tablet. Current titles include: Made In Holland, M4: Modelling the Sherman Tank, AFV Modellers Guide to Modelling the Merkava 3D and our latest addition is AIR Modeller's Guide to Wingnut Wings Volume I.

Title: Again Pro_最纯净的稍后阅读器
Description:
——【Again Pro是什么】——
Again Pro是一款稍后阅读类应用，专为那些喜欢阅读但却没有时间的人群定制。可以一键收藏文章，利用闲暇时间来阅读文章和咨询，比如公交车上、走路，甚至点杯咖啡的时间，将零散时间使利用起来，是Again的意义所在。

——【Again Pro是什么】——
凡是您希望可以收藏的文章，或者想要稍后阅读的文章，都可以通过Again Pro来保存起来，一键上传至iCloud。确保您的信息安全。
您可以复制任何app中的文章链接，然后分享到Again Pro。

——【为什么叫 Again Pro】——
Again的中文解释是：再一次，又。而我更愿意翻译为：再见。再次见到、再次遇见。将文章收藏起来，等到闲暇时翻出来继续阅读，就好像老朋友再次见面一样，每次看到这个名字就好像在提醒我，老朋友在等你，他期望快点见到你。

——【Again Pro的特点】——
1.纯粹：我致力于开发功能单一的App。没有复杂的功能，没有复杂的UI，没有复杂的交互，也没有复杂的社交和推荐。我要做的就是看书，看书，看书。
2.思量再三的交互模式，更好的交互方式有助于阅读。Again更合适你单手操作。
3.统计：统计功能有助于你了解，这周你看了多少、学习了多久、是否有进步、是否需要改进。统计的对比功能更能激励你学习。
4.轻量级：短小精悍的app不占用你任何手机空间，16G用户的福音。
5.安全：数据全部存储到iCloud中，除了你没有任何人知道你的收藏，确保您的隐私。

——【开发者想对你说】——
Again Pro致力于纯净阅读，不错过任何一篇好文。希望Again Pro可以和大家一起成长起来。

——【联系我们】——
微信：18641175453
QQ：834994897
投诉建议：如果投诉建议，请在app中使用意见反馈功能或直接发送邮件到834994897@qq.com。我会及时作出反馈。

Title: Against the Grain Motion Book
Description:
Your one stop shop for all things Against the Grain and more, the new Slightly Off Productions app lets you browse, purchase, and explore all of your favorite SOP animated comics for the iPhone. With our clean and crisp interface, we make it easy for you to get lost in the amazing artwork and beautiful animations we have lovingly created. Even better, we give you the chance to preview our comics before you buy them, and each comic comes with a trailer for you to watch and enjoy. Now you'll be able to experience Leslie's whole saga all in one place!

Lost your iPhone or upgraded to a new device? No problem! We remember what comics you have purchased so that when you come back to read them again, they'll be ready for you.

Still not convinced? See what others have had to say about the Against the Grain series!

"You will love the adventure that is waiting for you.  Just to be fair, I must tell you that this App is addicting... it is a true action packed, edge of your seat, heart pumping App that is hard to put down"
  - MommyIsland Blog

"Beautiful art accompanies a wonderful lead character in this imaginative tale of growing up. Read this book!"
   - Spandexless

"The writing is fun, the artwork is beautiful and assured, and the coloring is remarkable."
   - The Hayfamzone Blog

"Against the Grain is endlessly creative, thoroughly enjoyable, and, at the end of the day, really, really, REALLY fun."
   - Ain't It Cool News
